original: @208b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @208b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i dzny'a ti la ka panytsi k'a gu hya tattva n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i dzny'a ti la ka panytsi k'a gu hya tattva n'a ma /
translated: Śrījñānatilakaprapañcaguhyatattvanāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba /
translated: The Commentary on the Difficult Points of the Glorious Wisdom-Essence, called the Secret Thatness

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrasattva.

original: de nyid lnga brgyad drug gi bye brag de kho na nyid shar //
analyzed: de nyid lnga brgyad drug gi bye brag de kho na nyid shar //
translated: Thatness, divided into five, eight, and six, is the wisdom of the glorious ones.

original: rdo rje snying po bha gar sbas pa dam pa'i bde ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po bha gar sbas pa dam pa'i bde ba che //
translated: The vajra essence hidden in the bhaga is the supreme great bliss,

original: sku gsum ye shes lnga rdzogs bde gshegs kun kyi  thugs rang bzhin //
analyzed: sku gsum ye shes lnga rdzogs bde gshegs kun kyi  thugs rang bzhin //
translated: The nature of the mind of all the sugatas, the perfection of the three bodies and five wisdoms.

original: dpal ldan ye shes thig le khyed la sgo gsum dang bas 'dud //🔽thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa la //
analyzed: dpal ldan ye shes thig le khyed la sgo gsum dang bas 'dud // thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa la //
translated: With body, speech, and mind devoted, I bow to you, the glorious wisdom essence.

original: bdag blo go skabs med mod kyi ;🔽/ gzhan gyis 'dir ni bskul ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag blo go skabs med mod kyi ; / gzhan gyis 'dir ni bskul ba'i phyir //
translated: Although I have no opportunity to understand🔽The teachings of the Omniscient One with my own mind,🔽I will compose this commentary on the secret thatness

original: gsang ba'i de nyid dka' 'grel brtsam //
analyzed: gsang ba'i de nyid dka' 'grel brtsam //
translated: Because I am urged to do so by others here.

original: shes rab chung ba'i sems can rnams //
analyzed: shes rab chung ba'i sems can rnams //
translated: For sentient beings with little wisdom,

original: rigs pa ngan pa chos kyi blos //
analyzed: rigs pa ngan pa chos kyi blos //
translated: The Dharma of bad reasoning

original: ji ltar gsungs la ma gsungs smra //
analyzed: ji ltar gsungs la ma gsungs smra //
translated: And speak of what was not spoken.

original: de bzhin 'dir yang gsungs mod kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin 'dir yang gsungs mod kyang //
translated: In the same way, although it was spoken here,

original: sems can bsam pa'i khyad par gyis //
analyzed: sems can bsam pa'i khyad par gyis //
translated: Due to the differences in the thoughts of sentient beings,

original: zhal nas gsungs pa'i chos la yang //
analyzed: zhal nas gsungs pa'i chos la yang //
translated: They engage in the Dharma that was spoken from the mouth

original: dga' zhing dad pa'i phyogs su 'jug / de bzhin 'di la yang 'jug go //🔽de bas nyon mongs dbang gyur pa'i //
analyzed: dga' zhing dad pa'i phyogs su 'jug / de bzhin 'di la yang 'jug go // de bas nyon mongs dbang gyur pa'i //
translated: With joy and faith, and in the same way, they engage in this.🔽Therefore, for the sake of sentient beings

original: 'di 'dod sems can rnams la ni //🔽brtse ba'i dbang gis gsang ba yi //
analyzed: 'di 'dod sems can rnams la ni // brtse ba'i dbang gis gsang ba yi //
translated: Who desire this and are under the power of the afflictions,🔽Out of compassion, I will explain

original: de kho na nyid bshad par bya //
analyzed: de kho na nyid bshad par bya //
translated: The secret of suchness.

original: 'dir rgyud kyi don de yang dgos 'brel rnam pa lngas bstan te /
analyzed: 'dir rgyud kyi don de yang dgos 'brel rnam pa lngas bstan te /
translated: Here, the meaning of the tantra is explained by five topics:

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i gang zag dang / gang zag gi rjes su 'brang ba gnyis las /
analyzed: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i gang zag dang / gang zag gi rjes su 'brang ba gnyis las /
translated: There are two types of individuals: those who follow the Dharma and those who follow the individual.

original: snga ma 'jug par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: snga ma 'jug par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to engage the former,

original: de rnams bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams bstan par bya'o //
translated: those will be explained.

original: de la rgyud 'di dbu nas zhabs kyi bar gyi /
analyzed: de la rgyud 'di dbu nas zhabs kyi bar gyi /
translated: In this tantra, from beginning to end,

original: tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs ni rjod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs ni rjod par byed pa'o //
translated: the collection of words and letters is the expression.

original: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le sku gsum dang / ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid rnams brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le sku gsum dang / ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid rnams brjod par bya'o //
translated: The Bhagavān, the glorious Essence of Pristine Awareness, is the embodiment of the three kāyas and the five pristine awarenesses.

original: de rnams brjod par bya ba dang / rjod par byed pa 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams brjod par bya ba dang / rjod par byed pa 'brel pa'o //
translated: The subject matter is the connection between the one who expresses and the one to whom it is expressed.

original: der gdul bya rnams la bskyed rim la sogs pa'i thabs bstan pas dga' bar byas shing 'jug pa ni dgos pa'o //
analyzed: der gdul bya rnams la bskyed rim la sogs pa'i thabs bstan pas dga' bar byas shing 'jug pa ni dgos pa'o //
translated: The purpose is to delight and engage the disciples by teaching the methods of the stage of development and so forth.

original: yang zhugs nas grub pa'i mthar phyin pa 'di ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhugs nas grub pa'i mthar phyin pa 'di ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o //
translated: The ultimate purpose is to reach the culmination of attainment after engaging in the practice.

original: 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The words “thus have I heard” and so forth.

original: 'di skad ces bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log pa'i @209a * //
analyzed: 'di skad ces bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log pa'i @209a * //
translated: “Thus” means in accordance with the unmistaken,

original: don de yang dag par ston pa'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: don de yang dag par ston pa'i tshig gis so //
translated: authentic meaning, which is taught by the words.

original: bdag gis bya ba ni //
analyzed: bdag gis bya ba ni //
translated: “I have heard”

original: sdud pa po lha'i dbang phyug gis zhes 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: sdud pa po lha'i dbang phyug gis zhes 'brel ba'o //
translated: is the connection with the compiler, the lord of the gods.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /🔽bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la sdud pa pos /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la sdud pa pos /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows.🔽The compiler, the lord of the gods,🔽directly attained the Bhagavān Vajrasattva

original: ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du thob pa ni /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du thob pa ni /
translated: just as he is.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of “thus have I heard.🔽”

original: dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “At one time” means

original: 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus bkag pa yin te /
analyzed: 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus bkag pa yin te /
translated: that the past and so forth are excluded.

original: rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs pa'i dus na'o //
translated: It is the time of abiding in the bhaga of the queen, the nature of the maṇḍala of the support and the supported.

original: de yang drang ba'i don gyis rgyud 'di 'byung bar dka' ba dang / sdud pa po shes rab che ba la sogs par bstan to //
analyzed: de yang drang ba'i don gyis rgyud 'di 'byung bar dka' ba dang / sdud pa po shes rab che ba la sogs par bstan to //
translated: Moreover, by the provisional meaning, this tantra is taught to be difficult to arise and the compiler is of great wisdom and so forth.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Bhagavān” means

original: bdud rnam pa bzhi bcom pa dang dbang phyug la sogs pa'i legs pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: bdud rnam pa bzhi bcom pa dang dbang phyug la sogs pa'i legs pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: that the four māras are conquered and he possesses the good qualities of Īśvara and so forth.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:🔽Īśvara, good form,🔽glory, fame, wisdom,

original: dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang // brtson 'grus phun tshogs bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang // brtson 'grus phun tshogs bcom ldan 'das //
translated: and perfect diligence are the bhagavān.

original: yang na mi mthun pa'i bdud de kun bcom nas /
analyzed: yang na mi mthun pa'i bdud de kun bcom nas /
translated: Or, having conquered all the māras of the discordant,

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes gsungs so //
translated: he is called the bhagavān.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Tathāgata” means

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis kyi dbang gis 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i skyon gyis ma gos par gshegs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so //
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis kyi dbang gis 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i skyon gyis ma gos par gshegs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so //
translated: The Buddhas, Vairocana and so on, are so called because they have gone to the state of no-more-learning, having gone to the state of no-more-learning by the power of the two collections of merit and knowledge, without being stained by the faults of cyclic existence and nirvana.

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni /
translated: All means

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin ;
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin ;
translated: all the Tathagatas, who have attained mastery of the gnosis of omniscience, are of the nature of the gnosis of body, speech, and mind.

original: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
translated: The Bhagavat himself is the body, speech, and mind.

original: dbyer med pa'i phyir rdo rje'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i sku bde ba chen po nyid do //
analyzed: dbyer med pa'i phyir rdo rje'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i sku bde ba chen po nyid do //
translated: Because they are inseparable, they are the nature of great bliss, which bears the characteristic of a vajra.

original: ji skad du //
analyzed: ji skad du //
translated: As it is said:

original: de bzhin gshegs nyid dpal dang ldan //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs nyid dpal dang ldan //
translated: The glorious one is the Tathagata himself.

original: de bzhin gshegs shing byon pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs shing byon pa'o //
translated: He is the Tathagata, the come one.

original: rigs lnga'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas rnams //
analyzed: rigs lnga'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas rnams //
translated: The Buddhas, who are the nature of the five families,

original: thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'o //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'o //🔽zhes gsungs so //
translated: are all Tathagatas.

original: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The term “hero” means

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa'i phyir rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad bcom zhing zhi bar byed pa'i phyir na dpa' bo'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa'i phyir rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad bcom zhing zhi bar byed pa'i phyir na dpa' bo'o //
translated: that the great bodhisattvas are heroes because they have conquered and pacified all the hosts of demons, tīrthikas, and other opponents.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: @209b phyir la rgol bcom dpa' bo ste //🔽de bzhin skye rga na 'chi yi /🔽sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pas na //
analyzed: @209b phyir la rgol bcom dpa' bo ste // de bzhin skye rga na 'chi yi / sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pas na //
translated: The hero is the one who conquers the opponents;🔽In the same way, the bodhisattva is so called

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //🔽zhes gsungs so //🔽dpa' mo zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du 'dir nu ma dang / mtshan ma la sogs pa'i khyad par byas pa'i bud med kyi gzugs kyis bzhugs pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o // zhes gsungs so // dpa' mo zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du 'dir nu ma dang / mtshan ma la sogs pa'i khyad par byas pa'i bud med kyi gzugs kyis bzhugs pa ste /
translated: Because he pacifies the suffering of birth, aging, sickness, and death.🔽The term “heroine” means that the heroines are the goddesses who reside here in the form of women, with breasts, sexual organs, and so forth,

original: zla ma sogs pa'i dpa' mo rnams so //
analyzed: zla ma sogs pa'i dpa' mo rnams so //
translated: such as Cāmuṇḍā and so forth.

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas /
translated: The great heroes and heroines, who take on the forms of method and wisdom,

original: bcom ldan 'das la rnam par bskor nas bzhugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la rnam par bskor nas bzhugs so //
translated: surround the Bhagavān.

original: btsun mo ni rdo rje btsun mo rnams te /
analyzed: btsun mo ni rdo rje btsun mo rnams te /
translated: The queens are the vajra queens.

original: sangs rgyas spyan dang m'a ma k'i la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas spyan dang m'a ma k'i la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: Buddhalocanā, Māmakī, and so forth.

original: btsun mo dang bha ga dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs snying po rdo rje nyid ces bya ste /
analyzed: btsun mo dang bha ga dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs snying po rdo rje nyid ces bya ste /
translated: The queen, the bhaga, and the Blessed One, the essence of the body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas, is called the vajra.

original: khyad par gyi bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par gyi bsdu ba'o //
translated: This is the special summary.

original: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni /
translated: As for abides,

original: bcom ldan 'das dang / 'khor khyad par du gyur pa dpa' bo la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum dkar po nang stong pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dang / 'khor khyad par du gyur pa dpa' bo la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum dkar po nang stong pa /
translated: the Blessed One, together with the special retinue of heroes and so forth, abides in the celestial mansion within the source of phenomena, which is white, triangular, and empty in the middle,

original: 'og phra la steng yongs su rgyas pa'i nang gi gzhal yas khang na bzhugs so //
analyzed: 'og phra la steng yongs su rgyas pa'i nang gi gzhal yas khang na bzhugs so //
translated: with the bottom narrow and the top fully open.

original: yang na / 'di skad bdag gis de nyid gsungs //
analyzed: yang na / 'di skad bdag gis de nyid gsungs //
translated: Alternatively, thus have I heard

original: bdag nyid dang ni bcas pa ste //
analyzed: bdag nyid dang ni bcas pa ste //
translated: is said to be the self and the self-consecration.

original: rang bzhin bzhi yi rnam par ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin bzhi yi rnam par ni //
translated: The four natures

original: don dam par ni shes par bya'o //
analyzed: don dam par ni shes par bya'o //
translated: should be understood in terms of the ultimate.🔽The meaning of heard is the supreme moon,

original: thos pa'i don zla bde mchog / de ni nam mkha' bzhin du mchog / gcig ces bya ba gzhan mchog go //
analyzed: thos pa'i don zla bde mchog / de ni nam mkha' bzhin du mchog / gcig ces bya ba gzhan mchog go //
translated: and that is supreme like space.

original: srid dang mya ngan 'das dang bral //
analyzed: srid dang mya ngan 'das dang bral //
translated: Free from existence and nirvana.

original: dus ni phyag rgya chen po bshad /
analyzed: dus ni phyag rgya chen po bshad /
translated: Time is explained as the great seal.

original: bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa spangs //
analyzed: bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa spangs //
translated: Abandoning creation and completion,

original: bcom ldan 'das ni mtha' zhes bstan //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni mtha' zhes bstan //
translated: the Bhagavān is taught to be the end.

original: rang dga' nyams su myong ba'i dngos //
analyzed: rang dga' nyams su myong ba'i dngos //
translated: The experience of one’s own delight is the thing.

original: thams cad stong ba ye shes gsum //
analyzed: thams cad stong ba ye shes gsum //
translated: All emptiness is the three exalted wisdoms.

original: de nyid kyis ni spangs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni spangs pa'o //
translated: It is abandoned by that itself.

original: de bzhin gshegs ni rnams byed grags /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs ni rnams byed grags /
translated: The Tathāgata is renowned as the creator.

original: dang po'i gnas ni grub par byed //
analyzed: dang po'i gnas ni grub par byed //
translated: The first stage is made stable.

original: sku ni dga' ba'i dngos por grags //
analyzed: sku ni dga' ba'i dngos por grags //
translated: The body is renowned as the thing of joy,

original: dbang po gnyis byung dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis byung dang bral ba'o //
translated: free from the two organs.

original: gsung ni mchog gi dga' bar bstan //
analyzed: gsung ni mchog gi dga' bar bstan //
translated: Speech is taught to be supreme joy,

original: dam tshig las byung gis ni spangs //
analyzed: dam tshig las byung gis ni spangs //
translated: abandoned by the one arisen from the pledge.

original: thugs ni chad pas dga' ba ste //
analyzed: thugs ni chad pas dga' ba ste //
translated: The mind is the joy of cessation,

original: ye shes las byung gis ni spangs //
analyzed: ye shes las byung gis ni spangs //
translated: abandoned by the one arisen from exalted wisdom.

original: rdo rje dang ni rang bzhin dga' //
analyzed: rdo rje dang ni rang bzhin dga' //
translated: The vajra is naturally joyful,

original: rang bzhin gyis ni rtog pa bral //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni rtog pa bral //
translated: free from conceptuality by nature.

original: dpa' bo chen po zla @210a * //
analyzed: dpa' bo chen po zla @210a * //
translated: The great hero is the thing of the moon,

original: ba'i dngos // zhu ba chad pa spangs pas gzugs //
analyzed: ba'i dngos // zhu ba chad pa spangs pas gzugs //
translated: the form abandoned by the cessation of the moon.

original: dpa' mo dbang phyug ma bde rten //
analyzed: dpa' mo dbang phyug ma bde rten //
translated: The hero's powerful lady is the support of bliss.

original: dang po'i bdud rtsi las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: dang po'i bdud rtsi las skyes pa'o //
translated: She is born from the first nectar.

original: rnam skor yan lag thams cad kyis //
analyzed: rnam skor yan lag thams cad kyis //
translated: She pervades all the limbs with her embrace,

original: khyab par chu yi padma bzhin //
analyzed: khyab par chu yi padma bzhin //
translated: like water in a lotus.

original: shes rab de ni tshangs pa'i gnas //
analyzed: shes rab de ni tshangs pa'i gnas //
translated: That wisdom is the abode of Brahma,

original: tshangs pa ye shes 'dzin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tshangs pa ye shes 'dzin pa'i phyir /
translated: because Brahma is the holder of gnosis.

original: bha ga bdud ni 'joms pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bha ga bdud ni 'joms pa'i phyir //
translated: The bhaga is so called because it conquers Mara,

original: yang na longs spyod myong bas so //
analyzed: yang na longs spyod myong bas so //
translated: or because it experiences enjoyment.

original: bzhugs pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: bzhugs pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid de /
translated: It is characterized as the abode itself,

original: de bzhin gnas pa yang na gshegs //
analyzed: de bzhin gnas pa yang na gshegs //
translated: and likewise as the place, or as the one who goes.

original: de lta bu yi don du ni //
analyzed: de lta bu yi don du ni //
translated: For that purpose,

original: 'di skad bdag gis la sogs par bstan //
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis la sogs par bstan //
translated: this is taught beginning with Thus have I heard.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: gzhan ni 'di skad bdag gis la sogs pa'i don ni ;
analyzed: gzhan ni 'di skad bdag gis la sogs pa'i don ni ;
translated: The meaning of Thus have I heard and so forth is as follows.

original: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba de kho na nyid bzhir phye nas bstan te /
analyzed: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba de kho na nyid bzhir phye nas bstan te /
translated: It is taught by dividing it into four: outer, inner, secret, and suchness.

original: de skad du //
analyzed: de skad du //
translated: In that way,

original: phyi dang nang dang de bzhin gsang //
analyzed: phyi dang nang dang de bzhin gsang //
translated: outer, inner, and likewise secret,🔽and the meaning of suchness,

original: de nyid don dang rnam pa bzhir //
analyzed: de nyid don dang rnam pa bzhir //
translated: are the four aspects.

original: dkyil 'khor dang ni lus dang yang /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dang ni lus dang yang /
translated: The mandala, the body, and also

original: las ni phyag rgya srang bzhin med //
analyzed: las ni phyag rgya srang bzhin med //
translated: The action is like a scale, without [the need for] a seal.

original: ces gsungs pa bzhin bshad zer ro yang gzhan dag ni 'di skad bdag gis la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni phyi la sogs pa'i don 'di skad bstan dgos pa gsal bar gsungs te /
analyzed: ces gsungs pa bzhin bshad zer ro yang gzhan dag ni 'di skad bdag gis la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni phyi la sogs pa'i don 'di skad bstan dgos pa gsal bar gsungs te /
translated: Others say that this is the meaning of the words “thus have I heard,” and so on.

original: ae yi yi ge sa zhes bya /
analyzed: ae yi yi ge sa zhes bya /
translated: The letter e is known as earth.

original: las kyi phyag rgyas sangs rgyas spyan //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgyas sangs rgyas spyan //
translated: The karma mudra is Buddhalocanā.

original: snying rje chen po dang ni thabs //
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang ni thabs //
translated: Great compassion and method,

original: sna tshogs dngos dang sna tshogs spyod //🔽lte ba sna tshogs chu skyes kyi //
analyzed: sna tshogs dngos dang sna tshogs spyod // lte ba sna tshogs chu skyes kyi //
translated: the various things and various conduct,

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'o //
translated: are located in the emanation wheel🔽at the navel, the variegated lotus.

original: wam gi yi ge chur shes bya //
analyzed: wam gi yi ge chur shes bya //
translated: The letter vaṃ is known as water.

original: chos kyi phyag rgya m'a ma k'i //
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya m'a ma k'i //
translated: The dharma mudra is Māmakī.

original: byams pa chen po smon lam las //
analyzed: byams pa chen po smon lam las //
translated: Great love and aspiration,

original: rdo rje rigs kyi lha mo ste //🔽snying gar chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad //
analyzed: rdo rje rigs kyi lha mo ste // snying gar chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad //
translated: the goddess of the vajra family,🔽is located in the center of the dharma wheel

original: chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas //
translated: at the heart, the eight-petaled lotus.

original: ma yig me ru brjod pa'o ;
analyzed: ma yig me ru brjod pa'o ;
translated: The letter ma is said to be fire.

original: / phyag rgya chen po gos dkar mo //
analyzed: / phyag rgya chen po gos dkar mo //
translated: The great mudra is Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: dga' ba dang ni stobs  rang bzhin //
analyzed: dga' ba dang ni stobs  rang bzhin //
translated: Joy and strength are her nature.

original: lha mo padma'i rigs su 'byung //
analyzed: lha mo padma'i rigs su 'byung //
translated: The goddess arises in the lotus family.

original: mgrin par chu skyes bcu drug 'dab //
analyzed: mgrin par chu skyes bcu drug 'dab //
translated: At the throat, the lotus has sixteen petals,

original: longs spyod 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pa'o /
analyzed: longs spyod 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pa'o /
translated: and is located in the center of the enjoyment chakra.

original: ya yig rlung du shes par bya /
analyzed: ya yig rlung du shes par bya /
translated: The syllable ya is known as the wind.

original: dam tshig phyag rgya dam tshig sgrol //
analyzed: dam tshig phyag rgya dam tshig sgrol //
translated: The pledge seal is the pledge-liberator.

original: btang snyoms ye shes sbyor ba las //
analyzed: btang snyoms ye shes sbyor ba las //
translated: From the union of the wisdom of equanimity,

original: las kyi rigs kyi lha mo gtso //
analyzed: las kyi rigs kyi lha mo gtso //
translated: the goddess of the karma family is chief.

original: spyi bor 'dab skyes sum cu gnyis /
analyzed: spyi bor 'dab skyes sum cu gnyis /
translated: At the crown, the lotus has thirty-two petals,

original: bde chen 'khor lo la gnas pa'i //
analyzed: bde chen 'khor lo la gnas pa'i //
translated: and is located in the great-bliss chakra.

original: nyon mongs thams cad 'joms mdzad pa //
analyzed: nyon mongs thams cad 'joms mdzad pa //
translated: It is the one who conquers all afflictions,

original: 'khor ba las sgrol sgrol mar bshad //
analyzed: 'khor ba las sgrol sgrol mar bshad //
translated: and is said to be Tara, who liberates from cyclic existence.🔽And also:

original: ces bya ba dang / de bzhin du yang rigs kyi bu 'di skad @210b bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'di dag chos thams cad kyi thog mar brjod pa ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba dang / de bzhin du yang rigs kyi bu 'di skad @210b bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'di dag chos thams cad kyi thog mar brjod pa ni /
translated: Son of noble family, these syllables “Thus have I heard” are spoken at the beginning of all the teachings.

original: rtag tu dag pa'i phyir yi ge ste /
analyzed: rtag tu dag pa'i phyir yi ge ste /
translated: They are syllables because they are always pure.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skyed pa por byed pa grub pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skyed pa por byed pa grub pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
translated: They are the creators of the perfect buddhas.

original: de'i phyir na 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa'i don rgyas par bshad dgos zer ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir na 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa'i don rgyas par bshad dgos zer ro //
translated: Therefore, it is necessary to explain extensively the meaning of “thus have I heard” and so forth.

original: yang gzhan kha cig na re 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa'i don dbye bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: yang gzhan kha cig na re 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa'i don dbye bar mi bya ste /
translated: Again, some say that the meaning of “thus have I heard” and so forth should not be analyzed.

original: de rang gi don ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de rang gi don ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa yin gyi /
translated: This is taught just as it is.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: le'u dang po 'di dang gnyis pa'i snod drang ba dang nges par ma phye ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: le'u dang po 'di dang gnyis pa'i snod drang ba dang nges par ma phye ba'i phyir na /
translated: Because this first chapter and the second are not distinguished as vessels,

original: rgyud kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: rgyud kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bya ste /
translated: the meaning of the tantra should be explained just as it is.

original: de yang ston pa bcom ldan 'das ni rtogs shing mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de yang ston pa bcom ldan 'das ni rtogs shing mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Moreover, the teacher, the Bhagavān, is realized and omniscient.

original: 'khor dang bsdu ba por bcas pa rnams ni /
analyzed: 'khor dang bsdu ba por bcas pa rnams ni /
translated: Those with retinues and compilers

original: nyan cing shes par 'dod pa'i bsam pa can yin no //
analyzed: nyan cing shes par 'dod pa'i bsam pa can yin no //
translated: have the intention of listening and wishing to know.

original: de'i phyir 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi don la ;
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi don la ;
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the nature of “thus have I heard” and so forth

original: de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bos nas /
analyzed: de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bos nas /
translated: The Bhagavat immediately addressed the great bodhisattva Maheśvara,

original: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa'i ngo bo la sogs pa'i gleng bslang ba yin zer ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa'i ngo bo la sogs pa'i gleng bslang ba yin zer ro //
translated: and the introduction was made by the essence of the three realities and so forth.

original: de dag gis gzhung la bdag gi ni yid ches par mi byed do //
analyzed: de dag gis gzhung la bdag gi ni yid ches par mi byed do //
translated: I do not trust those who say this about the text.

original: 'on kyang gzhan dang po srid pas dor ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gzhan dang po srid pas dor ba yang ma yin no //
translated: However, it is not that the first is not possible.

original: slob dpon chen po aindra bh'u ti'i man ngag gis gsungs pa bzhin bdag 'dzin te /
analyzed: slob dpon chen po aindra bh'u ti'i man ngag gis gsungs pa bzhin bdag 'dzin te /
translated: According to the instructions of the great master Indrabhūti,

original: de yang drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don du dbye'o //
analyzed: de yang drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don du dbye'o //
translated: it is held that the sūtras are divided into interpretable meaning and definitive meaning.

original: de skad du //
analyzed: de skad du //
translated: As it is said:

original: nges dang drang don bye brag tu //🔽'di skad bdag gis la sogs bshad //
analyzed: nges dang drang don bye brag tu // 'di skad bdag gis la sogs bshad //
translated: The interpretable meaning and the definitive meaning

original: ces rgyu las gsungs so ;
analyzed: ces rgyu las gsungs so ;
translated: are explained in the statements “Thus have I heard” and so forth.🔽This is stated in the Guhyasamaja Tantra.

original: / der dpal nam mkha' dri med ces bya ba ni yang dag 'od rab nyid las ston pa dang / 'khor gyi bye brag gi gzugs kyis sprul nas /
analyzed: / der dpal nam mkha' dri med ces bya ba ni yang dag 'od rab nyid las ston pa dang / 'khor gyi bye brag gi gzugs kyis sprul nas /
translated: There, the one called Śrī Vimalagarbha, having emanated in the form of the teacher and retinue from the very light of reality,

original: sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang / de bzhin du yang gdul bya la dgongs nas /
analyzed: sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang / de bzhin du yang gdul bya la dgongs nas /
translated: And likewise, with regard to the disciples,

original: rtsa'i dbus stong pa'i nam mkhas kyang bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rtsa'i dbus stong pa'i nam mkhas kyang bstan pa ni /
translated: the empty space in the middle of the channel is also taught.

original: der dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' mor bcas pa'i bzhugs gnas de ru'o //
analyzed: der dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' mor bcas pa'i bzhugs gnas de ru'o //
translated: There, in the abode of the great heroes and heroines,

original: de dpa' bo chen po byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dri med dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'khor mchog tu gyur pa dpa' bo dang / dpa' mo rnams kyang tshul ji lta ba bzhin bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tha @211a * //
analyzed: de dpa' bo chen po byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dri med dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'khor mchog tu gyur pa dpa' bo dang / dpa' mo rnams kyang tshul ji lta ba bzhin bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tha @211a * //
translated: there the supreme retinue of the great hero Bodhisattva Ākāśa-vimalā and so forth, the heroes and heroines, also abide in the proper manner.

original: tshig go ; /'dir de rnams kyi mtshan dang grangs bshad pa /
analyzed: tshig go ; /'dir de rnams kyi mtshan dang grangs bshad pa /
translated: Here, the names and number of those are explained.

original: dpal nam mkha' dri med dang / shin tu rtsal phye dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
analyzed: dpal nam mkha' dri med dang / shin tu rtsal phye dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
translated: The glorious Ākāśa-vimalā, Suviśālakāyā, and so forth are taught.

original: kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa'i don 'di rnams 'og nas gsungs pas 'dir rnam par bshad pa gsal bar ma byas so //
analyzed: kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa'i don 'di rnams 'og nas gsungs pas 'dir rnam par bshad pa gsal bar ma byas so //
translated: The meaning of the colors, shapes, and so forth will be explained below, so it is not clarified here.

original: de lta bu'i zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta bu'i zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Such means

original: mtshan dang grangs bstan pa ste de rnams so //
analyzed: mtshan dang grangs bstan pa ste de rnams so //
translated: The names and numbers are taught.

original: rab zhal la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: rab zhal la sogs pa ni /
translated: The heroines, etc.

original: dpal nam mkha' dri med la sogs pa'i dpa' bo bcu drug po rnams dang / dpa' bo sum cu gnyis po kun no //
analyzed: dpal nam mkha' dri med la sogs pa'i dpa' bo bcu drug po rnams dang / dpa' bo sum cu gnyis po kun no //
translated: are the sixteen heroes such as Śrī-Vimalākāśa, and all the thirty-two heroes.

original: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni /
translated: Their purities

original: 'khor lo bzhi po rnams so //
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi po rnams so //
translated: are the four wheels.

original: yang na dga' ba bcu drug po rnams so //
analyzed: yang na dga' ba bcu drug po rnams so //
translated: Or else, they are the sixteen joys.

original: phyir rim gyi dpa' mo bcu drug po'i rnam par dag pa ni yul lnga dang / 'byung ba lnga dang / ye shes dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / 'dod chags dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / gti mug dang ; de rnams rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: phyir rim gyi dpa' mo bcu drug po'i rnam par dag pa ni yul lnga dang / 'byung ba lnga dang / ye shes dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / 'dod chags dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / gti mug dang ; de rnams rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The purities of the sixteen heroines in reverse order are the five objects, the five elements, gnosis, the realm of phenomena, desire, envy, pride, and delusion.

original: ma mo'i btsun mo zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ma mo ni mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs so //
analyzed: ma mo'i btsun mo zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ma mo ni mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs so //
translated: The term “queen of the mātṛkās” means that the mātṛkās are the forms of the ḍākinīs.

original: btsun mo yang yin te /
analyzed: btsun mo yang yin te /
translated: They are also queens,

original: bcom ldan 'das dang / dpa' bo rnams kyis rol cing spyad pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dang / dpa' bo rnams kyis rol cing spyad pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: because they are the very ones who are the places of enjoyment and practice of the Bhagavān and the heroes.

original: bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba ni ;
analyzed: bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba ni ;
translated: Seventy-two times ten million means

original: rtsa phra mo bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnam par dag pa'i tshul de bzhin du 'dir yang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rtsa phra mo bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnam par dag pa'i tshul de bzhin du 'dir yang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: seventy-two times ten million subtle channels.

original: rtsa rnams kyi don de rnams kun gyi 'khor ni /
analyzed: rtsa rnams kyi don de rnams kun gyi 'khor ni /
translated: The meaning of the channels is the retinue of all of them.

original: bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis ma mo'i btsun mo mkha' 'gro ma'i grangs rnams so //
analyzed: bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis ma mo'i btsun mo mkha' 'gro ma'i grangs rnams so //
translated: The number of dakinis, the queen of the mother tantras, is seventy-two times ten million.

original: dbus ni mtha' gsal ba'o //
analyzed: dbus ni mtha' gsal ba'o //
translated: The center is the illumination of the end.

original: legs dgyes chen mo'i sbyor bas bzhugs pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: legs dgyes chen mo'i sbyor bas bzhugs pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The great one of good pleasure abides in union means

original: shes rab dang thabs kyi sbyor bas mnyes pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs kyi sbyor bas mnyes pa ste /
translated: the union of wisdom and method is pleasing.

original: yum phyag rgya chen po ni mtshungs pa gzhan dang mi mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: yum phyag rgya chen po ni mtshungs pa gzhan dang mi mtshungs pa'o //
translated: The consort, the great seal, is equal and unequal.

original: de yang dag par sbyor zhing rol pas mnyes pa ni /
analyzed: de yang dag par sbyor zhing rol pas mnyes pa ni /
translated: Further, the union and play that please

original: legs dgyes kyi bde bas myong ba'o //🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bka' stsal pas ni /
analyzed: legs dgyes kyi bde bas myong ba'o // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bka' stsal pas ni /
translated: are experienced with the bliss of good pleasure.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes pa'o //
translated: The Bhagavān spoke to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Devajña.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni gnyis su med pa'i yang dag pa bla na med pa'i byang chub la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni gnyis su med pa'i yang dag pa bla na med pa'i byang chub la spyod pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattva practices for the nondual, perfect, unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: de nyid kyi don byang chub tu thob pa la sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyi don byang chub tu thob pa la sems dpa' ni /
translated: The one who is courageous in mind with regard to attaining that very enlightenment is the bodhisattva.

original: byang chub @211b sems mi gtong bar sems shing yang dang yang du byang chub sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: byang chub @211b sems mi gtong bar sems shing yang dang yang du byang chub sems dpa' ste /
translated: The one who is courageous in mind with regard to not forsaking the mind of enlightenment is the bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: He is the bodhisattva.

original: 'gro ba'i bsam ba ji bzhin du don spyod nus shing mdzad ba ni sems dpa' chen po'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bsam ba ji bzhin du don spyod nus shing mdzad ba ni sems dpa' chen po'o //
translated: The one who is able to act for the welfare of beings in accordance with their thoughts is the great being.

original: byang chub kyi sems nyid lha yin la /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems nyid lha yin la /
translated: The mind of enlightenment itself is the deity.

original: de nyid la mnga' bas na lha dbang phyug go ;
analyzed: de nyid la mnga' bas na lha dbang phyug go ;
translated: Since he has mastery over that, he is the lord of deities.

original: /'di skad du /
analyzed: /'di skad du /
translated: It is said:

original: byang chub gnyis med ye shes te //
analyzed: byang chub gnyis med ye shes te //
translated: Enlightenment is nondual wisdom.

original: der sems mi gtod sems pa'o //
analyzed: der sems mi gtod sems pa'o //
translated: The one who is courageous in mind with regard to not focusing on that

original: gang der 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
analyzed: gang der 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
translated: is the one who acts for the welfare of beings there.

original: rin po che'i bzhin chen pos mdzad //
analyzed: rin po che'i bzhin chen pos mdzad //
translated: This is composed by the great precious one.

original: ces rgyud las gsungs so //
analyzed: ces rgyud las gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is stated in the tantra.

original: des na 'dir kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug ces bos nas /
analyzed: des na 'dir kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug ces bos nas /
translated: Therefore, here, having addressed “O bodhisattva, great being, lord of deities,”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to //
translated: The Bhagavān has spoken.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'gro ba gdul bya'i bsam pa la dgongs nas gsungs so //
analyzed: 'gro ba gdul bya'i bsam pa la dgongs nas gsungs so //
translated: It was spoken with the intention of the thoughts of the disciples of migrating beings.

original: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang / zla ba bde ba mchog gi dang / phyag rgya chen po'i dang / mtha'i ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang / zla ba bde ba mchog gi dang / phyag rgya chen po'i dang / mtha'i ste /
translated: The three realities, the nature of the three, the moon, supreme bliss, the great seal, and the limit—

original: de la rang gi ngo bo dang / rnam pa dang / tshad dang / dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig / ces gsungs pa la /
analyzed: de la rang gi ngo bo dang / rnam pa dang / tshad dang / dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig / ces gsungs pa la /
translated: Listen to the essence, the form, the measure, and the glory, renowned in the Drop of Wisdom.

original: de ltar dus kyi so so skye bo byis pa rnams yang dag pa'i don ni ma rtogs shing /
analyzed: de ltar dus kyi so so skye bo byis pa rnams yang dag pa'i don ni ma rtogs shing /
translated: Thus, ordinary beings, the childish, do not understand the meaning of reality.

original: rigs pa ngan pas sgro 'dogs pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa la ni dga'/
analyzed: rigs pa ngan pas sgro 'dogs pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa la ni dga'/
translated: They delight in the bad logic of superimposition and deprecation.

original: kha cig ni 'brel pa med par rgyud la sogs pa'i don bshad par yang byed /
analyzed: kha cig ni 'brel pa med par rgyud la sogs pa'i don bshad par yang byed /
translated: Some explain the meaning of the tantras and so on without connection.

original: de bzhin yang kha cig ni phyin ci log gi rtog pa dang / sgra dang rigs pa dang / nga rgyal gyis rgyud la sogs pa'i 'grel pa rtsom par byed cing grub pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang mi ldan pas dmyal bar 'gro'o //
analyzed: de bzhin yang kha cig ni phyin ci log gi rtog pa dang / sgra dang rigs pa dang / nga rgyal gyis rgyud la sogs pa'i 'grel pa rtsom par byed cing grub pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang mi ldan pas dmyal bar 'gro'o //
translated: Likewise, some, through mistaken ideas, words, reasoning, and pride, compose commentaries on the tantras and so forth, and because they lack qualities such as accomplishment, they go to hell.

original: de bas na kho bos de rnams la bsams te /🔽'dir kha cig gis gzhung bkod pa ni /
analyzed: de bas na kho bos de rnams la bsams te / 'dir kha cig gis gzhung bkod pa ni /
translated: Therefore, I, having thought about those,🔽here explain the text as it is,

original: don ji bzhin du bdag gis bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: don ji bzhin du bdag gis bshad par bya'o //
translated: by some who have set forth a text.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: 'grel bshad med par mdor bsdus rgyud //
analyzed: 'grel bshad med par mdor bsdus rgyud //

original: rigs pa ngan pas 'chad par byed //🔽gzhan gyi chung ma nor zas la //
analyzed: rigs pa ngan pas 'chad par byed // gzhan gyi chung ma nor zas la //

original: sred bskyed nas ni dmyal bar 'gro //
analyzed: sred bskyed nas ni dmyal bar 'gro //
translated: of others' wives, one goes to hell.

original: de bzhin du yang /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang /
translated: And likewise:

original: grub dang yon tan med par ni /
analyzed: grub dang yon tan med par ni /
translated: Without accomplishment and qualities,

original: kha cig 'grel bshad sogs byed cing //
analyzed: kha cig 'grel bshad sogs byed cing //
translated: some compose commentaries and so forth,

original: sgra dang rtog gi nga rgyal gyis //
analyzed: sgra dang rtog gi nga rgyal gyis //
translated: through the pride of words and concepts,

original: rnal 'byor spyod las nyams par byed //🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor spyod las nyams par byed // ces gsungs so //
translated: depriving themselves of the practice of yoga.

original: de la gzhan dag ni /
analyzed: de la gzhan dag ni /
translated: Regarding that, others say:
This is not the case.

analyzed: skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na / bcom ldan 'das zhes gsungs pa dang / de kho na nyid gsum la sogs par sbyar te /

original: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid ni /🔽ae wam la y'a zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid ni / ae wam la y'a zhes bya bas bstan te /

analyzed: rgyud dang sdud pa por 'brel pas na'o / yang na 'dir mthun par ae wam ma y'a zhes bya'o // thos pa ni zla ba bde mchog go //
translated: The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.

original: thos pa ni sdud pa po'i myong ba'i mtshan nyid can no //🔽de bzhin du zla ba bde mchog kyang bstan no //🔽dus ni phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid de /🔽mtshan ma'i dngos po thams cad dang bral /
analyzed: thos pa ni sdud pa po'i myong ba'i mtshan nyid can no // de bzhin du zla ba bde mchog kyang bstan no // dus ni phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid de / mtshan ma'i dngos po thams cad dang bral /
translated: The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.

analyzed: bsam du med pa'i dus phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.

original: de gnyis dbyer med par gcig pa'o //
analyzed: de gnyis dbyer med par gcig pa'o //
translated: The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.🔽 The word heard is connected with the three realities and so forth.

original: mtha' zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das so //🔽spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: mtha' zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das so //🔽spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad las ring du song bas na /
translated: The word heard is connected with the three realities

original: mtha' dang dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' dang dbyer med pa'o //
translated: And it is the end, which is indivisible.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: 'di skad bdag gis de nyid gsum //
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis de nyid gsum //
translated: Thus, I have heard the three realities

original: bdag nyid dang yang bcas pa ste //
analyzed: bdag nyid dang yang bcas pa ste //
translated: Together with myself.🔽The meaning of the hearing is the supreme moon,

original: thos pa'i don ni zla bde mchog / dus ni phyag rgya chen po ste //
analyzed: thos pa'i don ni zla bde mchog / dus ni phyag rgya chen po ste //
translated: The time is the great seal,

original: bcom ldan 'das ni mtha' zhes bya //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni mtha' zhes bya //
translated: And the Bhagavat is the end.

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / de bas na de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa dang / dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig ces 'grel pas /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / de bas na de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa dang / dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig ces 'grel pas /
translated: And so, the commentary says, listen to the three realities and so forth, and the glorious Essence of Pristine Awareness.

original: don de bzhin bshad zer ro //
analyzed: don de bzhin bshad zer ro //
translated: This is the meaning explained.

original: kha cig ni de la de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa bya ba ni /
analyzed: kha cig ni de la de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa bya ba ni /
translated: Some say that the three realities and so forth are

original: cha la sogs pa'i sbyor ba drug dang gcig pa nyid yan lag sbyor ba drug po ni /
analyzed: cha la sogs pa'i sbyor ba drug dang gcig pa nyid yan lag sbyor ba drug po ni /
translated: The six applications of parts and so forth, and the six applications of the single nature.

original: dpal ye shes thig ler bshad do //
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig ler bshad do //
translated: These are explained in the glorious Essence of Pristine Awareness.

original: yang ji skad du /
analyzed: yang ji skad du /
translated: And as it is said:

original: cha dang thig le dang ni tshul //
analyzed: cha dang thig le dang ni tshul //
translated: Parts, bindus, and modes

original: de nyid gsum bdag bstan pa yin //
analyzed: de nyid gsum bdag bstan pa yin //
translated: Are taught to be the three realities.

original: tshul tsam zla ba bde ba mchog / phyag rgya chen po 'dir ni mchog / de yi mtha' ni mchog gzhan no //
analyzed: tshul tsam zla ba bde ba mchog / phyag rgya chen po 'dir ni mchog / de yi mtha' ni mchog gzhan no //
translated: and its limit is the other supreme.

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / yang le'u gzhan las /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / yang le'u gzhan las /
translated: And in another chapter:

original: shr'i ni gzhan min 'dir ni cha //
analyzed: shr'i ni gzhan min 'dir ni cha //
translated: The Śrī is not other, here is the part.

original: dzny'a zhes bya ba thig ler bstan //
analyzed: dzny'a zhes bya ba thig ler bstan //
translated: The jñā is taught to be the drop.

original: na yi yig 'bru tshul yin te //🔽ti yi yig 'bru tshul tsam mo //
analyzed: na yi yig 'bru tshul yin te // ti yi yig 'bru tshul tsam mo //
translated: The na letter is the mode,🔽the ti letter is the mere mode.

original: la yi yig 'bru mchog tu bshad //
analyzed: la yi yig 'bru mchog tu bshad //
translated: The la letter is explained as supreme.

original: ka yi mchog gzhan zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ka yi mchog gzhan zhes pa'o //
translated: The ka is the other supreme.

original: zhes gsungs pa'o //🔽de kho na nyid gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /🔽dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'o // de kho na nyid gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas / dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig ces bya ba ni /
translated: Thus it is said.🔽The three realities and so on up to listen to the glorious wisdom drop are explained as follows.

original: de bzhin bshad dgos zer ro //🔽yang kha @212b cig na re /🔽rgyud 'di dbu zhabs kyi don gyi snying po ni de kho na nyid bcu yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin bshad dgos zer ro // yang kha @212b cig na re / rgyud 'di dbu zhabs kyi don gyi snying po ni de kho na nyid bcu yin la /
translated: The three realities are the three vajras.🔽The three vajras are the three kāyas.🔽The three kāyas are the three seed syllables.

original: 'di rnams sbyor ba drug tu 'dus la /🔽de rnams ni brjod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams sbyor ba drug tu 'dus la / de rnams ni brjod pa'o //
translated: The three seed syllables are the three syllables.

original: brjod pa las brjod par bya ba rnyed par 'gyur /
analyzed: brjod pa las brjod par bya ba rnyed par 'gyur /
translated: The three syllables are the three syllables.🔽The three syllables are the three syllables.🔽The three syllables are the three syllables.

original: de bas na de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa dang / dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig ces pa 'grel de skad du yang /
analyzed: de bas na de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa dang / dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig ces pa 'grel de skad du yang /
translated: Therefore, listen to the meaning of the three realities and so forth, and the glorious Essence of Pristine Awareness.

original: de nyid sum cu drug bdag po //
analyzed: de nyid sum cu drug bdag po //
translated: The thirty-six realities are

original: cha yi ye shes tshor byed de //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
analyzed: cha yi ye shes tshor byed de // zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
translated: the pristine awareness of the parts, the experiencer.

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa nas rgyas par bstan pa de'i phyir na /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa nas rgyas par bstan pa de'i phyir na /
translated: This and so forth is extensively taught in the twenty-sixth chapter.

original: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa'i don de bzhin du bshad dgos zer ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa'i don de bzhin du bshad dgos zer ro //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the three realities and so forth must be explained in that way.

original: yang la la dag na re /
analyzed: yang la la dag na re /
translated: Again, some say:

original: de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i don ni /
analyzed: de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i don ni /
translated: The meaning of the three realities and so forth

original: 'dir skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'dir skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
translated: is connected to the nidāna, “Thus have I heard at one time,”🔽and explained as follows:

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gleng gzhi dang sbyar la bshad de /🔽bcom ldan 'das yan chad sngar bshad pa dang mthun no //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gleng gzhi dang sbyar la bshad de / bcom ldan 'das yan chad sngar bshad pa dang mthun no // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni /
translated: The Bhagavān, the tathāgata, and so on are as explained above.

original: zla ba bde mchog go //
analyzed: zla ba bde mchog go //
translated: All tathāgatas is the supreme moon.

original: byang chub kyi sems dbyer med pa'i gzugs ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems dbyer med pa'i gzugs ni /
translated: The form of indivisible bodhicitta🔽is the supreme sun.

original: mchog tu zab pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu zab pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bsdus pa'o //
translated: That is the most profound essence of the Tathagatas.

original: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
translated: Therefore, it is all the Tathagatas.

original: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The nature of the three realities is

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs snying po rdo rje'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs snying po rdo rje'o //
translated: the essence of body, speech, and mind, the vajra.

original: zla ba bde mchog ni dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' mo dbang phyug ma yang yin te /
analyzed: zla ba bde mchog ni dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' mo dbang phyug ma yang yin te /
translated: The supreme bliss of the moon is the great hero and the powerful lady of the hero.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dpa' bo la sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yin pas so //
analyzed: dpa' bo la sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yin pas so //
translated: The hero and so forth are the bodhisattvas.

original: de bas byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: de bas byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: Therefore, the bodhisattva

original: byang chub kyi sems dpa' yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems dpa' yin no //
translated: is the one with the mind of enlightenment.

original: phyag rgya chen po ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes chen po'i don rdo rje chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes chen po'i don rdo rje chos kyi sku'o //
translated: The great wisdom of nondual identity of all is the meaning of the vajra dharma body of the great seal.

original: bsod nams dang snying rje'i dbang gis snying po'i gzugs kyis so //
analyzed: bsod nams dang snying rje'i dbang gis snying po'i gzugs kyis so //
translated: By the power of merit and compassion, it is the form of the essence.

original: de'i mtha' ni bzhugs gnas chos kyi 'byung gnas gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i mtha' ni bzhugs gnas chos kyi 'byung gnas gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Its limit is the abode, the immeasurable palace of the source of phenomena.

original: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni drug pa'i sgra dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni drug pa'i sgra dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The phrase the nature of the three realities and so on is accompanied by the word sixth.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: Thus, it says:

original: de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma las ni sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma las ni sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
translated: The Lamp of Reality is as taught previously.

original: 'dir le'u gnyis pa las /
analyzed: 'dir le'u gnyis pa las /
translated: Here, in the second chapter, it says:

original: de nyid gsum ni sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: de nyid gsum ni sku gsung thugs //
translated: The three realities are body, speech, and mind.

original: rdo rje gsum ni ye shes @213a * //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni ye shes @213a * //
translated: The three vajras are the supreme wisdom.

original: mchog ; zla ba bde ba mchog gis gang //
analyzed: mchog ; zla ba bde ba mchog gis gang //
translated: The moon is filled with supreme bliss.

original: de ni phung po dbang po khams //
analyzed: de ni phung po dbang po khams //
translated: That is the aggregates, faculties, and elements.

original: phyag rgya chen po rdor snying po //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po rdor snying po //
translated: The great seal is the essence of vajra mind.

original: de yi mtha' ni bha gar bshad //
analyzed: de yi mtha' ni bha gar bshad //
translated: Its limit is explained as the bhaga.

original: ces gsungs pas na /
analyzed: ces gsungs pas na /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de'i don gleng gzhi dang / de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma dang / le'u gnyis pa'i gzhung gis don rgyas par bshad par bya dgos zer ro //
analyzed: de'i don gleng gzhi dang / de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma dang / le'u gnyis pa'i gzhung gis don rgyas par bshad par bya dgos zer ro //
translated: Therefore, it is said that its meaning should be explained extensively by the nidana, the Lamp of Reality, and the text of the second chapter.

original: de rnams kyi rang rang gi gzhung la gzhan dad pa srid pas ma bkag pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rang rang gi gzhung la gzhan dad pa srid pas ma bkag pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Since it is possible that others have faith in those texts, they are not refuted, as before.

original: 'on kyang kho bo ni mi 'thad de /
analyzed: 'on kyang kho bo ni mi 'thad de /
translated: However, I do not agree.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don rgyas par bshad de /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don rgyas par bshad de /
translated: The meaning of what the Lord has said is explained in detail.

original: 'dir de rnams dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: 'dir de rnams dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
translated: Here, it is not in accord with those.

original: de bas na rgyud la 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bas na rgyud la 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, because there is no connection with the tantra.

original: bla ma'i man ngag gis bshad pa 'di gnyis kyi le'u gnyis pa dang bcas pa 'di ni bdag gi 'dud pa dang 'jug par 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: bla ma'i man ngag gis bshad pa 'di gnyis kyi le'u gnyis pa dang bcas pa 'di ni bdag gi 'dud pa dang 'jug par 'thad pa yin no //
translated: These two explanations by the guru's instructions, along with the second chapter, are reasonable for my homage and engagement.

original: yang la la 'di ltar sems par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang la la 'di ltar sems par 'gyur te /
translated: Again, someone might think like this:

original: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa gsungs pa ni don dam pa spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba nyid yin pas //
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa gsungs pa ni don dam pa spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba nyid yin pas //
translated: Since the statement of the three suchnesses and so forth is the ultimate, the complete pacification of all elaborations,🔽what is the point of the Lord's statement of the aspects, measure, and essence of the conventional?

original: de la kun rdzob kyi rnam pa dang tshad dang ngo bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ci snyam mo bar dpyod du dogs pa'i bsam pa bslang ste /
analyzed: de la kun rdzob kyi rnam pa dang tshad dang ngo bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ci snyam mo bar dpyod du dogs pa'i bsam pa bslang ste /
translated: The thought of doubt is raised, and

original: 'di'i don gsal bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di'i don gsal bar bya ba ni /
translated: the meaning of this is clarified.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i dbang phyug mtshan ma la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i chos rnams kun gyis mgos pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i dbang phyug mtshan ma la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i chos rnams kun gyis mgos pa ni /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva Divyamaṇi said, “The bodhisattva mahāsattva who is not covered by the phenomena of conceptual thoughts such as signs,

original: dpal ye shes thig le yin na /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le yin na /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva Divākara, who is the lord of the gods, is the glorious Essence of Pristine Awareness, who is free from all conceptual phenomena, such as signs.

original: de la rnam pa la sogs pa mtshan nyid kun rdzob tu gsungs pas /
analyzed: de la rnam pa la sogs pa mtshan nyid kun rdzob tu gsungs pas /
translated: Since the characteristics of the aspects and so on are said to be relative,

original: sa la lta zhing cang mi gsung bar 'dug go zhes bshad do //
analyzed: sa la lta zhing cang mi gsung bar 'dug go zhes bshad do //
translated: he looked at the ground and remained silent.”

original: de'i dus na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa mtshan ma'i bden par mtshan ma'i bden pa rnam par rtog pa spangs pa yin yang /
analyzed: de'i dus na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa mtshan ma'i bden par mtshan ma'i bden pa rnam par rtog pa spangs pa yin yang /
translated: At that time, and so on, means that although the ultimate truth is free from the conceptual signs of the truth of signs,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis su med pa'i don la dgongs nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis su med pa'i don la dgongs nas /
translated: the Bhagavān, intending the meaning of nonduality,

original: zhu ba po la sogs pas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: zhu ba po la sogs pas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to make the questioner and so on understand,

original: rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul bstan pa ni /
translated: displayed miracles and wonders.

original: nam mkha' dngos po med pa'i stong pa las /
analyzed: nam mkha' dngos po med pa'i stong pa las /
translated: From the empty, signless sky,

original: dngos po can gyi me tog sna tshogs pa dang / dri chen po dang ldan pa'i me tog dang / rin po che la sogs pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid mngon par sprul nas /
analyzed: dngos po can gyi me tog sna tshogs pa dang / dri chen po dang ldan pa'i me tog dang / rin po che la sogs pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid mngon par sprul nas /
translated: Having emanated the various flowers with substance, the flowers with great fragrance, and the conventional characteristics of jewels, etc.,

original: char bzhin nyid la nyid kyis zhabs kyi rtsa ba la sogs pa drung du sprul nas bab par mdzad do //
analyzed: char bzhin nyid la nyid kyis zhabs kyi rtsa ba la sogs pa drung du sprul nas bab par mdzad do //
translated: he himself rained down upon his own feet, etc., like rain.

original: yang @213b bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: yang @213b bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Again, the Blessed One, etc.

original: sngar bos par ma zad da ltar yang bos nas /
analyzed: sngar bos par ma zad da ltar yang bos nas /
translated: Not only did he call out before, but he also calls out now.

original: khyod ci yang lan ni smra bar 'dug pa /
analyzed: khyod ci yang lan ni smra bar 'dug pa /
translated: You are sitting there, not saying anything in reply.

original: ci zhig la ya mtshan du 'gyur ba yin zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ci zhig la ya mtshan du 'gyur ba yin zhes pa'i don to //
translated: What is it that you are amazed at?

original: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Lord of the Gods said, etc.

original: rdo rje 'dzin la sngar gyi don la gsol pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin la sngar gyi don la gsol pa'o //
translated: To Vajradhara, he made a request about the previous matter.

original: de la rang gi ngo bo dang / rnam pa dang / tshad yod dam ci zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la rang gi ngo bo dang / rnam pa dang / tshad yod dam ci zhes bya ba ni /
translated: There, Do you have an essence, a form, and a size? means

original: rtog pa dang / mtshan ma la sogs pa'i dngos po dang bral ba'i don dam pa'i bde ba chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de la kun rdzob kyi rnam pa la sogs pa yod dam ci ;
analyzed: rtog pa dang / mtshan ma la sogs pa'i dngos po dang bral ba'i don dam pa'i bde ba chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de la kun rdzob kyi rnam pa la sogs pa yod dam ci ;
translated: Is that ultimate reality, which is the nature of all phenomena, the same as the relative, which is the nature of all phenomena?

original: de la bdag lha'i dbang phyug ya mtshan skyed par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la bdag lha'i dbang phyug ya mtshan skyed par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The Lord of the gods was amazed by this.

original: ae ma'o // lha'i dbang phyug ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ae ma'o // lha'i dbang phyug ces bya ba ni /
translated: The Lord of the gods said, Amazing!

original: rdo rje 'dzin pas dbang phyug dam pa sbyin par mdzad nas byis pa so so'i skye bo'i don la bskul ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pas dbang phyug dam pa sbyin par mdzad nas byis pa so so'i skye bo'i don la bskul ba'o //
translated: The Vajra Holder, having bestowed the supreme lordship, exhorts for the sake of the childish ordinary beings.

original: dkon mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid thugs yang dag pa'i rdo rje ni mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid thugs yang dag pa'i rdo rje ni mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The supreme Vajra Holder is the mind of the Three Jewels, the true vajra.

original: 'di gsungs zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i don gtan la dbab ste /
analyzed: 'di gsungs zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i don gtan la dbab ste /
translated: This is said to be the ascertainment of the meaning of reality and so forth.

original: chos can gyis chos nyid dam pa bsgrub dgos pas na med dam ci zhes so //
analyzed: chos can gyis chos nyid dam pa bsgrub dgos pas na med dam ci zhes so //
translated: Since the supreme reality must be established by the bearer of reality, it is asked, Is it non-existent?

original: de ltar yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Thus, it is said, In that case,...

original: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa la /
translated: In the three realities and so on,

original: de rang gi ngo bo dang / rnam pa dang / tshad kyis lha'i dbang phyug ya mtshan skyer rung ba'o //
analyzed: de rang gi ngo bo dang / rnam pa dang / tshad kyis lha'i dbang phyug ya mtshan skyer rung ba'o //
translated: the deity is worthy of wonder through its essence, its aspects, and its measure.

original: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams kun ni chos thams cad do //
analyzed: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams kun ni chos thams cad do //
translated: All phenomena of cyclic existence and nirvana are all phenomena.

original: de'i chos nyid ngo bo nyid kyang de yin la //
analyzed: de'i chos nyid ngo bo nyid kyang de yin la //
translated: The reality of those is also that.

original: stong pa nyid kyang de yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang de yin /
translated: It is also emptiness.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa yang de nyid do //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa yang de nyid do //
translated: It is also the ultimate truth.

original: stong pa nyid 'di kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam la ma brten par shes par gal 'gyur te mi 'gyur ro zhes so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid 'di kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam la ma brten par shes par gal 'gyur te mi 'gyur ro zhes so //
translated: This emptiness is not to be understood without relying on mere illusion-like conventionalities, and it is not to be understood without relying on mere optical illusions.

original: de'i phyir mig yor tsam zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir mig yor tsam zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said to be like an optical illusion.

original: yang dag pa ma yin la kun rdzob sgyu ma dang / mig yor dang sprul pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin la kun rdzob sgyu ma dang / mig yor dang sprul pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is not real, but it is a conventional illusion, an optical illusion, a magical creation, and so on.

original: tsam gyi sgras sgyu ma nyid rang bzhin med par bstan to //
analyzed: tsam gyi sgras sgyu ma nyid rang bzhin med par bstan to //
translated: The word “mere” indicates that the illusion itself is essenceless.

original: rgyu ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes spros pa med pa'i rgyu de rang rten du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes spros pa med pa'i rgyu de rang rten du shes par bya'o //
translated: The cause is to be understood as the basis of the cause of the non-conceptual wisdom of emptiness.

original: ji skad du //🔽de nyid tshol la thog mar ni //
analyzed: ji skad du // de nyid tshol la thog mar ni //
translated: As it is said:🔽For one who seeks reality,

original: thams cad yod ces brjod par bya //
analyzed: thams cad yod ces brjod par bya //
translated: at first all is said to exist.

original: don dam rtogs shing chags med nas //
analyzed: don dam rtogs shing chags med nas //
translated: But when one realizes the ultimate and is free from attachment,

original: de yi 'og tu dben pa'o //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de yi 'og tu dben pa'o // zhes gsungs so //
translated: then afterwards it is void.

original: kun rdzob @214a * //🔽sgyu ma tsham gyi chos can chos la brten nas /
analyzed: kun rdzob @214a * // sgyu ma tsham gyi chos can chos la brten nas /
translated: The conventional is the basis for the refutation of the ultimate.

original: stong pa nyid bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid bsgrub pa'o //
translated: The ultimate is established on the basis of the conventional, which is the illusory, magical world.

original: chos thams cad zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kun no //
analyzed: chos thams cad zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kun no //
translated: All phenomena are either defiled or undefiled.

original: ji ltar gal rtsi la brten ni dri gang yin rnyed par 'gyur gyi zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ji ltar gal rtsi la brten ni dri gang yin rnyed par 'gyur gyi zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Just as the scent of the flower

original: gla rtsi dang dri gcig pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: gla rtsi dang dri gcig pa yang ma yin /
translated: is not the same as or different from the flower,🔽so is the ultimate reality of all things.🔽Just as the scent of the flower is not the same as the flower,🔽but is not different from it,

original: tha dad pa yang ma yin te 'on kyang gla rtsi dngos po med par dri ga las rnyed //
analyzed: tha dad pa yang ma yin te 'on kyang gla rtsi dngos po med par dri ga las rnyed //
translated: and yet the scent is not found in the absence of the flower,

original: rgyu dang ldan pa la thabs kyis rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang ldan pa la thabs kyis rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: but is found by means of the flower,🔽so is the ultimate reality of all things.

original: de med par zhes bya ba ni gal rtsi'i dngos po med par mi rnyed do //
analyzed: de med par zhes bya ba ni gal rtsi'i dngos po med par mi rnyed do //
translated: The scent is not found in the absence of the flower.

original: rnyed par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnyed par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
translated: How is it found?

original: dngos po med par dri mi rnyed de /
analyzed: dngos po med par dri mi rnyed de /
translated: One cannot smell a scent without a substance.

original: rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has no cause.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni don ston pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni don ston pa yin te /
translated: Thus, it is taught that the meaning is like that.

original: rang gi ngo bo dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: As for the statement “own nature,” etc.,

original: ji ltar gal rtsi las dri rnyed pa bzhin /
analyzed: ji ltar gal rtsi las dri rnyed pa bzhin /
translated: it is like the scent that is obtained from the sandalwood.

original: kun rdzob kyi thabs la brten nas don dam pa rnyed par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi thabs la brten nas don dam pa rnyed par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: The ultimate is obtained in dependence on the conventional method, but not otherwise.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: thabs ma yin pas ring ba dang // thabs kyis ring ba ma yin ba //
analyzed: thabs ma yin pas ring ba dang // thabs kyis ring ba ma yin ba //
translated: Far from the non-method, not far from the method,

original: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas te //
analyzed: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas te //
translated: through compassion, one does not abide in peace,

original: zhes rab srid la mi gnas so //
analyzed: zhes rab srid la mi gnas so //
translated: and through wisdom, one does not abide in existence.

original: zhes bya ba bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: Thus, it is explained.

original: des nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: des nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: As for the statement “then,” etc.,

original: lnga dpe'i don gyis bstan pa la bsnyag go //
analyzed: lnga dpe'i don gyis bstan pa la bsnyag go //
translated: it is taught by way of the meaning of the five examples.

original: khyab dang khyab byed bye brag tu //
analyzed: khyab dang khyab byed bye brag tu //
translated: As for the statement “pervasiveness and the particular of the pervader,”

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: it is as follows.

original: ji ltar shing dang sha pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar shing dang sha pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa bzhin du /
translated: Just as the characteristics of wood and sandalwood are taught,

original: don dam pa'i bden pa spros pa dang bral bas /
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa spros pa dang bral bas /
translated: the ultimate truth is free from elaborations.

original: kun rdzob kyi dngos po la khyab pas khyab byed kyi don ni zlas bye'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi dngos po la khyab pas khyab byed kyi don ni zlas bye'o //
translated: The meaning of the pervasion by pervading the things of the relative is the🔽reciprocal.

original: mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa'i phyogs kyis dkri bar bya ste /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa'i phyogs kyis dkri bar bya ste /
translated: One should be instructed by the side of sign and signlessness.

original: tha dad pa'i chos bgrang ba ni /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i chos bgrang ba ni /
translated: The enumeration of different dharmas

original: bye brag mang po'i don to //
analyzed: bye brag mang po'i don to //
translated: is the meaning of many distinctions.

original: de rnams thams cad dbyer med pas na gnyis su med bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: de rnams thams cad dbyer med pas na gnyis su med bde ba chen po'o //
translated: Since all of those are inseparable, there is nondual great bliss.

original: bde ba sku la brten pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bde ba sku la brten pa'i phyir //
translated: Since bliss is based on the kāya,

original: zhes bya ba ni /🔽kun rdzob phyogs kyis bstan pa'i sku'i dngos po la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni / kun rdzob phyogs kyis bstan pa'i sku'i dngos po la /
translated: the meaning of the statement🔽“the ultimate is based on the relative”🔽is that since the great nondual pristine consciousness is based on the🔽entity of the kāya that is taught by the side of the relative, it is attained as

original: don dam pa de bzhin du brten pas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes chen po de kho na nyid bsgrub bya thob par 'gyur bas na /
