analyzed: don dam pa de bzhin du brten pas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes chen po de kho na nyid bsgrub bya thob par 'gyur bas na /
translated: the object to be accomplished.

original: sku la brten na de nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: sku la brten na de nyid 'gyur //
translated: Since it is based on the kāya, it is

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: suchness.

original: sku la brten pa ni thabs kyis rab tu bstan pa'o //
analyzed: sku la brten pa ni thabs kyis rab tu bstan pa'o //
translated: “Based on the kāya” is taught by the method.

original: sku bde rnam par shes yin no //
analyzed: sku bde rnam par shes yin no //
translated: The kāya is bliss, and consciousness is the object.

original: thams cad gnyis su med pa'i dngos //
analyzed: thams cad gnyis su med pa'i dngos //
translated: All things are nondual.

original: zhes bya ba ni phyogs gnyis pa'i chos rnams bsdus te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyogs gnyis pa'i chos rnams bsdus te /
translated: This includes the dharmas of the second part.

original: bye brag @214b gnyis brtags pa thams cad gnyis su med par zung du 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: bye brag @214b gnyis brtags pa thams cad gnyis su med par zung du 'jug pa'o //
translated: All the examinations of the two distinctions are the non-dual union.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das //
translated: Samsara and nirvana

original: rtog pa gnyis po spangs pas ni /
analyzed: rtog pa gnyis po spangs pas ni /
translated: are abandoned by the two concepts.

original: gang du dngos po gcig gyur pa //
analyzed: gang du dngos po gcig gyur pa //
translated: Where there is a single entity,

original: de ni zung 'jug ces byar bstan //🔽ces bshad do //
analyzed: de ni zung 'jug ces byar bstan // ces bshad do //
translated: that is taught as the union.

original: drug gi bde ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: drug gi bde ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The bliss of the six

original: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid la sogs pa der bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid la sogs pa der bstan pa'o //
translated: is taught there in the nature of the three realities and so forth.

original: ye shes mchog ces bya ba ni spros pa dang bral ba'i dga' ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: ye shes mchog ces bya ba ni spros pa dang bral ba'i dga' ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The supreme wisdom is the wisdom of the non-dual joy free from conceptual elaborations.

original: 'o na de gang gis rnyed par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de gang gis rnyed par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Now, by what is that attained?

original: sku dang bde ba gnyis las 'byung //
analyzed: sku dang bde ba gnyis las 'byung //
translated: It arises from the two, the body and bliss.

original: zhes sngar bstan par byas so ;
analyzed: zhes sngar bstan par byas so ;
translated: This was taught earlier.

original: / de nas sbyor ba drug gi don gsungs pa //
analyzed: / de nas sbyor ba drug gi don gsungs pa //
translated: Then the meaning of the six practices is taught:

original: 'khor lo drug gi dbus na gnas //
analyzed: 'khor lo drug gi dbus na gnas //
translated: Abiding in the middle of the six chakras

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: bde ba chen po la sogs pa drug ni lte ba'i nang gi dbus su //
analyzed: bde ba chen po la sogs pa drug ni lte ba'i nang gi dbus su //
translated: The six, such as great bliss, are in the center of the navel.🔽

original: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa'i sbyor ba drug bzhugs pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa'i sbyor ba drug bzhugs pa'i gnas so //
translated: The six, beginning with great bliss, are the locations of the six yogas, beginning with the three realities, in the center of the navel cakra.

original: dang po gsum ni rgyu las ye shes can ri bong can gyi rim ba skye ba ni 'bras bu'i bdag nyid mchog go //
analyzed: dang po gsum ni rgyu las ye shes can ri bong can gyi rim ba skye ba ni 'bras bu'i bdag nyid mchog go //
translated: The first three are the supreme nature of the result, which is the arising of the possessor of gnosis from the cause, the sequence of the rabbit-holder.

original: phan tshun 'brel pas na /
analyzed: phan tshun 'brel pas na /
translated: Since they are mutually related,

original: lus rten srog gi dbyug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: lus rten srog gi dbyug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: the body is the support of the staff of life, and so on.

original: lus la srog rten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus la srog rten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The body is the support of life.

original: yang na srog la lus rten pa'o //
analyzed: yang na srog la lus rten pa'o //
translated: Or, life is the support of the body.

original: thigs pa dang bcas de rnams sbyor ;
analyzed: thigs pa dang bcas de rnams sbyor ;
translated: The union of those with the bindu

original: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: and so on.

original: byang chub kyi sems ga bur dang bcas nas rtog med ma dang / rlung ro gcig tu gyur pa'i rim pas sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems ga bur dang bcas nas rtog med ma dang / rlung ro gcig tu gyur pa'i rim pas sbyor ba'o //
translated: The bodhicitta with camphor is the union in the sequence of the single taste of the vāyu and nonconceptual wisdom.

original: srog ni rlung dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems /
analyzed: srog ni rlung dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems /
translated: The life vāyu is the bodhicitta endowed with the vāyu.

original: yang na dbyug pa'i sgras /
analyzed: yang na dbyug pa'i sgras /
translated: Or, the term “staff”

original: srog ma'i rtsa ka pa'i gzugs kyis 'khor lo rnams kyi dbus na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: srog ma'i rtsa ka pa'i gzugs kyis 'khor lo rnams kyi dbus na gnas pa'o //
translated: refers to the rasanā, which is in the center of the cakras in the form of the ka.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: lus rten srog gi dbyug pa la //
analyzed: lus rten srog gi dbyug pa la //
translated: the staff of life is in the body.

original: zhes bya'o // nang du'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // nang du'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Inwardly means

original: 'dzin ma dang ro ma g-yas g-yon de gnyis kyi dbus su'o //
analyzed: 'dzin ma dang ro ma g-yas g-yon de gnyis kyi dbus su'o //
translated: in the middle of the two, the lalanā and rasanā, on the right and left.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems kyi lam ni gsum ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems kyi lam ni gsum ste /
translated: Likewise, the path of bodhicitta is threefold:

original: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'o //
analyzed: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'o //
translated: outer, inner, and secret.

original: phyi ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rten dang / brten pa'i bdag nyid kun du sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: phyi ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rten dang / brten pa'i bdag nyid kun du sbyor ba'o //
translated: The outer is the union of the support and the supported, such as the cakras.

original: nang gi rlung dang byang chub sems la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi rlung dang byang chub sems la spyod pa'o //
translated: The inner is the practice of the winds and bodhicitta.

original: gsang ba ni ye shes la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni ye shes la spyod pa'o //
translated: The secret is the practice of gnosis.

original: de bzhin du yang ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang ni /
translated: Also,

original: ye shes skyes pa'i lam ni bzhi //
analyzed: ye shes skyes pa'i lam ni bzhi //
translated: the path of the arising of gnosis is fourfold:

original: srog ma las dga' ro ma mchog /'dzin @215a * //🔽ma las ni bral ba'i mchog / rtog med rang bzhin dga' ba'i lam //
analyzed: srog ma las dga' ro ma mchog /'dzin @215a * // ma las ni bral ba'i mchog / rtog med rang bzhin dga' ba'i lam //
translated: The lalanā is the path of joy, the rasanā is the path of supreme joy,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: the avadhūti is the path of the joy of separation, and the path of innate joy is nonconceptual.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: Also,

original: cha yi sbyor ba nang du min //
analyzed: cha yi sbyor ba nang du min //
translated: the union is not in the inner.

original: nang du de ni rtog med na /
analyzed: nang du de ni rtog med na /
translated: If it is not in the inner, it is nonconceptual.

original: g-yas g-yon mdud pa'i nang du ni /
analyzed: g-yas g-yon mdud pa'i nang du ni /
translated: In the middle of the knots of the right and left,

original: ro ma dang ni 'dzin ma gnas //
analyzed: ro ma dang ni 'dzin ma gnas //
translated: The rasana and the lalana are located🔽

original: zhes bshad do //
analyzed: zhes bshad do //
translated: The rasanā and lalanā are located there.

original: de bzhin du gsum du dbye ba dang bzhir dbye ba yang gsum gyi don to //
analyzed: de bzhin du gsum du dbye ba dang bzhir dbye ba yang gsum gyi don to //
translated: Thus, the three divisions and the four divisions are also the meaning of the three.

original: de'i don ni bde chen 'khor lo'i lte ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i don ni bde chen 'khor lo'i lte ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The meaning of that is the center of the great-bliss wheel, and so on.

original: bde chen ni byang chub sems kun rdzob dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bde chen ni byang chub sems kun rdzob dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Great bliss is the relative bodhicitta.

original: 'khor lo ni 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
translated: The wheel is the thirty-two petals.

original: lte ba ni gong du bshad par byas so //
analyzed: lte ba ni gong du bshad par byas so //
translated: The center was explained above.

original: ri bong can gyi byang chub kyi sems bde ba dang rtsa dang ldan pa ni zla ba rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: ri bong can gyi byang chub kyi sems bde ba dang rtsa dang ldan pa ni zla ba rgyas pa'o //
translated: The full moon is the full bodhicitta of the rabbit, endowed with bliss and nāḍīs.

original: rtsa dang rgyas pa dang srog gi rlung dang ldan pa ni bcas pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa dang rgyas pa dang srog gi rlung dang ldan pa ni bcas pa'o //
translated: Endowed with nāḍīs, fullness, and the prāṇa vāyu, it is complete.

original: sbyor ba drug gi dang po ni thog ma'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba drug gi dang po ni thog ma'o //
translated: The first of the six yogas is the beginning.

original: zur gsum gyi dbyibs kyi gzugs can rnams ni zur gsum gyi rnam pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: zur gsum gyi dbyibs kyi gzugs can rnams ni zur gsum gyi rnam pa'i tshul lo //
translated: Those with the shape of a triangular form are the triangular mode.

original: rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub sems kyi khyad par kun gcig gis don rtogs pas thams cad kyang ngo //
analyzed: rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub sems kyi khyad par kun gcig gis don rtogs pas thams cad kyang ngo //
translated: Since the distinctions of the nāḍīs, vāyus, and bodhicitta are realized by one, all are also realized.

original: longs spyod lte ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: longs spyod lte ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: “The enjoyment at the navel” and so forth.

original: ye shes kyi ro la sogs pa la longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi ro la sogs pa la longs spyod pa'o //
translated: The enjoyment of the taste of intuition and so forth.

original: lce dang bcas pa'i rtsa ro myong bar byed pa ni /🔽lce ma ste /
analyzed: lce dang bcas pa'i rtsa ro myong bar byed pa ni / lce ma ste /
translated: The “tongue” channel is the experiencer of taste.

original: rten dang rten can ma /
analyzed: rten dang rten can ma /
translated: The “tongue” is the support and the supported.

original: de bzhin du ming ni brtags pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du ming ni brtags pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, the name is the imagination.

original: rtsa dang bde ba'i rang bzhin dang / gyen du 'gro ba'i rlung dang 'dzom pa ni bde ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa dang bde ba'i rang bzhin dang / gyen du 'gro ba'i rlung dang 'dzom pa ni bde ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The channel and the nature of bliss, united with the upward moving energy, is endowed with bliss.

original: ske ni longs spyod 'khor lo'i rten no //
analyzed: ske ni longs spyod 'khor lo'i rten no //
translated: The throat is the support of the enjoyment wheel.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: “The center of the dharma wheel” and so forth.

original: sems las chos rnams 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sems las chos rnams 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the phenomena arise from the mind,

original: snying ga'i gnas so //
analyzed: snying ga'i gnas so //
translated: it is the abode of the heart.

original: padma 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: padma 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It has eight lotus petals.

original: nam mkha' ma ni sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i don to //
analyzed: nam mkha' ma ni sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i don to //
translated: The “sky” is the meaning of the mind being equal to the sky.

original: snying ga rtsa'i yon tan gyis ye shes ldan pa ni bde ba'i ye shes dang / gzhi'i rlung dang ldan pa sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: snying ga rtsa'i yon tan gyis ye shes ldan pa ni bde ba'i ye shes dang / gzhi'i rlung dang ldan pa sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
translated: Endowed with the wisdom of the qualities of the channel at the heart is the wisdom of bliss, and endowed with the fundamental wind is as previously explained.

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: The “navel of the emanation cakra” and so forth.

original: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams 'byung ba ni sprul ba'i don to //
analyzed: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams 'byung ba ni sprul ba'i don to //
translated: The arising of the phenomena of cyclic existence and nirvana is the meaning of emanation.

original: sems can dang sangs rgyas sprul ba'i 'dab ma ni drug cu rtsa bzhis mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: sems can dang sangs rgyas sprul ba'i 'dab ma ni drug cu rtsa bzhis mtshon pa'o //
translated: The emanations of sentient beings and buddhas are indicated by the sixty-four petals.

original: 'dod ma ni gtum mo 'byung ba'i gnas kyi rtsa'i don to //
analyzed: 'dod ma ni gtum mo 'byung ba'i gnas kyi rtsa'i don to //
translated: The “desire” is the meaning of the channel that is the place of origin of caṇḍālī.

original: bdud rtsi ldan @215b ni rlung kro dha dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: bdud rtsi ldan @215b ni rlung kro dha dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The “nectar” is the characteristic of the wind along with krodha.

original: me'i 'khor lo ni 'dab ma gsum pa'i me'i gnas so //
analyzed: me'i 'khor lo ni 'dab ma gsum pa'i me'i gnas so //
translated: The “fire cakra” is the place of fire with three petals.

original: sngar las khyab par du gyur pa ni rab 'od ma'o //
analyzed: sngar las khyab par du gyur pa ni rab 'od ma'o //
translated: The “pervasiveness” from before is prabhāsā.

original: 'dod par ldan ni rlung 'dod pa dang bcas pa'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod par ldan ni rlung 'dod pa dang bcas pa'i bde ba'o //
translated: The “endowed with desire” is the bliss of the wind along with desire.

original: rlung gi 'khor lo'i lte ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: rlung gi 'khor lo'i lte ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: The “navel of the wind cakra” and so forth.

original: 'dab ma drug pa'i gnas ni rlung gi 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: 'dab ma drug pa'i gnas ni rlung gi 'khor lo ste /
translated: The location of the six-petaled lotus is the wind maṇḍala.

original: rlung gi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i gnas na mo'i rtsa ni brtson 'grus ma'o //
analyzed: rlung gi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i gnas na mo'i rtsa ni brtson 'grus ma'o //
translated: The nāḍī of the female, which has the characteristic of wind, is Vīra.

original: gsal ba'i rlung dang bcas pa ni stobs dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: gsal ba'i rlung dang bcas pa ni stobs dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Endowed with the wind of clarity is endowed with strength.

original: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs don gyis sbyor ba drug tu bshad pa ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs don gyis sbyor ba drug tu bshad pa ste /
translated: The meaning of “having the nature of the three realities” and so on is explained as the six applications.🔽Therefore:

original: des na / de ni sbyor drug rnam par shes //
analyzed: des na / de ni sbyor drug rnam par shes //
translated: That is the consciousness of the six applications.

original: rtsa dang thigs pa dang ldan no //
analyzed: rtsa dang thigs pa dang ldan no //
translated: It is endowed with nāḍīs and bindus.

original: zhes bya'o // gang tshe rtog med mas ni 'khyud //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // gang tshe rtog med mas ni 'khyud //
translated: When it is embraced by the nonconceptual,

original: de tshe tshangs pa'i dbyug pa yin //
analyzed: de tshe tshangs pa'i dbyug pa yin //
translated: then it is the staff of Brahmā.

original: zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe 'khor lo rnams kyi lte ba dang / bde ba bzhengs bzhugs gnas par ldan pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe 'khor lo rnams kyi lte ba dang / bde ba bzhengs bzhugs gnas par ldan pa de'i tshe /
translated: When the centers of the cakras are endowed with the abode of the arising and abiding of bliss,

original: tshangs pa ste /
analyzed: tshangs pa ste /
translated: then it is Brahmā,

original: gang dang de gnyis rtag tu 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang dang de gnyis rtag tu 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because both of those are always connected.

original: tshangs pa ni ye shes dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems srog gi dbyug pa la 'khyud pa'i tshul gyis tshangs pa'i dbyug pa'o //
analyzed: tshangs pa ni ye shes dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems srog gi dbyug pa la 'khyud pa'i tshul gyis tshangs pa'i dbyug pa'o //
translated: Brahma is the staff of Brahma, in the manner of embracing the staff of life of the bodhisattva endowed with intuition.

original: tshangs pa ye shes 'dzin pas na /
analyzed: tshangs pa ye shes 'dzin pas na /
translated: Since Brahma holds intuition,

original: dbyug pa rnam rtog 'joms pas so //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dbyug pa rnam rtog 'joms pas so // zhes gsungs so //
translated: the staff is for destroying conceptualization.

original: de'i don rgyas par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i don rgyas par bstan pa ni /
translated: The extensive explanation of the meaning of that is:

original: de yi dus ni bdag gis bshad //
analyzed: de yi dus ni bdag gis bshad //
translated: I will explain its time.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni de'i dus zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni de'i dus zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The so-called time is

original: bzang ba'i dus dang / ngan pa'i dus dang / bsam du med pa'i dus so //
analyzed: bzang ba'i dus dang / ngan pa'i dus dang / bsam du med pa'i dus so //
translated: the good time, the bad time, and the inconceivable time.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As is said:

original: 'ong ba bzang ba'i dus zhes bya //
analyzed: 'ong ba bzang ba'i dus zhes bya //
translated: The coming is called the good time.

original: 'gro bas ngan pa'i dus yin no ;
analyzed: 'gro bas ngan pa'i dus yin no ;
translated: The going is the bad time.

original: / bzang po de ni mchog tu bstan //
analyzed: / bzang po de ni mchog tu bstan //
translated: That good time is taught to be supreme.

original: ngan pa'i dus ni bral ba'o //
analyzed: ngan pa'i dus ni bral ba'o //
translated: The bad time is free from that.

original: gnyis dang bral ba de kho nyid //🔽rnam rtog dngos po thams cad bral //
analyzed: gnyis dang bral ba de kho nyid // rnam rtog dngos po thams cad bral //
translated: That itself is free from the two.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is free from all conceptual things.

original: shar ba la sogs pa'i ye shes 'byung ba gong gi de ni 'di nas mar ro //
analyzed: shar ba la sogs pa'i ye shes 'byung ba gong gi de ni 'di nas mar ro //
translated: The arising of the intuition of dawn and so forth is from here on down.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bshad pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bshad pa'o //
translated: Blessed One, I have explained.

original: shar ba dang nub pa zhes bya ba ni steng dang 'og gi 'pho bas na /
analyzed: shar ba dang nub pa zhes bya ba ni steng dang 'og gi 'pho bas na /
translated: The rising and setting is the upward and downward movement.🔽 Below the center of the great-bliss wheel, there are sixteen movements.

original: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i lte ba man chad du bcu drug 'pho ba de bzhin du yang rin po che nor bu sprul pa'i 'khor lo nas steng du 'pho ba bcu drug go //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i lte ba man chad du bcu drug 'pho ba de bzhin du yang rin po che nor bu sprul pa'i 'khor lo nas steng du 'pho ba bcu drug go //
translated: Likewise, above the jewel-gem emanation wheel, there are sixteen movements.

original: ci'i phyir steng dang 'og tu 'pho @216a * //
analyzed: ci'i phyir steng dang 'og tu 'pho @216a * //
translated: Why is there upward and downward movement?

original: zhe na ; 'dis 'pho ba ste /
analyzed: zhe na ; 'dis 'pho ba ste /
translated: This is movement.

original: byang chub kyi sems dang rlung gnyis phrad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems dang rlung gnyis phrad pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the bodhicitta and the wind meet,

original: 'pho ba ste zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'pho ba ste zhes gsungs so //
translated: there is movement.

original: rtog med ma nyid ni gcig pu'o //
analyzed: rtog med ma nyid ni gcig pu'o //
translated: The nonconceptual is the single one.

original: dngos po'i ni ro ma dang 'dzin ma dang srog ma'o //
analyzed: dngos po'i ni ro ma dang 'dzin ma dang srog ma'o //
translated: The things are the lalanā, rasanā, and avadhūti.

original: sbyor ba ni rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub kyi sems ro gcig pas sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub kyi sems ro gcig pas sbyor ba'o //
translated: The union is the union of the nāḍīs, vāyus, and bodhicitta as one taste.

original: rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis ni mdud pa bcu drug pa phrag gnyis /
analyzed: rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis ni mdud pa bcu drug pa phrag gnyis /
translated: The thirty-two nāḍīs are two sets of sixteen knots.

original: steng dang 'og tu 'pho ba'i g-yas g-yon gyis gnas so //
analyzed: steng dang 'og tu 'pho ba'i g-yas g-yon gyis gnas so //
translated: They are located to the right and left of the upward and downward movements.

original: byang chub kyi sems dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gdu bu'i rnam pa zhes bya ba la /🔽ri bong can gyi rnam pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gdu bu'i rnam pa zhes bya ba la / ri bong can gyi rnam pa ni /
translated: The “ring of the bodhicitta endowed with joy” is the form of the thirty-two knots of the place of the bodhicitta with the vajra jewel.

original: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje rin po che'i nor bu dang bcas pa'i gnas kyi gdu bu sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag po'i rnam pa dga' ba bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnam pa dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje rin po che'i nor bu dang bcas pa'i gnas kyi gdu bu sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag po'i rnam pa dga' ba bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnam pa dang / de bzhin du /
translated: The “form of the rabbit” is the form endowed with the four joys.

original: 'dir yang rnam par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang rnam par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Here also, one should apply the same method.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni /
translated: The “nature of body, speech, and mind” is the three nāḍīs.

original: srog ma ni sku'o //
analyzed: srog ma ni sku'o //
translated: The rasanā is the body.

original: ro ma ni gsung ngo //
analyzed: ro ma ni gsung ngo //
translated: The lalanā is speech.

original: 'dzin ma ni thugs so //
analyzed: 'dzin ma ni thugs so //
translated: The avadhūti is mind.

original: gsum gyi bdag nyid ni rtog med ma'o //
analyzed: gsum gyi bdag nyid ni rtog med ma'o //
translated: The nature of the three is nonconceptuality.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtogs pa med pas na /
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtogs pa med pas na /
translated: Since there is no concept of subject and object,

original: gcig pu rtog med ma'o //
analyzed: gcig pu rtog med ma'o //
translated: it is the sole nonconceptuality.

original: rgyu'i dngos su snang ba las 'bras bu'i ming brtags pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i dngos su snang ba las 'bras bu'i ming brtags pa'o //
translated: The name of the result is imputed from the appearance of the entity of the cause.

original: yang na sku ni dga' ba /
analyzed: yang na sku ni dga' ba /
translated: Also, the body is joy;

original: gsung mchog gi dga' ba /
analyzed: gsung mchog gi dga' ba /
translated: speech is supreme joy;

original: thugs chad pa'i dga' ba /
analyzed: thugs chad pa'i dga' ba /
translated: and the mind is the joy of cessation.

original: bdag nyid rang bzhin dga' ba /
analyzed: bdag nyid rang bzhin dga' ba /
translated: The self is said to be natural joy,

original: gcig pu rtog med ma zhes bshad do //
analyzed: gcig pu rtog med ma zhes bshad do //
translated: alone, non-conceptual, and without.

original: bde ba chen po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'khor lo drug gi lte ba dang po bde ba chen po nas tha ma rdo rje nor bu'i gnas bde chen gyis bshad pa ga bur dang bcas pa'i g-yas dang g-yon de bzhin tshangs pa'i dbyug pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'khor lo drug gi lte ba dang po bde ba chen po nas tha ma rdo rje nor bu'i gnas bde chen gyis bshad pa ga bur dang bcas pa'i g-yas dang g-yon de bzhin tshangs pa'i dbyug pa'o //
translated: Great bliss and so on explains the center of the six cakras, from the first great bliss to the last place of the vajra jewel, which is the great bliss, along with camphor, to the right and left, and the staff of Brahmā.

original: ji ltar ni dpes bshad pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar ni dpes bshad pa'o //
translated: How? is explained by the example.

original: tsandan go shirsha'i shing gi dbus su sprul mo yod pa'o //
analyzed: tsandan go shirsha'i shing gi dbus su sprul mo yod pa'o //
translated: In the middle of the sandalwood gośīrṣa tree, there is a female snake.

original: de bzhin tshangs pa'i dbyug pa'i dbus na /
analyzed: de bzhin tshangs pa'i dbyug pa'i dbus na /
translated: In the same way, in the middle of the staff of Brahmā,

original: ro ma dang 'dzin ma g-yas g-yon /
analyzed: ro ma dang 'dzin ma g-yas g-yon /
translated: the rasanā and lalanā are on the right and left,

original: rtog med ma dbus su'o //
analyzed: rtog med ma dbus su'o //
translated: and the non-conceptual is in the middle.

original: lha'i dbang phyug de la ji ltar bdag nyid kyi don bshad ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: lha'i dbang phyug de la ji ltar bdag nyid kyi don bshad ces bya ba ni /
translated: How is that explained as the meaning of the self?

original: gor shirsha'i tsandan de bzhin du /
analyzed: gor shirsha'i tsandan de bzhin du /
translated: The sandalwood gośīrṣa

original: rtog med ma tshangs pa'i dbyug pa la mdun du 'khyud pa'i don rgyas par bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: rtog med ma tshangs pa'i dbyug pa la mdun du 'khyud pa'i don rgyas par bshad par bya'o //
translated: is the non-conceptual, and the staff of Brahmā is to be explained extensively as the meaning of embracing in front.

original: de la tshangs pa'i rus pa'i tshigs pa'i nang mtshan no //
analyzed: de la tshangs pa'i rus pa'i tshigs pa'i nang mtshan no //
translated: The bone of Brahmā is the bone of the secret place.

original: dbyug pa'i snying po ni srog gi dbyug pa dang gsum par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dbyug pa'i snying po ni srog gi dbyug pa dang gsum par ldan pa'o //
translated: The essence of the staff is the staff of life.

original: dang por las kyi phyag rgya dang @216b mnyam par sbyor ba /🔽dang po'i zur gsum gyi rnam pa mdud pa'i lte bar zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dang por las kyi phyag rgya dang @216b mnyam par sbyor ba / dang po'i zur gsum gyi rnam pa mdud pa'i lte bar zhes bya ba ni /
translated: First, one unites with the karma consort.🔽The first triangular shape is the center of the knot.

original: 'pho ba'i dang po rten nas dbyibs zur gsum dbus kyi lte bar /
analyzed: 'pho ba'i dang po rten nas dbyibs zur gsum dbus kyi lte bar /
translated: From the first moving support, the triangular shape is in the center of the navel.

original: dngos shes rab ma las kyi phyag rgyal lta ba las 'dar ba'i ro skye /
analyzed: dngos shes rab ma las kyi phyag rgyal lta ba las 'dar ba'i ro skye /
translated: The object is the karma consort.

original: ye shes 'dod pa'i dga' ba srog rlung ldan pa zla stod kyi tshes gcig //
analyzed: ye shes 'dod pa'i dga' ba srog rlung ldan pa zla stod kyi tshes gcig //
translated: The bliss of the desire for pristine consciousness is the life vāyu.

original: chu tshod gcig gi bar du byang chub sems kyi thig le /
analyzed: chu tshod gcig gi bar du byang chub sems kyi thig le /
translated: The bindu of bodhicitta is in the first part of the waxing moon.

original: rnam par 'byed pa bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa bshad pa'o //
translated: It is explained as being differentiated.🔽The support is the shape of a lotus.

original: rten padma'i dbyibs can du dngos rig pa la 'dod pa las 'dra ba skye /
analyzed: rten padma'i dbyibs can du dngos rig pa la 'dod pa las 'dra ba skye /
translated: The object is the desire for the knowledge consort.

original: 'dar ba'i dga' ba'i ye shes nye ba'i srog rlung dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'dar ba'i dga' ba'i ye shes nye ba'i srog rlung dang ldan pa /
translated: The bliss of trembling is the pristine consciousness of joy.🔽The vāyu is the life-sustaining vāyu.

original: tshes gnyis kyi zla ba 'phel ba bzhin chu tshod gnyis kyi bar du yun ring bar mtshungs pa /
analyzed: tshes gnyis kyi zla ba 'phel ba bzhin chu tshod gnyis kyi bar du yun ring bar mtshungs pa /
translated: For two hours, like the waxing moon of the second day, it is similar for a long time.

original: byang chub kyi sems stobs kyi thig le rnam par 'byed pa nub pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems stobs kyi thig le rnam par 'byed pa nub pa'o //
translated: The bindu of the power of bodhicitta dissolves.

original: rten du grags pa'i ming can du /
analyzed: rten du grags pa'i ming can du /
translated: In the one called the “name of the support,”

original: dngos 'dus pa las rdul skye /🔽'gro ba'i ye shes mnyam pa'i rlung dang ldan pa'i tshes gsum gyi chu tshod gsum gyi bar du ;
analyzed: dngos 'dus pa las rdul skye / 'gro ba'i ye shes mnyam pa'i rlung dang ldan pa'i tshes gsum gyi chu tshod gsum gyi bar du ;
translated: from the gathering of the elements, the bindu of the vāyu of the dhātu arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.

original: byang chub kyi sems sprin gyi thig le rnam par 'byed pa shar ba'o //🔽de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyang rim pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //🔽'dar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma tsam bstan to //🔽bzhi pa nu ma reg pa la rdul skye /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems sprin gyi thig le rnam par 'byed pa shar ba'o // de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyang rim pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o // 'dar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma tsam bstan to // bzhi pa nu ma reg pa la rdul skye /
translated: The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.

original: lnga pa dang drug par ba spu langs pa skye /🔽bdun pa dang brgyad par dbyangs kyi khyad par skye /
analyzed: lnga pa dang drug par ba spu langs pa skye / bdun pa dang brgyad par dbyangs kyi khyad par skye /
translated: The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.

original: dgu pa dang bcu par bkrag bzang bar skye /
analyzed: dgu pa dang bcu par bkrag bzang bar skye /
translated: The bindu of the cloud of bodhicitta arises.🔽The bin

original: bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis par kha dog 'gyur pa skye /
analyzed: bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis par kha dog 'gyur pa skye /
translated: In the eleventh and twelfth, the color changes arise.

original: bcu gsum pa dang / bcu bzhi par dga' ba'i snang ba mi gsal ba skye /
analyzed: bcu gsum pa dang / bcu bzhi par dga' ba'i snang ba mi gsal ba skye /
translated: In the thirteenth and fourteenth, the appearance of joy arises unclearly.

original: mtha' ma gnyis la yang snang ba thim pa skye'o //
analyzed: mtha' ma gnyis la yang snang ba thim pa skye'o //
translated: In the last two, the dissolution of appearances arises.

original: yang na gnyid pa dang 'khrul pa dang / brgyal ba dang / skom pa dang / 'dar ba dang / skig  pa dang / skrag pa dang / bya rmyangs dang / sdang ba dang / ba spu langs pa dang / mchi ma 'bab pa dang /
analyzed: yang na gnyid pa dang 'khrul pa dang / brgyal ba dang / skom pa dang / 'dar ba dang / skig  pa dang / skrag pa dang / bya rmyangs dang / sdang ba dang / ba spu langs pa dang / mchi ma 'bab pa dang /
translated: Alternately, sleep, confusion, fainting, thirst, trembling, shaking, fear, yawning, anger, horripilation, tears,

original: drod dang / dngos po dang / rten dang / ye shes dang / rnam par 'byed pa yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: drod dang / dngos po dang / rten dang / ye shes dang / rnam par 'byed pa yang de bzhin no //
translated: heat, substance, support, gnosis, and discernment also arise.

original: mtshan mas ye shes skye ba'i rim pa shes rab 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan mas ye shes skye ba'i rim pa shes rab 'gyur ro //
translated: The stages of the arising of gnosis are known through the signs.

original: ye shes skye ba'i rim pa shes pa'i dgos pa gang yin snyam pa la /
analyzed: ye shes skye ba'i rim pa shes pa'i dgos pa gang yin snyam pa la /
translated: What is the purpose of knowing the stages of the arising of gnosis?

original: des ni rang bzhin dga' ba rten med rnyed cing thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: des ni rang bzhin dga' ba rten med rnyed cing thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: By that, one will find and attain the supportless natural joy.

original: des na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi @217a * //
analyzed: des na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi @217a * //
translated: Therefore, all tathāgatas

original: rigs so // ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rigs so // ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: ye shes skye ba'i rim pa'i mtshan ma'i rtags ni /
analyzed: ye shes skye ba'i rim pa'i mtshan ma'i rtags ni /
translated: The signs of the marks of the stages of the arising of the intuition

original: dad pa che ba dang / shes rab che ba dang / snying rje che ba dang / chags pa chung ba la sogs pa las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dad pa che ba dang / shes rab che ba dang / snying rje che ba dang / chags pa chung ba la sogs pa las shes par bya'o //
translated: are to be known from the great faith, great wisdom, great compassion, and small desire, etc.

original: 'di skad du /
analyzed: 'di skad du /
translated: It is said:

original: sbyin sreg gi le'u las /🔽du ba las ni mer shes shing ;
analyzed: sbyin sreg gi le'u las / du ba las ni mer shes shing ;
translated: In the Homa Chapter:🔽From smoke one knows fire,

original: / chur skyar las ni chur shes so //
analyzed: / chur skyar las ni chur shes so //
translated: and from the reflection of the moon in water, one knows water.

original: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis //
translated: The wise bodhisattva

original: rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes //
analyzed: rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes //
translated: knows the spiritual gene from the marks.

original: zhes gsungs pas ni /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas ni /
translated: This says:🔽The marks of the arising of the intuition

original: ye shes skye ba'i mtshan ma yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: ye shes skye ba'i mtshan ma yang de bzhin no //
translated: are also like that.

original: yang na reg bya med par dga' ba la sogs pa sngar bzhin bskyed par bya ba yin no ;
analyzed: yang na reg bya med par dga' ba la sogs pa sngar bzhin bskyed par bya ba yin no ;
translated: Or else, one should generate the joy, etc., as before, without the tactile sensation.

original: / thogs ni sngang  'jigs byed pa yang //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: / thogs ni sngang  'jigs byed pa yang //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The signs of the spiritual gene are also to be known from the marks of the arising of the intuition.🔽The signs of the arising of the intuition are also to be known from the marks of the arising of the intuition.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le rnams dang bco lnga po'i dga' ba la sogs pas reg par ma nus pa'i mchog gi thig le 'di zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le rnams dang bco lnga po'i dga' ba la sogs pas reg par ma nus pa'i mchog gi thig le 'di zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the term “supreme drop” is that it is the drop that is not reached by the fifteen joys, etc., of the bodhicitta drops.

original: dpe ni 'jig rten pa'i grags pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dpe ni 'jig rten pa'i grags pa bzhin no //
translated: The example is in accordance with worldly renown.

original: de la ni 'pho ba'i don de la'o ;
analyzed: de la ni 'pho ba'i don de la'o ;
translated: In that, the meaning of “transference” is in that.

original: / nub bcu drug ni thim pa'i sgra yin te /
analyzed: / nub bcu drug ni thim pa'i sgra yin te /
translated: The sixteen sunsets are the sound of dissolution.

original: de'i don gyis shar ba yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i don gyis shar ba yang de bzhin no //
translated: The meaning of that is the same as the rising.

original: shar dang nub pa ni rlung dang byang chub kyi sems phrad pas 'pho zhing /
analyzed: shar dang nub pa ni rlung dang byang chub kyi sems phrad pas 'pho zhing /
translated: The rising and setting is the transference by the meeting of the wind and the bodhicitta.

original: shar nas skye ba dang / thim pa steng dang 'og tu 'gro ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: shar nas skye ba dang / thim pa steng dang 'og tu 'gro ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The rising is birth, and the setting is the dissolution of the bodhicitta going above and below.

original: bco lnga pa dang bcu drug pa rten can dang mchog gi dga' ba ni mdud pa'i rim pas skye ba'i don to //
analyzed: bco lnga pa dang bcu drug pa rten can dang mchog gi dga' ba ni mdud pa'i rim pas skye ba'i don to //
translated: The fifteenth and sixteenth are the supported and supreme joys, which are the meaning of the arising of the knots.

original: rang bzhin dga' la de yon tan min ni rang bzhin dga' ba skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / rten dang / rten can dang / yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad dang bral ba shar ba dang nub pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' la de yon tan min ni rang bzhin dga' ba skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / rten dang / rten can dang / yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad dang bral ba shar ba dang nub pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The nature is not a quality of that, because the nature is bliss, and it is free from all entities such as arising, ceasing, support, supported, existing, and not existing.

original: yon po'i gdu bu'i rnam pa'i rtsa lte ba'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yon po'i gdu bu'i rnam pa'i rtsa lte ba'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In the center of the navel channel, which has the form of a crooked bracelet,

original: srog ma dang bcas pa'i mdud pa rnams kyi lte bar /
analyzed: srog ma dang bcas pa'i mdud pa rnams kyi lte bar /
translated: in the center of the knots with the life-force channel.

original: lte ba'i gdu bu'i sgras rdo rje rin po che'i gnas su bzhi'i don 'dus pa'i dus so //
analyzed: lte ba'i gdu bu'i sgras rdo rje rin po che'i gnas su bzhi'i don 'dus pa'i dus so //
translated: The term “navel bracelet” refers to the place of the vajra jewel, the time of the collection of the four.

original: dus kyi sgras thig le dang / dga' ba dang sogs pas steng gi rlung dang / 'og gi rlung dang / rtsa rnams la ni dus gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: dus kyi sgras thig le dang / dga' ba dang sogs pas steng gi rlung dang / 'og gi rlung dang / rtsa rnams la ni dus gnyis pa'o //
translated: The term “time” refers to the bindu, the joy, and so on, the upper vāyu, the lower vāyu, and the nāḍīs.

original: gcig pa ni chags pa dang / chags pa ma yin pa ro gcig pa'i dus so //
analyzed: gcig pa ni chags pa dang / chags pa ma yin pa ro gcig pa'i dus so //
translated: The “single” is the time of the single taste of passion and nonpassion.

original: de lta'i bde chen rnam pa ni //
analyzed: de lta'i bde chen rnam pa ni //
translated: The form of that great bliss

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: is explained.

original: sngar bshad pa'i chu tshod dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i chu tshod dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with the hours explained previously.

original: 'pho ba zhes bya ba ni 'pho ba bcu drug dang / 'pho ba dang / @217b chu tshod kyi sgras /
analyzed: 'pho ba zhes bya ba ni 'pho ba bcu drug dang / 'pho ba dang / @217b chu tshod kyi sgras /
translated: The term transference refers to the sixteen transferences, and the terms transference and hour🔽refer to the sixty-four finger lengths, the eight periods, and the four moments.

original: dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / thun tshod brgyad dang / skad cig ma bzhi po 'di kun gyi nang gi sbyor bas /🔽bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag gis bshad zin pa'i don to //
analyzed: dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / thun tshod brgyad dang / skad cig ma bzhi po 'di kun gyi nang gi sbyor bas / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag gis bshad zin pa'i don to //
translated: All of these are included in the term application.🔽 The meaning of the term vajra holder is as follows:

original: de'i don bsdus pa ni /🔽dngos po rten dang ye shes dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste ;
analyzed: de'i don bsdus pa ni / dngos po rten dang ye shes dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste ;
translated: The term vajra holder is explained as follows:

original: dngos po rten dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽dngos po'i sgras sbyor ba'i dngos po rnams so //
analyzed: dngos po rten dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / dngos po'i sgras sbyor ba'i dngos po rnams so //
translated: The term vajra refers to the four joys, and the term holder refers to the bindu of bodhicitta.

original: rten gyi sgras ni byang chub sems kyi rten rtsa'i gnas rnams bsdu'o //
analyzed: rten gyi sgras ni byang chub sems kyi rten rtsa'i gnas rnams bsdu'o //
translated: The term holder refers to the channels, the supports of bodhicitta.

original: ye shes kyi sgras dga' ba rnams rlung dang ldan pa bsdu'o //🔽rnam par 'byed pa'i sgras ni /
analyzed: ye shes kyi sgras dga' ba rnams rlung dang ldan pa bsdu'o // rnam par 'byed pa'i sgras ni /
translated: The term joy refers to the joys endowed with the vāyu.🔽The term distinction refers to the general distinctions of the bindu of bodhicitta, and so on.

original: byang chub sems kyi thig le la sogs pa spyir 'byed pa rnams bstan pa yin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi thig le la sogs pa spyir 'byed pa rnams bstan pa yin zhes bya'o //
translated: The term holder refers to the bindu of bodhicitta.

original: de rang gi don dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /🔽dngos po ro mnyam sbyor ba yin //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de rang gi don dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / dngos po ro mnyam sbyor ba yin // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That is the “thing” called one’s own aim, etc.

original: rnal 'byor pa'i dngos po ni las kyi phyag rgya dang thabs kyi bdag nyid gnyis dpal phyag rgya chen po dang ye shes thig les byin gyis brlas pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i dngos po ni las kyi phyag rgya dang thabs kyi bdag nyid gnyis dpal phyag rgya chen po dang ye shes thig les byin gyis brlas pa'o //
translated: The “thing” of the yogin is the two, the karmamudra and the nature of the means, blessed by the Sri Heruka and the Wisdom-Point.

original: de gnyis sbyor bas ro mnyam sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de gnyis sbyor bas ro mnyam sbyor ba'o //
translated: The “union of the same taste” is the union of those two.

original: des ni dga' ba la sogs pa'i stobs las skyes pa las gnyis su med pa'i 'bras bu bde ba chen po rnyed do //
analyzed: des ni dga' ba la sogs pa'i stobs las skyes pa las gnyis su med pa'i 'bras bu bde ba chen po rnyed do //
translated: By that, one obtains the great bliss, the result of nonduality, born of the power of the joy, etc.

original: las kyi phyag rgya dang thabs dang / rtsa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po'i chos thams cad kyis /
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya dang thabs dang / rtsa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po'i chos thams cad kyis /
translated: All things, the dharmas of the karmamudra, the means, the channels, etc.,

original: ye shes spros pa dang bral ba la 'bras bu dang rgyur mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: ye shes spros pa dang bral ba la 'bras bu dang rgyur mi 'gyur la /
translated: are not cause and effect in the wisdom free of conceptual elaboration.

original: de bzhin du dngos po'i lha la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po'i lha la sogs pa ni /
translated: Likewise, the things, the deities, etc.,

original: ru trar skye ba'am /
analyzed: ru trar skye ba'am /
translated: are not born in Rudra,

original: yang na 'jig rten gyi lha chen po la sogs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na 'jig rten gyi lha chen po la sogs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Or else, one will attain the fruit of being a great worldly god, and so forth.

original: de bas na rnam par mi rtog pa nyid spros pa thams cad dang bral ba bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na rnam par mi rtog pa nyid spros pa thams cad dang bral ba bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should cultivate non-conceptuality itself, which is free from all elaborations.

original: des 'bras bu yang dag pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba bde ba chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des 'bras bu yang dag pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba bde ba chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, one will attain the fruit called “authentic emptiness,” which is great bliss.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: de kho na nyid kyi rgyud las /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi rgyud las /
translated: In the Tattva-tantra:

original: stong nyid bsgoms pas de nyid 'thob //
analyzed: stong nyid bsgoms pas de nyid 'thob //
translated: By cultivating emptiness, one attains reality.

original: spros bcas rnam par rtog pa yis //
analyzed: spros bcas rnam par rtog pa yis //
translated: By conceptual elaborations,

original: 'bras bu de bzhin ma yin te //
analyzed: 'bras bu de bzhin ma yin te //
translated: The fruit is not like that.

original: rtog pas rtogs pa skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rtog pas rtogs pa skye bar 'gyur //
translated: By conceptualization, conceptualization arises.

original: zhes pa dang / gleng gzhi'i rgyud las kyang /
analyzed: zhes pa dang / gleng gzhi'i rgyud las kyang /
translated: And in the Nidana-tantra:

original: rnam rtog gti mug chen po ste //
analyzed: rnam rtog gti mug chen po ste //
translated: Conceptualization is great delusion,

original: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed yin //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed yin //
translated: Which causes one to fall into the ocean of cyclic existence.

original: mi rtog ting 'dzin la gnas nas //
analyzed: mi rtog ting 'dzin la gnas nas //
translated: By abiding in non-conceptual meditative stabilization,

original: mkha' bzhin dri ma med par 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs @218a * //
analyzed: mkha' bzhin dri ma med par 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs @218a * //
translated: One becomes stainless like space.

original: pas na ; rtog pa can bsgoms pas bya ba med de rnam par mi rtog pa bsgom mo zhes so //
analyzed: pas na ; rtog pa can bsgoms pas bya ba med de rnam par mi rtog pa bsgom mo zhes so //
translated: “The conceptualizer does not function through meditation; one meditates on the non-conceptual.”

original: 'dir de'i don gsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir de'i don gsal bar bya'o //
translated: Here, its meaning is clarified.

original: 'dir rtog pa yin na dngos po'i rtog pas 'bras bu de bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dir rtog pa yin na dngos po'i rtog pas 'bras bu de bzhin no //
translated: Here, if it is conceptual, it is the conceptualization of an entity, and the result is just so.

original: ji ltar 'o ma sprul gyi dug yin yang /
analyzed: ji ltar 'o ma sprul gyi dug yin yang /
translated: Just as milk is the poison of a snake,

original: mi la sogs ba'i de bzhin ma yin no //
analyzed: mi la sogs ba'i de bzhin ma yin no //
translated: but not so for humans, etc.

original: de bzhin 'dod chags la sogs pa yang bsam pa'i khyad par las /
analyzed: de bzhin 'dod chags la sogs pa yang bsam pa'i khyad par las /
translated: So also, desire, etc., due to the difference in intention,

original: khyad par can gyi 'bras bur byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi 'bras bur byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: will produce a special result.

original: de bas 'dir /
analyzed: de bas 'dir /
translated: Therefore, here,

original: rtog pa min pa'i don gsungs pa //
analyzed: rtog pa min pa'i don gsungs pa //
translated: the meaning of “non-conceptual” is stated.

original: chags pa'i 'dod chags rnam dag byed //
analyzed: chags pa'i 'dod chags rnam dag byed //
translated: “The desire of desire is purified.”

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa las /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa las /
translated: And so on.

original: chags pa ni rtog pa'i yul phyin ci log pa ste /
analyzed: chags pa ni rtog pa'i yul phyin ci log pa ste /
translated: Here, desire is the object of conceptualization, the error,

original: bud med kyi dngos po dang / gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa la lta zhing mthong ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bud med kyi dngos po dang / gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa la lta zhing mthong ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: looking at and seeing the entity of a woman, form, sound, etc.

original: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la sogs pa'i rtog pa la zhen cing chags pa ni 'dod chags yin te /
analyzed: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la sogs pa'i rtog pa la zhen cing chags pa ni 'dod chags yin te /
translated: Attachment is the attachment and clinging to the concepts of form, sound, smell, taste, touch, and phenomena, etc.

original: 'dod pas bdag gi dbang du byas nas mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pas bdag gi dbang du byas nas mi gtong ba'o //
translated: It is attachment because it does not let go of what is taken up by desire.

original: rnam dag ces bya ba ni de 'dir dag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam dag ces bya ba ni de 'dir dag par 'gyur te /
translated: Purity means that it becomes pure here.

original: tha mal pa'i spyod pa dngos po la zhen pa ma yin /
analyzed: tha mal pa'i spyod pa dngos po la zhen pa ma yin /
translated: The conduct of the ordinary person is not clinging to things.

original: lha dang lha mo'i bdag nyid sgyu ma'i dngos po bsgoms nas /
analyzed: lha dang lha mo'i bdag nyid sgyu ma'i dngos po bsgoms nas /
translated: Having meditated on the illusory things that are the nature of gods and goddesses,

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi spyod pa byas pas rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi spyod pa byas pas rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: one should practice the conduct of method and wisdom, and it will become pure.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Likewise,

original: 'dus pa reg bya byed pa yi //
analyzed: 'dus pa reg bya byed pa yi //
translated: the contact of the union

original: zhes bya ba la 'dus pa ni thabs dang shes rab reg bya ni rdo rje rin po che dang bcas pa padma bya gdong ma dang bcas pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la 'dus pa ni thabs dang shes rab reg bya ni rdo rje rin po che dang bcas pa padma bya gdong ma dang bcas pa /
translated: is the contact of the method and wisdom, the vajra and jewel, and the lotus and face of the bird.

original: byed pa po'i dngos po zhes sbyar te /
analyzed: byed pa po'i dngos po zhes sbyar te /
translated: The phrase “the entity of the agent” is supplied.

original: thabs dang shes rab la sogs pa'i dga' ba ni /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab la sogs pa'i dga' ba ni /
translated: The joy of method and wisdom, etc.,

original: tha mal pa dang mthun pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tha mal pa dang mthun pa ma yin no //
translated: is not the same as the ordinary.

original: de bas na srid pa med par byed ces gsungs te /
analyzed: de bas na srid pa med par byed ces gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said that he “makes existence non-existent. ”

original: srid pa ni /
analyzed: srid pa ni /
translated: Existence is

original: skye ba'i srid pa dang / 'chi ba'i srid pa dang / bar ma de'i srid pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i srid pa dang / 'chi ba'i srid pa dang / bar ma de'i srid pa'o //
translated: the existence of birth, the existence of death, and the existence in between.

original: de skad du //
analyzed: de skad du //
translated: Thus it is said:

original: kye'o rdo rje las kyang /
analyzed: kye'o rdo rje las kyang /
translated: In the Hevajra Tantra it also says:

original: ji ltar dug gi dum bu yis //
analyzed: ji ltar dug gi dum bu yis //
translated: Just as a piece of poison

original: sems can kun ni 'chi bar byed //
analyzed: sems can kun ni 'chi bar byed //
translated: kills all living beings,

original: dug gi de nyid shes pa yis //
analyzed: dug gi de nyid shes pa yis //
translated: one who knows the reality of poison

original: dug gis dug ni 'joms par byed //
analyzed: dug gis dug ni 'joms par byed //
translated: destroys poison with poison.🔽And:

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i dpe dang / de bzhin chos can rtogs pa ni //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i dpe dang / de bzhin chos can rtogs pa ni //
translated: In the same way, the realization of the object of knowledge

original: rtogs pa yis ni dag par byed //
analyzed: rtogs pa yis ni dag par byed //
translated: is purified by the realization.

original: ji ltar 'dod chags mes tshig ni //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod chags mes tshig ni //
translated: Just as one burned by the fire of passion

original: slar yang 'dod chags kyis dag 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: slar yang 'dod chags kyis dag 'gyur // zhes gsungs so //
translated: is again purified by passion.

original: @218b 'o dang khyud pa longs spyod rnams ni /
analyzed: @218b 'o dang khyud pa longs spyod rnams ni /
translated: The enjoyment of kissing and embracing

original: sbyor thabs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa yin te /
analyzed: sbyor thabs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa yin te /
translated: is the practice of the Tathagata.

original: de bas 'dir yang 'o la sogs pa'i spyod pa longs spyod du gsungs so //
analyzed: de bas 'dir yang 'o la sogs pa'i spyod pa longs spyod du gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, here also, the enjoyment of kissing and so forth is taught.

original: de yang dga' ba skye ba'i rgyu 'khyud pa la sogs pa yin la /
analyzed: de yang dga' ba skye ba'i rgyu 'khyud pa la sogs pa yin la /
translated: Moreover, the cause of the arising of joy is the embrace and so forth.

original: 'bras bu'i dus na ni longs spyod /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i dus na ni longs spyod /
translated: At the time of the result, there is enjoyment.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyur 'gyur bas kyang longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyur 'gyur bas kyang longs spyod pa'o //
translated: Since it becomes the cause of the Tathagata, there is enjoyment.

original: dngos ni dngos por bar chod byed //
analyzed: dngos ni dngos por bar chod byed //
translated: The real is obstructed by the real.

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: This is said.

original: 'khor ba'i dngos po'i chos rnams kun //🔽thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spyod pas ye shes skyed de /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i dngos po'i chos rnams kun // thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spyod pas ye shes skyed de /
translated: All phenomena of the real of samsara🔽are obstructed by the conduct of various methods,

original: phyin ci log gi spyod pa'i bar gcad par bya'o //
analyzed: phyin ci log gi spyod pa'i bar gcad par bya'o //
translated: and the arising of wisdom is obstructed by perverse conduct.

original: rten gang yin snyam pa la /
analyzed: rten gang yin snyam pa la /
translated: What is the basis?

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: punda r'i ka 'byung ba yis //
analyzed: punda r'i ka 'byung ba yis //
translated: The arising of the lotus

original: zhes bya ba la sogs ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs ba'o //
translated: and so forth.

original: zla ba'i rnam pa can punda r'i ka'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i rnam pa can punda r'i ka'o //
translated: The lotus is the form of the moon.

original: 'byung ba ni ku sha'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: 'byung ba ni ku sha'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Arising is the characteristic of kusha grass.

original: yis zhes bya ba ni rtsva la ku sha 'bab pa'i phyir na'o //
analyzed: yis zhes bya ba ni rtsva la ku sha 'bab pa'i phyir na'o //
translated: By means that because the kusha falls on the grass,

original: zur gsum ni sngar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zur gsum ni sngar bshad pa'o //
translated: the three corners are as previously explained.

original: sogs ni padma'i 'bras bu dang / drag po'i mig can la sogs rnams bsdu /
analyzed: sogs ni padma'i 'bras bu dang / drag po'i mig can la sogs rnams bsdu /
translated: The and so forth includes lotus fruits, Rudra's eye, and so on.

original: rten gyi ni shuksha dga' ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas byed pa'o //
analyzed: rten gyi ni shuksha dga' ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas byed pa'o //
translated: The support is the abode of those endowed with the joy of the pure.

original: rtsa rnams kyi bsdus pa'i don dang bcas pa gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: rtsa rnams kyi bsdus pa'i don dang bcas pa gsungs pa ni /
translated: The meaning of the collection of channels is stated:

original: rten ni bsam gtan med pa ste //
analyzed: rten ni bsam gtan med pa ste //
translated: The support is the absence of meditation.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
translated: And so forth is stated.

original: rten ni 'dab ma gsum pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rten ni 'dab ma gsum pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The support is the form of the three petals.

original: de ni bsam gtan gyi gnas so //
analyzed: de ni bsam gtan gyi gnas so //
translated: That is the abode of meditation.

original: med pa ni bsam gtan med pa ste /
analyzed: med pa ni bsam gtan med pa ste /
translated: The absence is the absence of meditation.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la bsgom pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la bsgom pa med pa'o //
translated: In nondual wisdom, there is no meditation.

original: de las gzhan ma'i khyad par can zhig bsgom pa'i bsam gtan yang med do //
analyzed: de las gzhan ma'i khyad par can zhig bsgom pa'i bsam gtan yang med do //
translated: There is also no meditation of concentration that is different from that.

original: chos dbyings rang gi ngo bo yin //
analyzed: chos dbyings rang gi ngo bo yin //
translated: The intrinsic essence of the dhatu of phenomena

original: steng dang 'og tu mnyam pa brten //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: steng dang 'og tu mnyam pa brten // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: is supported above and below.🔽The equality of the generation and completion stages is the intrinsic essence of the dhatu of phenomena.

original: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa bral ba'i mnyam pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang rig ngo bo yin la de mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa bral ba'i mnyam pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang rig ngo bo yin la de mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir na /
translated: Since that is free from the two extremes,

original: mya ngan 'das pa rtog pa med //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa rtog pa med //
translated: nirvana is nonconceptual.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rtog pa med pas na /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rtog pa med pas na /
translated: Since there is no concept of nirvana,

original: 'khor ba'i rtog pa yong mi skye /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rtog pa yong mi skye /
translated: the concept of samsara does not arise.

original: de la bsam gtan gzhan pa ga la yod de med do //
analyzed: de la bsam gtan gzhan pa ga la yod de med do //
translated: How can there be any other meditation?

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: It is said:

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lung las kyang //🔽rtag tu shar ba las gzhan ci //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lung las kyang // rtag tu shar ba las gzhan ci //
translated: And in the Vajra Holder Tantra:🔽What else is there to meditate on

original: gang du yang ni sgom yod dam //
analyzed: gang du yang ni sgom yod dam //
translated: other than what is always arising?

original: gal te su zhig sgom byed de //
analyzed: gal te su zhig sgom byed de //
translated: If someone meditates on that,

original: khyad par can du skye mi 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs so //🔽bde ba @219a * //
analyzed: khyad par can du skye mi 'gyur // zhes gsungs so // bde ba @219a * //
translated: they will not be born in a special way.

original: chen po'i bdud rtsi ni nyan thos pa'i bde ba las mchog tu gyur pas bde ba chen po'i'o //
analyzed: chen po'i bdud rtsi ni nyan thos pa'i bde ba las mchog tu gyur pas bde ba chen po'i'o //
translated: The nectar of great bliss is the nectar of great bliss because it is superior to the bliss of the sravakas.

original: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is free from afflictions and so forth.

original: zas ni bdud rtsi rten ni spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i chos kyi dbyings rten can la gsal pa'o //
analyzed: zas ni bdud rtsi rten ni spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i chos kyi dbyings rten can la gsal pa'o //
translated: The food is the nectar, the support is the dharmadhatu free from all elaborations, and the clarity is the support.

original: rigs lnga ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs lnga ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: The five families are Vairochana and so forth.

original: de'i mchog ni gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po /
analyzed: de'i mchog ni gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po /
translated: The supreme of those is nondual great bliss.

original: gnas zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pas byas so //
analyzed: gnas zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pas byas so //
translated: The “place” is as explained above.

original: de yi ye shes gsum pa ni //
analyzed: de yi ye shes gsum pa ni //
translated: His third intuition

original: ye shes 'dod pa lhun gyis grub //🔽ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ye shes 'dod pa lhun gyis grub // ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: is the spontaneous intuition of the desired.

original: ye shes ni byang chub sems bde ba'i ye shes 'dod pa ni dga' ba bcu drug gi dang po'i dga' ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes ni byang chub sems bde ba'i ye shes 'dod pa ni dga' ba bcu drug gi dang po'i dga' ba'o //
translated: The “intuition” is the intuition of the bodhisattva’s bliss. The “desired” is the first joy of the sixteen joys.

original: lhun gyis grub pa ni de rnams grub pa'o //
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pa ni de rnams grub pa'o //
translated: “Spontaneous” is their accomplishment.

original: 'dar ba'i dga' ba mchog gi dga' ba ni /
analyzed: 'dar ba'i dga' ba mchog gi dga' ba ni /
translated: The trembling joy is the supreme joy.

original: de rnams kyi gnyis pa ni 'dar ba'i dga' ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi gnyis pa ni 'dar ba'i dga' ba ste /
translated: The second of those is the trembling joy,

original: dang po'i mchog ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dang po'i mchog ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: which has the meaning of “the first supreme. ”

original: ye shes zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i don 'di'o //
analyzed: ye shes zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i don 'di'o //
translated: The “intuition” is the meaning of the “intuition of experience. ”

original: lhun gyis grub pa ni bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ye shes bskyed pas grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pa ni bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ye shes bskyed pas grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The “spontaneous” is the accomplishment of the intuition produced by the power of meditation.

original: gnas ni ye shes bco lnga ba'i bzhugs gnas bcas pa ni rten can gyi rang bzhin dga' ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: gnas ni ye shes bco lnga ba'i bzhugs gnas bcas pa ni rten can gyi rang bzhin dga' ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The “place” is the abode of the fifteenth intuition, which is the nature of the supported, together with the joy.

original: chad pa'i dga' ba yi ni bco lnga pa yin no //
analyzed: chad pa'i dga' ba yi ni bco lnga pa yin no //
translated: The fifteenth is the joy of cessation.

original: gnas med pa ni rten dang rten can dang / shar dang nub dang / 'pho ba la sogs pa'i dngos po dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: gnas med pa ni rten dang rten can dang / shar dang nub dang / 'pho ba la sogs pa'i dngos po dang bral ba'o //
translated: The absence of a basis is free from the entities of support and supported, east and west, and transference, and so on.

original: rang bzhin dga' ba ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba ni /
translated: Natural joy

original: de kho na nyid ces bya ba dang / don dam pa'i bden pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / bde ba chen po la sogs pa rnam grangs so //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ces bya ba dang / don dam pa'i bden pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / bde ba chen po la sogs pa rnam grangs so //
translated: is a synonym for reality, ultimate truth, nonduality, great bliss, and so on.

original: gnyis su med pa'i mchog ni ye shes kyi nga rgyal tsam yang med de /🔽ye shes nga rgyal med par byed //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i mchog ni ye shes kyi nga rgyal tsam yang med de / ye shes nga rgyal med par byed //
translated: The supreme nonduality is the mere absence of the pride of gnosis.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: It is said, “Make the pride of gnosis nonexistent.”

original: chos ni 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba'i phung po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos ni 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba'i phung po la sogs pa'o //
translated: Dharma refers to the aggregates, and so on, of migrating beings.

original: thams cad ni rdul phra rab kyis bsdus pa dang cig shos so //
analyzed: thams cad ni rdul phra rab kyis bsdus pa dang cig shos so //
translated: All refers to the subtle particles and the rest.

original: rnam par shes pa ni gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i don ye shes su blos 'jug cing shes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i don ye shes su blos 'jug cing shes pa'o //
translated: Consciousness is the object that is free from one and many, which is entered into and known by the mind as gnosis.

original: de bas na /🔽ye shes bya ba'i don grub byed //
analyzed: de bas na / ye shes bya ba'i don grub byed //
translated: Therefore,

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: it is said, “It is the one that accomplishes the object called gnosis.”

original: de ni sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa'i don to //
analyzed: de ni sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa'i don to //
translated: That is the meaning of abandoning the two obscurations.

original: ye shes la sogs pa bshad nas /
analyzed: ye shes la sogs pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained pristine consciousness and so on,

original: rnam par 'byed pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa gsungs so //
translated: the explanation of the distinctions is as follows:🔽The distinctions are the light, form, and fame.

original: rnam par 'byed pa 'od gzugs grags //🔽zhes bya ba la @219b sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa 'od gzugs grags // zhes bya ba la @219b sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
translated: The light, form, and fame are explained.

original: byang chub sems kyi thig ler lhag par bya ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi thig ler lhag par bya ba ni /
translated: The distinctions of the bindu of bodhicitta are🔽the light, form, and fame.

original: rnam par 'byed pa'i 'od gzugs grags //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa'i 'od gzugs grags //
translated: The form of the bindu of light

original: zhes bya ba ste /🔽'od kyi thig le'i gzugs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste / 'od kyi thig le'i gzugs so //
translated: is the method.

original: tshul ni tshul gyi thig le /
analyzed: tshul ni tshul gyi thig le /
translated: The method is the bindu of the method.

original: sprin ni sprin gyi thig le /
analyzed: sprin ni sprin gyi thig le /
translated: The cloud is the bindu of the cloud.

original: stobs ni stobs kyi thig le'o //
analyzed: stobs ni stobs kyi thig le'o //
translated: Power is the bindu of power.

original: de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyang bsdu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyang bsdu'o //
translated: The others should be compiled in the same way.🔽The distinctions of the sixteen joys are the distinctions of the bindu of bliss.

original: bdag nyid ni bde ba'i thig le bcu drug gi bdag nyid rnam par 'byed ba'o //🔽de rang las 'byed pa ni /🔽rnam par 'byed pa ni /
analyzed: bdag nyid ni bde ba'i thig le bcu drug gi bdag nyid rnam par 'byed ba'o // de rang las 'byed pa ni / rnam par 'byed pa ni /
translated: The distinctions of those are the distinctions of the bindu of the self.🔽The distinctions are the distinctions of the bindu of the self.

original: rnam par 'byed pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa ste /
translated: The distinctions are the distinctions of the bindu of the self.

original: rten med par byed pa'i tha tshig go //🔽dngos po kun ni dga' ba dang / byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i thig le rnams so //
analyzed: rten med par byed pa'i tha tshig go //🔽dngos po kun ni dga' ba dang / byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i thig le rnams so //
translated: The distinctions are the distinctions of the bindu of the self.🔽The distinctions are the distinctions of the bindu of the self.🔽The distinctions are the distinctions of the bindu of the self.🔽The distinctions are the distinctions of the bindu of the self.🔽The distinctions are the distinctions of the bindu of the self.🔽The distinctions are the distinctions of the bindu of the self.🔽The distinctions are the distinctions of the bindu of the self.🔽The distinctions are the distinctions of the bindu of the self.🔽The distinctions are the distinctions of the bindu of the self.🔽The distinctions are the distinctions of the bindu of the self.🔽The distinctions are the distinctions of the bindu of the self.

original: rnam pa ni khyad par sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa mang po rnams so //
analyzed: rnam pa ni khyad par sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa mang po rnams so //
translated: The aspects are the many aspects of various distinctions.

original: gnas ni rtsa'i mdud pa'i gnas bsdu'o //
analyzed: gnas ni rtsa'i mdud pa'i gnas bsdu'o //
translated: The location is the location of the knots of the nāḍīs.

original: bcas pa ni rtsa dang thig le la sogs par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bcas pa ni rtsa dang thig le la sogs par ldan pa'o //
translated: The connection is the connection with the nāḍīs, bindus, and so on.

original: thim pa ni dngos po dngos po med par te /
analyzed: thim pa ni dngos po dngos po med par te /
translated: Dissolution is the dissolution of entities into nonentities.

original: 'di ni chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: This is the characteristic of the utterly pure dharmakāya.

original: chos kyi sku'i lus 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa /🔽rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing /
analyzed: chos kyi sku'i lus 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa / rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing /
translated: This body of the dharmakāya is without beginning or end.🔽It is naturally pure

original: 'od gsal ba chos kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: 'od gsal ba chos kyi rang bzhin te /
translated: and luminous by nature.

original: dus thams cad du //
analyzed: dus thams cad du //
translated: At all times,

original: de bzhin nyid du mdzad ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du mdzad ba'o //
translated: it is made into suchness.

original: chos kyi sku 'di ni gzugs kyi sku dang / chos rnams kyi gnas dang / rgyu 'bras kyi skur gsungs pa'o ;
analyzed: chos kyi sku 'di ni gzugs kyi sku dang / chos rnams kyi gnas dang / rgyu 'bras kyi skur gsungs pa'o ;
translated: This dharmakāya is said to be the body of form, the location of phenomena, and the body of cause and result.

original: / gnyis pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: / gnyis pa gsungs pa /
translated: The second is stated:

original: skye dang gnas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi //
analyzed: skye dang gnas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi //
translated: Birth, location, and miracles

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

original: skye ba ni chu las nya bzhin du chos kyi sku las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: skye ba ni chu las nya bzhin du chos kyi sku las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: Birth is the enjoyment body from the dharma body, like a fish from water.

original: gnas pa ni zhing yongs su dag pa na /
analyzed: gnas pa ni zhing yongs su dag pa na /
translated: Abiding is in a pure land,

original: mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa zla med pa'i che ba'i yon tan mang pos brgyan pa /
analyzed: mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa zla med pa'i che ba'i yon tan mang pos brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with many unequaled great qualities such as the thirty-two excellent signs.

original: 'ja' tshon lta bu'i sku mdzes pa /
analyzed: 'ja' tshon lta bu'i sku mdzes pa /
translated: The body is beautiful like a rainbow.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyod par 'os pas na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyod par 'os pas na /
translated: Since it is suitable for bodhisattvas to practice,

original: longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: longs spyod pa'o //
translated: it is enjoyment.

original: rtag par gdul bya'i don byed pas na /
analyzed: rtag par gdul bya'i don byed pas na /
translated: Since it always benefits those to be tamed,

original: rgyun gyis rtag tu gnas pa'o //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rgyun gyis rtag tu gnas pa'o // rdzu 'phrul gyis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: it always abides continuously.

original: de las sprul pa'i sku sprul nas /
analyzed: de las sprul pa'i sku sprul nas /
translated: Emanation is the emanation body from the enjoyment body.

original: re re zhing yang gdul bya'i dbang gis don mdzad par sprul pa'i sku bye ba mtha' yas pa de las kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: re re zhing yang gdul bya'i dbang gis don mdzad par sprul pa'i sku bye ba mtha' yas pa de las kyang de bzhin no //
translated: From that, there are also emanations of the emanation body that benefit each one to be tamed through infinite millions of emanations.

original: de yang 'di skad du /
analyzed: de yang 'di skad du /
translated: That is also stated:

original: rang gi rig pa de nyid ni //
analyzed: rang gi rig pa de nyid ni //
translated: That very self-awareness

original: gzhan gyis brjod las mi 'byung ste //
analyzed: gzhan gyis brjod las mi 'byung ste //
translated: does not arise from the expression of another.

original: mos dang bsgoms pas rtog 'gyur gyi //
analyzed: mos dang bsgoms pas rtog 'gyur gyi //
translated: It is realized through interest and meditation.

original: rtogs pa de nyid @220a * //
analyzed: rtogs pa de nyid @220a * //
translated: That very realization

original: gzhan du min //🔽zhes pas na'o //
analyzed: gzhan du min // zhes pas na'o //
translated: is not elsewhere.

original: yang 'di skad du /
analyzed: yang 'di skad du /
translated: And again, it is said:

original: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can //
translated: The nature of method and wisdom,

original: nyon mongs kun las rnam grol zhing //
analyzed: nyon mongs kun las rnam grol zhing //
translated: completely liberated from all afflictions,

original: mtshan rnams kun gyi rang brgyan par //
analyzed: mtshan rnams kun gyi rang brgyan par //
translated: adorned with all the major marks,

original: stong nyid ye shes las byung ba //
analyzed: stong nyid ye shes las byung ba //
translated: arising from the wisdom of emptiness,

original: spro zhing sdud par byed pa yi //
analyzed: spro zhing sdud par byed pa yi //
translated: expanding and contracting,

original: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing /
analyzed: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing /
translated: endowed with the supreme of all aspects,

original: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
translated: free from the duality of subject and object,

original: ye shes sgyu ma 'dra zhing rtag / ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ye shes sgyu ma 'dra zhing rtag / ces gsungs so //
translated: the wisdom illusion-like and permanent.

original: yang 'di skad du //
analyzed: yang 'di skad du //
translated: And again, it is said:

original: sangs rgyas nyid las sangs rgyas nyid //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid las sangs rgyas nyid //
translated: From buddhahood itself, buddhahood

original: dpag med rigs su sprul ba ni //
analyzed: dpag med rigs su sprul ba ni //
translated: emanates immeasurable emanations,

original: 'gro ba gdul bya'i bsam pa'i rgyud //🔽de bzhin du yang sbrul  skus mdzad //
analyzed: 'gro ba gdul bya'i bsam pa'i rgyud // de bzhin du yang sbrul  skus mdzad //
translated: in accordance with the mental continuum of beings to be tamed.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: In the same way, the emanation body acts.

original: der gsum po'i don bstan nas /
analyzed: der gsum po'i don bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the meaning of those three,

original: de dag gi 'byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de dag gi 'byed pa gsungs pa /
