translated: the divisions of those are taught:

original: rnam par 'byed pa gti mug 'joms //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa gti mug 'joms //
translated: The analysis conquers delusion.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is said:

original: gti mug gi sgras ni 'dod chags dang / zhes sdang dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog go //
analyzed: gti mug gi sgras ni 'dod chags dang / zhes sdang dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog go //
translated: aversion, pride, and envy.

original: 'khor lo ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The “wheel” is the maṇḍala of the creation stage.

original: sngags ni de rnams kyi bzlas pa dang / bskyed pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags ni de rnams kyi bzlas pa dang / bskyed pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The “mantra” is the repetition of those [mantras], the creation, and so on.

original: bya ba ni phrin las rnams so //
analyzed: bya ba ni phrin las rnams so //
translated: “Action” is the activities.

original: de rnams kun 'joms pas na /
analyzed: de rnams kun 'joms pas na /
translated: Since all of those are destroyed,

original: 'joms byed de ni rnam par 'byed //
analyzed: 'joms byed de ni rnam par 'byed //
translated: it is the destroyer, which is the analysis.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is stated.

original: rtsa'i snying po ni 'dab ma gsum pa'i lte ba'i rtog med ma'o //
analyzed: rtsa'i snying po ni 'dab ma gsum pa'i lte ba'i rtog med ma'o //
translated: The “essence of the nāḍīs” is the nonconceptual gnosis in the center of the three petals.

original: thams cad ni zur gsum la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad ni zur gsum la sogs pa'o //
translated: “All” is the three corners, and so on.

original: bcom pa ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings su bcom pa ste /
analyzed: bcom pa ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings su bcom pa ste /
translated: “Destroyed” means destroyed in the nondual dharmadhātu.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i sgra'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i sgra'o //
translated: The term “bhagavān” means “possessing that.”

original: phyir ni gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: phyir ni gtan tshigs te /
translated: “Because” is the reason.

original: mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa'i don to //
analyzed: mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa'i don to //
translated: It means “possessing the absence of that.”

original: rnam par 'byed pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa ni /
translated: “Analysis”

original: mtshan ma'i dngos po las 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i dngos po las 'byed pa'o //
translated: means separating from signified entities.

original: ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
translated: “Wisdom” is the gnosis of the dharmadhātu.

original: snying po ni de rang mthar thug pa'i mchog go //
analyzed: snying po ni de rang mthar thug pa'i mchog go //
translated: The essence is that very ultimate supreme.

original: mtha' ni chos nyid dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' ni chos nyid dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The end is together with reality.

original: de nas ye shes kyang de nyid snying po yang de nyid /
analyzed: de nas ye shes kyang de nyid snying po yang de nyid /
translated: Then, the wisdom is that very essence,

original: rnam par 'byed pa gsal bar byed //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa gsal bar byed //
translated: and the analysis is the illumination.

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: This is what is said.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes snang ba nyid gsal ba'i bdag nyid ces so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes snang ba nyid gsal ba'i bdag nyid ces so //
translated: The wisdom of the dharmadhatu is the illumination itself, the nature of clarity.

original: shin tu ni phul du byung ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: shin tu ni phul du byung ba'i ye shes so //
translated: Very is the supreme wisdom.

original: bde ba ni yang dag pa'i mchog go //
analyzed: bde ba ni yang dag pa'i mchog go //
translated: Bliss is the supreme, true joy.

original: byed pa'i phyir ni rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes de kho na nyid kyis /
analyzed: byed pa'i phyir ni rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes de kho na nyid kyis /
translated: Because of the action, the wisdom of analysis is that very reality.

original: phul du byung ba'i yang dag pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phul du byung ba'i yang dag pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is said that it creates the supreme, true joy.

original: des na rnam par @220b 'byed pa'i de kho na nyid phyir brjod ces gsungs so //
analyzed: des na rnam par @220b 'byed pa'i de kho na nyid phyir brjod ces gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the reality of analysis is expressed.

original: sku gsum mi phyed pa'i don gsungs pa /
analyzed: sku gsum mi phyed pa'i don gsungs pa /
translated: The meaning of the indivisibility of the three kayas is stated:

original: gnyis su med pa'i mchog zhi ba //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i mchog zhi ba //
translated: The supreme peace of nonduality

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa ni gnyis te /
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa ni gnyis te /
translated: The concepts of apprehended and apprehender are the two.

original: de bzhin du gnyis pa thams cad bsdu ba ni gnyis su med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gnyis pa thams cad bsdu ba ni gnyis su med pa'o //
translated: Likewise, the second is the inclusion of all in nonduality.

original: nyon mongs pa nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub las khyad par du gyur pas na mchog go //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub las khyad par du gyur pas na mchog go //
translated: It is supreme because it is superior to the enlightenment of the śrāvakas and so on.

original: rab bo // de kho na nyid don dam pa spros pa dang bral ba /
analyzed: rab bo // de kho na nyid don dam pa spros pa dang bral ba /
translated: It is excellent because it is the object of the highest wisdom.

original: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa kun zhi bas na zhi ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa kun zhi bas na zhi ba'o //
translated: It is peace because it is the pacification of all afflictions and branch afflictions.

original: chags pa ni /
analyzed: chags pa ni /
translated: Attachment is

original: 'khor ba'i dngos po rnams so //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i dngos po rnams so //
translated: the things of cyclic existence.

original: chags bral ni nyan thos kyi stong pa phyogs gcig pa'o //
analyzed: chags bral ni nyan thos kyi stong pa phyogs gcig pa'o //
translated: Freedom from attachment is the śrāvakas’ emptiness that is a one-sided peace.

original: 'di ni mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pas na /
analyzed: 'di ni mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pas na /
translated: This is not the case, because it does not abide in the two extremes.

original: chags pa dang / chags bral min ni //
analyzed: chags pa dang / chags bral min ni //
translated: Therefore, it is neither attachment nor freedom from attachment.

original: dri ma med pa ni glo bur ba'i dri ma ma rig pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: dri ma med pa ni glo bur ba'i dri ma ma rig pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is stainless because it is free from the adventitious stains of ignorance and so on.

original: nam mkha' la sprin la sogs pa bzhin no //🔽'dus byas ma yin pas na bcos pa med pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la sprin la sogs pa bzhin no // 'dus byas ma yin pas na bcos pa med pa'o //
translated: It is like the sky free from clouds and so on.🔽It is unfabricated because it is not conditioned.

original: rgyud las mi skye ba'i rgyu dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rgyud las mi skye ba'i rgyu dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is free from cause because it does not arise from a continuum.

original: a'a li k'a li las ma skyes pa'i phyir sngags dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li las ma skyes pa'i phyir sngags dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is free from mantra because it does not arise from ālikāli.

original: bskyed rim rdzogs rim las mi skye ba'i phyir rim pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: bskyed rim rdzogs rim las mi skye ba'i phyir rim pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is free from stages because it does not arise from the creation and completion stages.

original: rang rig pa dang brjod du med //
analyzed: rang rig pa dang brjod du med //
translated: It is self-awareness and inexpressible.

original: thams cad khyab dang dbyer med pa ;🔽/ zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: thams cad khyab dang dbyer med pa ; / zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It pervades everything and is indivisible.

original: brjod du med pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes spros pa dang bral ba chos thams cad la khyab na /
analyzed: brjod du med pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes spros pa dang bral ba chos thams cad la khyab na /
translated: If the inexpressible, nondual wisdom free from conceptual elaborations pervades all phenomena,

original: yang na mthong ba ma yin pa /
analyzed: yang na mthong ba ma yin pa /
translated: then it is not seen.

original: mtshan dang dpe byad med pa'i bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid ni /
analyzed: mtshan dang dpe byad med pa'i bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid ni /
translated: The nature of great bliss, which is free from the major and minor marks,

original: gzugs kyi sku dang bral ba rang gi rig pa'i ye shes brjod du med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi sku dang bral ba rang gi rig pa'i ye shes brjod du med pa nyid do //
translated: is the inexpressible wisdom of self-awareness, which is free from the rūpakāya.

original: de kho na nyid de yang mdo dang lung dang / 'grel pa la sogs pa'i nang nas gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: de kho na nyid de yang mdo dang lung dang / 'grel pa la sogs pa'i nang nas gsungs pa ni /
translated: That suchness is taught in the sūtras, tantras, and commentaries,

original: rgyas par bshad na /
analyzed: rgyas par bshad na /
translated: and if it is explained extensively,

original: yang na 'dir 'ga' tsam drang por bya ste /
analyzed: yang na 'dir 'ga' tsam drang por bya ste /
translated: or if a little is extracted here,

original: bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas //
translated: it abides in the mode of the two truths.

original: de ni gnyis med ye shes te //
analyzed: de ni gnyis med ye shes te //
translated: That is nondual wisdom.

original: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yin //
analyzed: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yin //
translated: This is nonabiding nirvana.

original: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid //
translated: The Buddha is the very vajra holder.🔽Also, the Tathāgatakośa Sūtra states:

original: ces gsungs pa dang / yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi mdo las mngon par 'du mi byed pa sgyu ma'i chos nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med par rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos la 'jug cing /🔽chos @221a * //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa dang / yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi mdo las mngon par 'du mi byed pa sgyu ma'i chos nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med par rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos la 'jug cing / chos @221a * //
translated: Those who enter into the noncomposite, the illusion-like nature of reality, which is free from afflictions and naturally luminous,🔽and who have faith in and are devoted to the primordial purity of all phenomena, I do not say that such beings will go to the lower realms.

original: thams cad gzod ma nas rnam par dag par mngon par dad pa dang / mos pa'i sems can de ngan song du 'gro zhes nga mi smra'o zhes gsungs pa dang / yang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las kyang 'brel bar bstan te /
analyzed: thams cad gzod ma nas rnam par dag par mngon par dad pa dang / mos pa'i sems can de ngan song du 'gro zhes nga mi smra'o zhes gsungs pa dang / yang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las kyang 'brel bar bstan te /
translated: Also, the Akāśasamatātantra teaches:

original: de nyid gang zhig 'dod pa la //
analyzed: de nyid gang zhig 'dod pa la //
translated: For one who desires thatness,

original: de la de nyid dam pa med //
analyzed: de la de nyid dam pa med //
translated: thatness is not the highest.

original: sa dang pha rol phyin pa yis //
analyzed: sa dang pha rol phyin pa yis //
translated: Through the levels and the perfections,

original: tshe 'dir de nyid thob mi srid //
analyzed: tshe 'dir de nyid thob mi srid //
translated: attaining thatness in this life is not possible.

original: rgyu 'dra de kho na nyid 'di //
analyzed: rgyu 'dra de kho na nyid 'di //
translated: This cause-like thatness

original: gang zhig gis ni rtog rgyur na //
analyzed: gang zhig gis ni rtog rgyur na //
translated: is what is conceptualized.

original: de yis de nyid dam pa 'di //
analyzed: de yis de nyid dam pa 'di //
translated: This thatness is not the highest.

original: nges par de nyid myur du 'thob //
analyzed: nges par de nyid myur du 'thob //
translated: One will certainly attain it quickly.

original: ces pa dang / yang bden pa gnyis su med pas ni rgyu dang 'bras bu dag kyang gnyis su med pa yin la //
analyzed: ces pa dang / yang bden pa gnyis su med pas ni rgyu dang 'bras bu dag kyang gnyis su med pa yin la //
translated: And again, because of the nonduality of the two truths, cause and effect are also nondual.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pas thob pa dang thob par bya ba dag kyang gnyis su med pa yin la //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pas thob pa dang thob par bya ba dag kyang gnyis su med pa yin la //
translated: Because of the nonduality of cause and effect, attainment and that which is attained are also nondual.

original: de dag gnyis su med pas bsgom pa dang / bsgom par bya ba dag kyang gnyis su med pa ste /
analyzed: de dag gnyis su med pas bsgom pa dang / bsgom par bya ba dag kyang gnyis su med pa ste /
translated: Because of their nonduality, meditation and the meditator are also nondual.

original: gnyis su med pa la ni /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa la ni /
translated: In nonduality,

original: sgrub pa dang po dang / bsgrub par bya ba dmigs par mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sgrub pa dang po dang / bsgrub par bya ba dmigs par mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
translated: the first practice and the object of practice are not perceived.

original: de'i phyir bde ba chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / de kho na nyid dang / gnyis su med pa dang / rang rig ba'i ye shes dang / chos nyid dang / don dam pa'i bden pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams ni grangs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir bde ba chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / de kho na nyid dang / gnyis su med pa dang / rang rig ba'i ye shes dang / chos nyid dang / don dam pa'i bden pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams ni grangs so //
translated: Therefore, great bliss, the realm of reality, thatness, nonduality, self-cognizant wisdom, reality, and ultimate truth are synonyms.

original: de'i phyir na /
analyzed: de'i phyir na /
translated: Therefore,

original: de lta bu yi don dam par //
analyzed: de lta bu yi don dam par //
translated: such is the ultimate.

original: lha yi dbang phyug rnam par 'byed //
analyzed: lha yi dbang phyug rnam par 'byed //
translated: The Lord of the Gods is the one who distinguishes.

original: ces gsungs te /
analyzed: ces gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: sdud pa po lha'i dbang phyug la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas /
analyzed: sdud pa po lha'i dbang phyug la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas /
translated: The Lord of the Gods, the compiler, is addressed by the Blessed One, Vajradhara,

original: bde ba chen po gnyis su med par 'byed par gsungs so //
analyzed: bde ba chen po gnyis su med par 'byed par gsungs so //
translated: as the one who distinguishes the nondual great bliss.

original: sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun la ;
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun la ;
translated: To all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas,

original: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: and so forth.

original: sangs rgyas ni dpag tu med pa'i gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyes kyis mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni dpag tu med pa'i gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyes kyis mtshon pa'o //
translated: The Buddhas are symbolized by the number of grains of sand in the river Ganges, which is immeasurable.

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun la de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun la de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
translated: The Bodhisattvas are all explained in the same way.

original: snyig gar rtag tu bzhugs pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i de snyed kyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes ni de nyid 'di yin no //
analyzed: snyig gar rtag tu bzhugs pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i de snyed kyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes ni de nyid 'di yin no //
translated: The true wisdom mind of that many Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, which always abides in the world, is just this.

original: de skad du /🔽gang ga'i klung gi bye snyed kyi //
analyzed: de skad du / gang ga'i klung gi bye snyed kyi //
translated: Thus it is said:🔽The Buddhas, as many as the grains of sand in the Ganges,

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di dag nyid //🔽thugs chud yod med phyogs spangs pas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di dag nyid // thugs chud yod med phyogs spangs pas //
translated: have realized this very thing.🔽The nature of the Great Seal is accomplished

original: phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid grub //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid grub //
translated: by abandoning the extremes of existence and nonexistence.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de'i phyir gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni mkhyen //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni mkhyen //
translated: Therefore, this is known.

original: 'di ni mkhyen zhes bya ba mi mnga' @221b ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di ni mkhyen zhes bya ba mi mnga' @221b ba'i don to //
translated: This is known. The meaning is not having.

original: yang na sangs rgyas ni phung po rnams so //
analyzed: yang na sangs rgyas ni phung po rnams so //
translated: Or, the Buddha is the aggregates.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni skye mched la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni skye mched la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The bodhisattva is the sense bases, etc.

original: kun zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: kun zhes bya ba ni //
translated: All means

original: 'byung ba rnams lha mor bstan pa dang / de re re la yang dbye ba'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba rnams lha mor bstan pa dang / de re re la yang dbye ba'o //
translated: the elements are taught as goddesses, and each of them is divided.

original: snying gar rtag tu bzhugs pa ni /
analyzed: snying gar rtag tu bzhugs pa ni /
translated: Always dwelling in the heart

original: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin dga' ba skyed par mdzad pa dang / rang bzhin du bzhugs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin dga' ba skyed par mdzad pa dang / rang bzhin du bzhugs so //
translated: means generating the joy that is the nature of bodhicitta, and dwelling naturally.

original: rnam par 'byed pa la bsgom pa med ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa la bsgom pa med ces bya ba ni /
translated: There is no meditation on analysis

original: de nyid sgom pa dang / sngags kyis bzlas pa dang / mchod pa la sogs pa spangs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid sgom pa dang / sngags kyis bzlas pa dang / mchod pa la sogs pa spangs pa'o //
translated: means abandoning that very meditation, mantra recitation, worship, and so on.

original: phung po ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phung po ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa'o //
translated: The aggregates are the form aggregate, etc.

original: khams ni sa dang / chu dang ; me dang / rlung gi khams so //
analyzed: khams ni sa dang / chu dang ; me dang / rlung gi khams so //
translated: The elements are the earth, water, fire, and wind elements.

original: sogs pa ni skye mched bcu gnyis ni khams gzhan no //
analyzed: sogs pa ni skye mched bcu gnyis ni khams gzhan no //
translated: The rest are the other elements.

original: bral ba ni rnam par 'byed pa de nyid kyis de rnams kyi rtog pa med pa'o //
analyzed: bral ba ni rnam par 'byed pa de nyid kyis de rnams kyi rtog pa med pa'o //
translated: The separation is the non-conceptualization of those by that very discrimination.

original: sgra ni 'jig rten pa'i sgra'i dngos po'o //
analyzed: sgra ni 'jig rten pa'i sgra'i dngos po'o //
translated: Sound is the worldly thing of sound.

original: sogs pa ni de bzhin du tshad ma dang snyan dang gsal la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sogs pa ni de bzhin du tshad ma dang snyan dang gsal la sogs pa'o //
translated: The rest are the same as valid cognition, pleasant, clear, and so on.

original: chos kyi stong pa ni nyid kyis de rnams stong pa'am dben pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi stong pa ni nyid kyis de rnams stong pa'am dben pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of phenomena is the emptiness or voidness of those.

original: stong pa ni mi dmigs pa'i shes rab chen po'i stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa ni mi dmigs pa'i shes rab chen po'i stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the emptiness of the great non-apprehending wisdom.

original: snying rje ni thabs thugs rje chen po'i dngos po kun rdzob sgyur ma tsam mo //
analyzed: snying rje ni thabs thugs rje chen po'i dngos po kun rdzob sgyur ma tsam mo //
translated: Compassion is the relative mere illusion of the thing of the great compassion method.

original: bdag nyid yin zhes bya ba ni de nyid gnyis kyi bdag po ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid yin zhes bya ba ni de nyid gnyis kyi bdag po ste /
translated: The self is the lord of those two,

original: gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid dam pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid dam pa'o //
translated: the supreme non-dual reality.

original: de'i yon tan gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i yon tan gsungs pa /
translated: His qualities are stated:🔽Brahma, Vishnu, Rudra,

original: tshangs dang khyab 'jug drag po dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: tshangs dang khyab 'jug drag po dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on.

original: de kho na nyid 'di ni gdul bya'i dbang gis ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid tshangs pa la sogs pa yang bstan pa med long lta bu'i ye shes gsal la rtog pa med pa'i bdag nyid de nyid las byung bas tshangs pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid 'di ni gdul bya'i dbang gis ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid tshangs pa la sogs pa yang bstan pa med long lta bu'i ye shes gsal la rtog pa med pa'i bdag nyid de nyid las byung bas tshangs pa'o //
translated: This reality is also taught as Brahma, etc., which are the nature of the five pristine wisdoms, in accordance with the disciples, because it arises from that very nature, which is clear and non-conceptual pristine wisdom, like a lamp in the darkness.

original: de nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du byung zhing sems can kun la khyab 'jug go //
analyzed: de nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du byung zhing sems can kun la khyab 'jug go //
translated: It is Brahma, because it arises as the nature of the pristine wisdom of the ultimate realm, which is completely pure, and pervades all sentient beings.

original: de nyid las so sor rtog pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis so sor rtogs pas na drag po'o //
analyzed: de nyid las so sor rtog pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis so sor rtogs pas na drag po'o //
translated: It is Rudra, because it is individually discriminating, by the nature of the pristine wisdom of individual investigation.

original: de nyid las chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis mnyam par dbang byed pas na dbang phyug //
analyzed: de nyid las chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis mnyam par dbang byed pas na dbang phyug //
translated: It is Isvara, because it controls all phenomena equally, by the nature of the pristine wisdom of the sameness of all phenomena.

original: de nyid las bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi mtshan nyid rang bzhin du zhi ba ster bas na zhi ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid las bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi mtshan nyid rang bzhin du zhi ba ster bas na zhi ba'o //
translated: It is Santi, because it bestows the nature of peace, which is the characteristic of the benefit of all sentient beings, by the nature of the pristine wisdom of successful activities.

original: de rnams ni @222a * //🔽rigs lnga'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i tshangs pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams ni @222a * // rigs lnga'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i tshangs pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: These are Brahmā and so forth, endowed with the characteristics of the five families.

original: de nyid las ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid du byung bas ni yab yin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid las ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid du byung bas ni yab yin pa'o //
translated: Since they arise as the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses, they are the fathers.

original: yang 'di skad ste /
analyzed: yang 'di skad ste /
translated: Moreover, it is said:

original: dpal mchog dang po'i cho gar yang /
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i cho gar yang /
translated: In the ritual of the glorious Supreme Original Buddha,

original: tshangs dang drag po sogs bsgom pa //
analyzed: tshangs dang drag po sogs bsgom pa //
translated: the meditation on Brahmā, Rudra, and so forth

original: des 'dul ba la gsungs pa ni ;
analyzed: des 'dul ba la gsungs pa ni ;
translated: is said to be for those to be tamed

original: / de nyid la ni 'jug phyir yin //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: / de nyid la ni 'jug phyir yin // zhes gsungs so //
translated: in order to enter into reality.

original: gzhan na re lus la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rnams de nyid las byung ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan na re lus la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rnams de nyid las byung ba'i don to //
translated: Others say that the wheels that exist in the body arise from that reality.

original: de nyid las rlung gi 'khor lo des tshangs pa'i ye shes skyed pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid las rlung gi 'khor lo des tshangs pa'i ye shes skyed pa'o //
translated: From that, the wheel of air generates the pristine consciousness of Brahmā.

original: de nyid las me'i 'khor lo des ye shes la khyab pa'i drod de ni khyab 'jug go ;
analyzed: de nyid las me'i 'khor lo des ye shes la khyab pa'i drod de ni khyab 'jug go ;
translated: From that, the wheel of fire generates the heat that pervades pristine consciousness, which is Viṣṇu.

original: / de nyid las sprul pa'i 'khor lo de'i ye shes drag 'dzin ma las byung ba ni drag po'o //
analyzed: / de nyid las sprul pa'i 'khor lo de'i ye shes drag 'dzin ma las byung ba ni drag po'o //
translated: From that, the wheel of emanation generates the pristine consciousness of Rudra from the fierce one.

original: de nyid las bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo de'i ye shes gzhan ma'i ye shes la dbang byed pa ni dbang phyug go //
analyzed: de nyid las bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo de'i ye shes gzhan ma'i ye shes la dbang byed pa ni dbang phyug go //
translated: In that very same [channel], the wheel of great bliss is the lord, since the pristine awareness of that [wheel] controls the pristine awareness of the other [wheels].

original: de nyid las longs spyod kyi 'khor lo der ye shes kyi ros rtog pa'i ro drug zhi ba ni zhi ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid las longs spyod kyi 'khor lo der ye shes kyi ros rtog pa'i ro drug zhi ba ni zhi ba'o //
translated: In that very same [channel], the wheel of enjoyment is peace, since the taste of pristine awareness in that [wheel] pacifies the six tastes of conceptualization.

original: de nyid las de rnams byung ba ni pha rol gyi yin zer ro //
analyzed: de nyid las de rnams byung ba ni pha rol gyi yin zer ro //
translated: It is said that those [wheels] arise from that [channel].

original: 'byed pa de ni mchog rmad byung //
analyzed: 'byed pa de ni mchog rmad byung //
translated: That division is the supreme, the marvelous.

original: zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni //
translated: This is what is said.

original: de nyid 'jig rten gyi lha tshangs pa la sogs pa las mchog //
analyzed: de nyid 'jig rten gyi lha tshangs pa la sogs pa las mchog //
translated: That very [channel] is supreme over the worldly gods, such as Brahmā, and so forth.

original: de nyid ni de'i gong na gzhan med pas rmad du byung ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni de'i gong na gzhan med pas rmad du byung ba'o //
translated: That very [channel] is marvelous, since there is nothing higher than that.

original: de nyid ye shes thig le 'dir //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes thig le 'dir //
translated: That very [channel] is the drop of pristine awareness here.

original: zhes 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba ni /
translated: This is what is said.

original: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le de'i don ston pa'i skabs su ni //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le de'i don ston pa'i skabs su ni //
translated: In the context of teaching the meaning of the glorious Bhagavān Drop of Pristine Awareness,

original: 'dir de kho na nyid 'di mchog go //
analyzed: 'dir de kho na nyid 'di mchog go //
translated: this reality is supreme here.

original: mchog rnams ni mang po dag gi mchog gi ye shes so //
analyzed: mchog rnams ni mang po dag gi mchog gi ye shes so //
translated: The supreme ones are the supreme pristine awareness of the many.

original: grub pa ni de nyid mchog dam par rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: grub pa ni de nyid mchog dam par rdzogs pa'o //
translated: Accomplishment is the perfect completion of that very supreme sacred [pristine awareness].

original: mnga' bdag ni ye shes rnams kyi mchog gi mnga' bdag ste /
analyzed: mnga' bdag ni ye shes rnams kyi mchog gi mnga' bdag ste /
translated: The Lord is the Lord of the supreme pristine wisdoms.

original: de nyid grub pa yang yin la mnga' bdag kyang yin te bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid grub pa yang yin la mnga' bdag kyang yin te bsdus pa'o //
translated: He is the one who has accomplished reality and is the Lord, the summary.

original: 'byung ba'i sgras sems can rnams so //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i sgras sems can rnams so //
translated: The word “arising” refers to sentient beings.

original: kun ni thams cad do //
analyzed: kun ni thams cad do //
translated: “All” means everything.

original: de ni sems can thams cad bsdu'o //
analyzed: de ni sems can thams cad bsdu'o //
translated: That is the summary of all sentient beings.

original: yang na 'byung ba ni sa la sogs pa'i 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: yang na 'byung ba ni sa la sogs pa'i 'byung ba'o //
translated: Alternatively, “arising” refers to the elements such as earth.

original: des brtan g-yo la khyab po ;
analyzed: des brtan g-yo la khyab po ;
translated: It pervades the animate and inanimate.

original: / kun ni snod bcud gnyis so //
analyzed: / kun ni snod bcud gnyis so //
translated: “All” refers to the two, the environment and the beings in it.

original: nang yod ni des khyab pa'i don to //
analyzed: nang yod ni des khyab pa'i don to //
translated: “Existing within” means that it pervades them.

original: sku lnga zhes 'byung ba ni sngar bshad pa byas so //
analyzed: sku lnga zhes 'byung ba ni sngar bshad pa byas so //
translated: The five bodies have been explained above.

original: bdag nyid rab mchod yin zhes 'byung ba ni pha rol zhes pa'i tha tshigs go //
analyzed: bdag nyid rab mchod yin zhes 'byung ba ni pha rol zhes pa'i tha tshigs go //
translated: The line “one’s own highest worship” is the reason for the line “to others.”

original: mkha' 'gro dbang phyug lnga zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dbang phyug lnga zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The five dakini lords are

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa @222b nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa @222b nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o //
translated: Vairochana and so forth, who move in the sky.

original: lnga ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro la sogs pa lnga'o //
analyzed: lnga ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro la sogs pa lnga'o //
translated: The five are the five dakinis such as Buddha dakini.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyis gtso bo byas pa'i 'khor lha mo dang bcas pa ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyis gtso bo byas pa'i 'khor lha mo dang bcas pa ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'o //
translated: The retinue headed by Vairocana together with the goddesses are the Buddha dakinis.

original: de bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang // rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa dang ; rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang // rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa dang ; rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'o //
translated: Similarly, Akshobhya, Ratnasambhava, Amitabha, Amoghasiddhi, and Vajradaka and so forth.

original: bdag po ni de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: bdag po ni de kho na nyid do //
translated: The lord is reality.

original: mkha' 'gro lnga zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro lnga zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The five dakinis are

original: sngar gyi rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: sngar gyi rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: the Tathagatas Vairocana and so forth as before.

original: bdag nyid skyed med ni sngar bshad pa bzhin ni //
analyzed: bdag nyid skyed med ni sngar bshad pa bzhin ni //
translated: The self-arisen is as explained before.

original: nam mkha' lnga ni nang du thim //
analyzed: nam mkha' lnga ni nang du thim //
translated: The five space elements dissolve into the inner space.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba lnga'i nang du thim pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba lnga'i nang du thim pa'o //
translated: This means that the five elements dissolve into the inner space.

original: gzhan na re phung po lnga'i nang du thim zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan na re phung po lnga'i nang du thim zer ro //
translated: Others say that they dissolve into the five aggregates.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byed pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byed pa //
translated: The homage of all the Buddhas

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means🔽that the Buddhas of the three times pay homage to and honor

original: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ji snyed bzhugs pa'i phyag bya ba dang / bkur ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ji snyed bzhugs pa'i phyag bya ba dang / bkur ba'i gnas so //
translated: It is the object of homage and veneration of all the Buddhas of the three times.🔽

original: phung po lnga la sogs pa dang / de la gzhan pa kun gyis kyang phyag bya ba'i gnas so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: phung po lnga la sogs pa dang / de la gzhan pa kun gyis kyang phyag bya ba'i gnas so zhes pa'o //
translated: is the object of salutation by all the aggregates, etc., and by all other things.

original: de lta'i gsang chen ye shes ni //
analyzed: de lta'i gsang chen ye shes ni //
translated: The intuition of that great secret

original: zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir na gsang ba chen po'i ye shes so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir na gsang ba chen po'i ye shes so //
translated: is the intuition of the great secret because it is not the domain of experience of the Sravakas, Pratyekabuddhas, etc.

original: ye shes zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: ye shes zhes bya ba ni //
translated: Intuition is

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de kho na nyid do //
translated: the reality of nondual intuition.

original: dbang po zhes bya ba ni bdag po'i don to //
analyzed: dbang po zhes bya ba ni bdag po'i don to //
translated: The word “lord” has the sense of “master.”

original: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes 'di rnyed par dka' bas na rnyed par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes 'di rnyed par dka' bas na rnyed par dka' ba'o //
translated: This intuition of reality is difficult to attain, hence it is “difficult to attain.”

original: dpe ci dang mtshungs par rnyed par dka' snyam pa la //
analyzed: dpe ci dang mtshungs par rnyed par dka' snyam pa la //
translated: What is it like, this intuition that is difficult to attain?

original: de'i don gsungs pa //
analyzed: de'i don gsungs pa //
translated: The meaning of that is stated:

original: ji ltar nor kun mi rnyed bzhin //🔽zhes 'byung ba ni //
analyzed: ji ltar nor kun mi rnyed bzhin // zhes 'byung ba ni //
translated: Just like wealth is not found.

original: ji ltar nor bu rin po che shin tu dkon pa'i phra mo mun pa'i nang na gnas pa de //
analyzed: ji ltar nor bu rin po che shin tu dkon pa'i phra mo mun pa'i nang na gnas pa de //
translated: Just as a precious gem, which is very rare, is hidden in the darkness,

original: mar me'i thabs kyis ma brtsal bar du mi rnyed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mar me'i thabs kyis ma brtsal bar du mi rnyed pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as a lamp is not found until one searches for it with a method.

original: 'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya //
analyzed: 'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya //
translated: It should be concealed with effort.

original: zhes 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba ni /
translated: This is stated.

original: nor bu rin po che rnyed na za ma tog la sogs par sped pa bzhin du //
analyzed: nor bu rin po che rnyed na za ma tog la sogs par sped pa bzhin du //
translated: When a precious gem is found, it is hidden in a box, etc.

original: 'dir yang shin tu wa ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang shin tu wa ba ste /
translated: Here also, it is very hidden.

original: snod dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sbyin par ma gsungs so //
analyzed: snod dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sbyin par ma gsungs so //
translated: It is not taught to be given to sentient beings who are not suitable vessels.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u dang po'i bshad /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u dang po'i bshad /
translated: The Explanation of the First Chapter of the Glorious Wisdom-Essence Tantra, Called the Secret Suchness

original: // / dang por bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang phyug la de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa de'i don gsal @223a * //🔽bar 'dod nas /
analyzed: // / dang por bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang phyug la de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa de'i don gsal @223a * // bar 'dod nas /
translated: First, the Bhagavān said to the Lord of Gods, The essence of the three suchnesses... and so on. Desiring to clarify the meaning of that,

original: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol ba zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi 'dir zhugs pa ste /
analyzed: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol ba zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi 'dir zhugs pa ste /
translated: the Lord of Gods made a request, which is the continuation of the previous.

original: kye bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni //
translated: O Bhagavān...

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa kun bcom pa mchog gi ye shes dang ldan pa ste bcom ldan no //🔽de nyid gsum bdag rang ngo ci //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa kun bcom pa mchog gi ye shes dang ldan pa ste bcom ldan no // de nyid gsum bdag rang ngo ci //
translated: The Bhagavat is endowed with the supreme intuition that has destroyed all afflictions such as passion.

original: zhes 'byung ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad gcig gis sngar gyi don zhus pa'o //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad gcig gis sngar gyi don zhus pa'o //
translated: The verse What is the nature of the three realities? and so on, is the question about the above meaning.

original: de'i lan gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i lan gsungs pa /
translated: The answer is stated:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Bhagavat said

original: 'og nas 'byung ba 'di'o //
analyzed: 'og nas 'byung ba 'di'o //
translated: is the following.

original: gang gi don du bka' stsal zhe na //
analyzed: gang gi don du bka' stsal zhe na //
translated: For what purpose did he say it?

original: gdul bar bya ba'i sems can rnams kyi don du ;
analyzed: gdul bar bya ba'i sems can rnams kyi don du ;
translated: For the sake of those sentient beings to be trained.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bka' stsal zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bka' stsal zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: It is to be supplied that the Bhagavat said to the Bodhisattva-mahasattva Devaraja.

original: de nyid gsum ni sku gsung thugs //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid gsum ni sku gsung thugs // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The three realities are body, speech, and mind.🔽 The verse The cause of the three realities is body, speech, and mind and so on was spoken.

original: de nyid gsum gyi rgyu ni lus dang ngag dang sems so //
analyzed: de nyid gsum gyi rgyu ni lus dang ngag dang sems so //
translated: The cause of the three realities is body, speech, and mind.

original: de dag rnam par dag pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs su 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag rnam par dag pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs su 'gyur te /
translated: Their purification is body, speech, and mind.

original: 'dir sems can gyi gnas skabs su ni rgyu can yin la /
analyzed: 'dir sems can gyi gnas skabs su ni rgyu can yin la /
translated: Here, in the state of sentient beings, it is the cause.

original: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'gyur ba sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'gyur ba sngar bzhin no //
translated: The transformation of the vajra body, etc. is as before.

original: lus la sogs pa sems kyi rang bzhin dang 'bral ba'am /
analyzed: lus la sogs pa sems kyi rang bzhin dang 'bral ba'am /
translated: Since the body, etc. are devoid of the nature of mind,

original: yang sngar gyi bzhin pas na rdo rje gsum zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: yang sngar gyi bzhin pas na rdo rje gsum zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: or since they are as before, they are also called the three vajras.

original: zla ba bde ba mchog ni gang //🔽zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: zla ba bde ba mchog ni gang // zhes bya ba ni //
translated: What is the moon, supreme bliss?

original: sha'kya'i bdag nyid do //🔽de las sems can 'byung ba'am //
analyzed: sha'kya'i bdag nyid do // de las sems can 'byung ba'am //
translated: It is the nature of the Śākya.🔽From that, sentient beings arise,

original: 'di las ri bong can skye ba'o //
analyzed: 'di las ri bong can skye ba'o //
translated: or from that, the moon is born.

original: phung po ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa lnga'o //
analyzed: phung po ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa lnga'o //
translated: The aggregates are the five, beginning with the form aggregate.

original: dbang po ni mig gi dbang po la sogs pa drug go //
analyzed: dbang po ni mig gi dbang po la sogs pa drug go //
translated: The faculties are the six, beginning with the eye faculty.

original: de'i bdag nyid skyed mched dang khams bco brgyad do //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid skyed mched dang khams bco brgyad do //
translated: The eighteen elements are the nature of those.

original: khams zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: khams zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The elements are

original: sa'i khams la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams la sogs pa'o //
translated: the earth element, etc.

original: phyag rgya chen po zhes 'byung ba ni //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po zhes 'byung ba ni //
translated: The great seal is

original: lus kyi dngos po rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi dngos po rdzogs pa'o //
translated: the complete entity of the body.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sems yin te //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sems yin te //
translated: The vajra is the mind.

original: de'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sems lus la gnas pa'o //🔽snying po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sems lus la gnas pa'o // snying po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The mind endowed with that nature abides in the body.🔽The essence is the meaning of sukṣa.

original: shuksha'i don to de'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi grub mtha'o //
analyzed: shuksha'i don to de'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi grub mtha'o //
translated: The end is the culmination of sentient beings.

original: bha gar bshad ces bya ba ni //
analyzed: bha gar bshad ces bya ba ni //
translated: It is explained as the bhaga.

original: sems can bha ga las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: sems can bha ga las 'byung ba'o //
translated: It arises from the bhaga of sentient beings.

original: yang na bha ga'i sgras bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: yang na bha ga'i sgras bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: Or, the word bhaga is the Blessed One.

original: 'di ni gcig la gcig rgyu dang 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gcig la gcig rgyu dang 'bras bu'o //
translated: This is the mutual cause and effect.

original: 'dir sems can rgyu'o //
analyzed: 'dir sems can rgyu'o //
translated: Here, sentient beings are the cause.

original: mtha' dang snang ba rnam par @223b shes ;
analyzed: mtha' dang snang ba rnam par @223b shes ;
translated: The end, appearance, and consciousness

original: / zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: are the aggregates, etc.

original: chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: They are seen like the moon in the water.

original: chu zla'i dpes ni kun rdzob sgyur ma'i dngos por snang ba'o //
analyzed: chu zla'i dpes ni kun rdzob sgyur ma'i dngos por snang ba'o //
translated: By the example of the moon in the water, the appearance of relative deceptive things is seen.

original: snang ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: snang ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Appearance means

original: sems can gyi dngos po snang ba'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi dngos po snang ba'o //
translated: the appearance of the entity of sentient beings.

original: las zhes bya ba ni lnga pa'i don to //
analyzed: las zhes bya ba ni lnga pa'i don to //
translated: The word karma means the fifth case.

original: thams cad 'byung zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i chos thams cad rgyu las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad 'byung zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i chos thams cad rgyu las 'byung ba'o //
translated: All arises means that all resultant phenomena arise from the cause.

original: 'bras bu gang yin zhe na //
analyzed: 'bras bu gang yin zhe na //
translated: What is the result?

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is explained:

original: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med //🔽ces bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med // ces bya bas bshad do //
translated: There is neither arising nor cessation.

original: de yis rgyu'i dpal ye shes thig le bstan to //
analyzed: de yis rgyu'i dpal ye shes thig le bstan to //
translated: That explains the glorious pristine consciousness bindu of the cause.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na rgyu ni rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir na sems can rnams so ;
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na rgyu ni rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir na sems can rnams so ;
translated: Why? Because the cause is sentient beings, who possess the potential.

original: / de skad du /
analyzed: / de skad du /
translated: As such, it is said:

original: sa stengs skal min yod min pas //
analyzed: sa stengs skal min yod min pas //
translated: Since it does not exist on the surface of the earth,

original: thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yin //🔽de bas rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni //
analyzed: thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yin // de bas rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni //
translated: all sentient beings will become buddhas.🔽Therefore, do not be discouraged

original: bsgrub las sgyid lug mi bya'o //🔽zhes gsungs pa'o /
analyzed: bsgrub las sgyid lug mi bya'o // zhes gsungs pa'o /
translated: from accomplishing perfect buddhahood.

original: rgyu'i ye shes thig le'i stobs las /
analyzed: rgyu'i ye shes thig le'i stobs las /
translated: The strength of the pristine consciousness bindu of the cause

original: thabs kyi ye shes thig le yun ring po yang nas yang goms pa'i stobs kyis ni //
analyzed: thabs kyi ye shes thig le yun ring po yang nas yang goms pa'i stobs kyis ni //
translated: is the strength of the long-term repeated familiarity with the pristine consciousness bindu of the method.

original: 'bras bu dpal ye shes thig le thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'bras bu dpal ye shes thig le thob par 'gyur te /
translated: The result is the attainment of the glorious pristine consciousness bindu.

original: de ni rgyu'i ye shes thig le'o //
analyzed: de ni rgyu'i ye shes thig le'o //
translated: That is the pristine consciousness bindu of the cause.

original: thabs gang yin snyam pa la /
analyzed: thabs gang yin snyam pa la /
translated: What is the method?

original: thabs kyis bsdus pa 'dir lung gis bshad pa //
analyzed: thabs kyis bsdus pa 'dir lung gis bshad pa //
translated: Here, the explanation by scripture is summarized by means of the method.

original: rdo rje gsungs mchog chen po ni /
analyzed: rdo rje gsungs mchog chen po ni /
translated: The supreme great vajra speech

original: rdo rje gsum gyi mnga' bdag mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi mnga' bdag mchog /
translated: is the supreme lord of the three vajras.

original: rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to meditate on the person of knowledge,

original: rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs //
analyzed: rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs //
translated: the vajra body, speech, and mind

original: mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni //
analyzed: mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni //
translated: are the five aggregates in brief.

original: sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu grags //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu grags //
translated: They are renowned as the five buddhas.

original: rdo rje skye mched nyid dag kyang //
analyzed: rdo rje skye mched nyid dag kyang //
translated: The pure vajra sense bases🔽are the supreme maṇḍala of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog / sa chu spyan ni m'a ma k'i //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog / sa chu spyan ni m'a ma k'i //
translated: Earth and water are Locanā and Māmakī;

original: dkar mo sgrol ma me rlung grags //🔽mkha' dbyings rdo rje dam tshig ni //
analyzed: dkar mo sgrol ma me rlung grags // mkha' dbyings rdo rje dam tshig ni //
translated: white and red are renowned as Pāṇḍaravāsinī and Tārā.🔽The space element is the commitment of the vajra sphere;

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid yin //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid yin //
translated: Vajradhara is suchness.

original: zhes pa dang // rgyud kyi rim pas lha mo dang gnas kyi dgongs pa yang zhal las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa dang // rgyud kyi rim pas lha mo dang gnas kyi dgongs pa yang zhal las shes par bya'o //
translated: And the intention of the goddesses and the places should be understood from the guru’s instruction.

original: yang gzhan las //
analyzed: yang gzhan las //
translated: Moreover, it says in another tantra:

original: phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes ni //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes ni //
translated: The pristine consciousness of the great seal

original: drug pa rnam dag gnyis su med //
analyzed: drug pa rnam dag gnyis su med //
translated: is the pure sixth, nondual.

original: snying po spros pa dang bcas pa //
analyzed: snying po spros pa dang bcas pa //
translated: The essence with elaboration🔽is the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: spros med bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
analyzed: spros med bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
translated: The unelaborate is the Bhagavat himself.

original: kun rdzob dngos por snang ba kun //
analyzed: kun rdzob dngos por snang ba kun //
translated: All the relative appearances of things

original: thams cad chu yi zla bzhin mthong //
analyzed: thams cad chu yi zla bzhin mthong //
translated: are seen as like the moon in water.

original: dri ma med pa'i don dam pa //
analyzed: dri ma med pa'i don dam pa //
translated: The ultimate, which is free of stains,

original: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med //🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med // ces gsungs so //
translated: is unborn and unceasing.

original: yang de nyid gsum ni sku dang gsung dang thugs @224a * //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yang de nyid gsum ni sku dang gsung dang thugs @224a * // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The three realities are the body, speech, and mind.

original: de kho na nyid gsum so //
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum so //
translated: The three realities are the three vajras.

original: ye shes kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pas na rdo rje gsum mo //
analyzed: ye shes kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pas na rdo rje gsum mo //
translated: Since they are inseparable by nature from pristine awareness, they are the three vajras.

original: zla ba bde mchog ni //
analyzed: zla ba bde mchog ni //
translated: The supreme bliss of the moon

original: zla ba bde mchog gi don gyi phung po la sogs ba'i bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: zla ba bde mchog gi don gyi phung po la sogs ba'i bde ba chen po'o //
translated: is the great bliss of the aggregate of reality and so forth of the supreme moon.

original: phyag rgya chen po ni nyid la nyid sgras bshad par dgongs te /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po ni nyid la nyid sgras bshad par dgongs te /
translated: The great seal is explained by the word itself, in the sense of the great seal being itself.

original: sku gsum gyi bdag nyid pas na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: sku gsum gyi bdag nyid pas na rdo rje'o //
translated: It is a vajra because it is the nature of the three bodies.

original: chos thams cad kyi snying po yin pa'i phyir rdo rje snying po'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi snying po yin pa'i phyir rdo rje snying po'o //
translated: It is a vajra essence because it is the essence of all phenomena.

original: de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin yin pas /
analyzed: de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin yin pas /
translated: Since that is the nature of the Bhagavat,

original: de yi mtha' ni bha gar bstan //
analyzed: de yi mtha' ni bha gar bstan //
translated: its limit is taught to be the bhaga.

original: zhes de rang la mthar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes de rang la mthar bshad pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is explained in the end to itself.

original: mtha' dang zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: mtha' dang zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
translated: The end is easy to understand.

original: sku'i 'khor lo la sogs par yang bstan to //
analyzed: sku'i 'khor lo la sogs par yang bstan to //
translated: It is also taught in the wheel of body, etc.

original: de yis ni thabs kyi dpal ye shes thig le'i bsdus pa'i don bstan to //
analyzed: de yis ni thabs kyi dpal ye shes thig le'i bsdus pa'i don bstan to //
translated: That is the explanation of the meaning of the glorious Means of Awareness, the Drop.

original: 'bras bu'i dpal ye shes thig le gang yin snyam pa'am //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i dpal ye shes thig le gang yin snyam pa'am //
translated: What is the glorious Result of Awareness, the Drop?

original: de'i don gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i don gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: de nyid gsum ni /
analyzed: de nyid gsum ni /
translated: The three realities

original: sku dang gsungs dang thugs /
analyzed: sku dang gsungs dang thugs /
translated: are the body, speech, and mind🔽of the three vajras.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes mchog / ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes mchog / ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni //
translated: The three vajras of the body, speech, and mind of all the Tathagatas

original: bcom ldan 'das nyid du gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nyid du gsungs pa ni /
translated: are said to be the Lord himself.

original: 'di ni ye shes kyi mchog de nyid can no //
analyzed: 'di ni ye shes kyi mchog de nyid can no //
translated: This is the supreme awareness of the three realities.

original: zla ba bde ba mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zla ba bde ba mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The moon, the supreme bliss, etc.

original: nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba las grol ba'i phyir na zla ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba las grol ba'i phyir na zla ba'o //
translated: The moon is so called because it is free from the torment of the afflictions.

original: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le nyid bde ba'i mchog go //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le nyid bde ba'i mchog go //
translated: The Lord, the glorious Means of Awareness, the Drop, is the supreme bliss.

original: phung po zhes bya ba ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no /
analyzed: phung po zhes bya ba ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no /
translated: The so-called aggregates are the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses.🔽

original: dbang po khams zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: dbang po khams zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The so-called aggregates are the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses.🔽The so-called elements and sense organs

original: skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo rnams so //
analyzed: skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo rnams so //
translated: are the bodhisattvas and the maṇḍalas.

original: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni brjod du med pa /🔽ma skyes pa ;
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni brjod du med pa / ma skyes pa ;
translated: The so-called great seal is inexpressible,🔽unborn,

original: ma 'gags pa //
analyzed: ma 'gags pa //
translated: and unceasing.

original: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i gnyis su med pa'i de nyid mi shigs pas /
analyzed: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i gnyis su med pa'i de nyid mi shigs pas /
translated: Since it is indivisible from the indestructible suchness free from all proliferation,

original: rdo rje rdo rje dang 'dra ste dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rdo rje dang 'dra ste dbyer med pa'o //
translated: it is a vajra, like a vajra.

original: snying po zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan ye shes thig le mchog gi gzugs 'dzin pa /
analyzed: snying po zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan ye shes thig le mchog gi gzugs 'dzin pa /
translated: The so-called essence is the Bhagavān holding the supreme form of the sphere of pristine consciousness.

original: 'phags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams dang lhan cig par bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams dang lhan cig par bzhugs pa'o //
translated: He resides together with the retinue of the noble bodhisattvas.🔽Where does he reside?

original: gang du bzhugs she na de'i bzhugs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang du bzhugs she na de'i bzhugs pa gsungs pa /
translated: The explanation of his residence is:

original: de yi mtha' ni bha gar bshad //
analyzed: de yi mtha' ni bha gar bshad //
translated: The end of that is explained as the bhaga.

original: ces bya ba nams dang / 'khor rnam ldan 'das dbus na 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i sgras bshad do //
analyzed: ces bya ba nams dang / 'khor rnam ldan 'das dbus na 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i sgras bshad do //
translated: The retinue is explained by the word “resides.”

original: bha gar zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'byung gnas @224b dkar po gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa'i gnas ni bzhugs ba'o //🔽mtha' dang snang bar shes //
analyzed: bha gar zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'byung gnas @224b dkar po gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa'i gnas ni bzhugs ba'o // mtha' dang snang bar shes //
translated: The Bhagavat is in the bhaga, which is the white source of phenomena together with the celestial mansion.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: The end and appearance are known.

original: mtha' ni chos 'byung dang bcas ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: mtha' ni chos 'byung dang bcas ba'i gnas so //
translated: The end is the place together with the source of phenomena.

original: snang ba ni dkyil 'khor ba'o //
analyzed: snang ba ni dkyil 'khor ba'o //
translated: The appearance is the mandala.

original: rnam par shes pa ni gsal la ma 'dres bar de rnams shes pa'o //🔽chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni gsal la ma 'dres bar de rnams shes pa'o // chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //
translated: Consciousness is the clear and distinct knowledge of those.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is seen like the moon in the water.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mngon sum du gzugs brnan mthong bzhin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi byin yi rlabs dang / bsgoms pa'i stobs la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje dang / smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mthong ba'o //🔽chos kun zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mngon sum du gzugs brnan mthong bzhin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi byin yi rlabs dang / bsgoms pa'i stobs la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje dang / smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mthong ba'o // chos kun zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The bodhisattvas see the form directly, but that is seen by the blessings of the bodhisattvas’ merit, the power of meditation, and so on, and by the compassion and the blessings of the aspirations of the tathāgatas.🔽All phenomena

original: 'khor ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: 'khor ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams so //
translated: are nirvāṇa.

original: rang bzhin dri ma med pa ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin dri ma med pa ni /
translated: The naturally stainless

original: bcom ldan 'das nyid la 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nyid la 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'o //
translated: is the Blessed One himself, unstained by the faults of cyclic existence.

original: yang dag 'od las thams cad byung //
analyzed: yang dag 'od las thams cad byung //
translated: Everything arises from the perfect light.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is

original: dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs la sogs pa dang 'khor ba'i chos thams cad yang dag pa'i 'dor bde kho na nyid las byung ba'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs la sogs pa dang 'khor ba'i chos thams cad yang dag pa'i 'dor bde kho na nyid las byung ba'o //
translated: because all the phenomena of cyclic existence, such as the forms of the maṇḍala, arise from the very essence of the perfect nature.

original: des ni 'bras bu'i dpal ye shes thig le bstan to //
analyzed: des ni 'bras bu'i dpal ye shes thig le bstan to //
translated: This shows the glorious result, the sphere of wisdom.

original: de rnams kyi don ni 'di nyid kyi 'og nas nges par bstan to //
analyzed: de rnams kyi don ni 'di nyid kyi 'og nas nges par bstan to //
translated: The meaning of those [lines] will be definitely shown below.

original: de bzhin du rgyud dang de mtshungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyud dang de mtshungs so //
translated: Similarly, the tantra and its equal.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud la sogs pa gsum du dbye'o //
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud la sogs pa gsum du dbye'o //
translated: The glorious Sphere of Wisdom Tantra is divided into three.

original: de rnams ni chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams ni chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: Those are the nature of all phenomena.

original: de bas na 'di skad du //
analyzed: de bas na 'di skad du //
translated: Therefore, it is said like this:

original: de'i phyir chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the Blessed One, the nature of all phenomena, is the glorious Sphere of Wisdom.

original: lung bstan nas /
analyzed: lung bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the prophecy,🔽now, the explanation of the tantra is as follows:

original: thabs kyi yan lag gi dpal ye shes thig le bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thabs kyi yan lag gi dpal ye shes thig le bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the glorious wisdom drop, which is the branch of method,

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: he says, “there” and so on.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: There means

original: rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / thabs so //
analyzed: rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / thabs so //
translated: cause, effect, and method.

original: dang po zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi dang po'i don yin no //
analyzed: dang po zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi dang po'i don yin no //
translated: First means the meaning of the first method.

original: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bskyed pa'i sgom pa dang zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bskyed pa'i sgom pa dang zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The meditation that generates the mandala wheel with its aspects

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa pho brang dang / lha mo bcu drug dang bcas pa ji ltar ba bzhin no //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa pho brang dang / lha mo bcu drug dang bcas pa ji ltar ba bzhin no //
translated: is just like the creation stage, together with the palace and the sixteen goddesses.

original: sngags zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sngags zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The mantra is

original: so so rang rang lha rnams kyi la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: so so rang rang lha rnams kyi la sogs pa'o //
translated: the individual seed syllables of the deities and so on.

original: bzlas pa zhes bya ba ni yab yum dang khro bo rnams dang / 'khor rnams dang / gtor ma dang / sbyin sreg @225a * //
analyzed: bzlas pa zhes bya ba ni yab yum dang khro bo rnams dang / 'khor rnams dang / gtor ma dang / sbyin sreg @225a * //
translated: Recitation should be understood as the recitation of the fathers, mothers, wrathful ones, retinue, torma, fire puja,

original: la sogs pa'i yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: la sogs pa'i yang shes par bya'o //
translated: and so on.

original: sbyin sreg ni zhi ba la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: sbyin sreg ni zhi ba la sogs pa yin no //
translated: The fire puja is for pacification and so on.

original: mchod sbyin zhes bya ba ni gnyis te /
analyzed: mchod sbyin zhes bya ba ni gnyis te /
translated: Sacrifice is twofold:

original: chos dang zang zing ngo //
analyzed: chos dang zang zing ngo //
translated: Dharma and material.

original: 'dir chos kyi mchod sbyin gtsor byas te /
analyzed: 'dir chos kyi mchod sbyin gtsor byas te /
translated: Here, the Dharma sacrifice is primary.

original: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas su mchod sbyin bya'o //
analyzed: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas su mchod sbyin bya'o //
translated: The sacrifice should be performed in the place and the neighboring place.

original: gtor zhes bya ba ni gtor ma chen po tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: gtor zhes bya ba ni gtor ma chen po tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The offering is the great offering together with the gaṇacakra.

original: mchod pa zhes bya ba ni me tshogs la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i mchod pa'o //🔽gnas kyi brjod pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mchod pa zhes bya ba ni me tshogs la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i mchod pa'o // gnas kyi brjod pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The worship is the worship together with the fire sacrifice and so on.

original: gzhal yas khang dang bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang / dur khrod dang / shing dang dpa' bo la sogs pa dang bcas pa'o //🔽dbang zhes bya ba ni /🔽bum pa'i dbang dang / gsang ba'i dbang dang / zhes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang dang bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang / dur khrod dang / shing dang dpa' bo la sogs pa dang bcas pa'o // dbang zhes bya ba ni / bum pa'i dbang dang / gsang ba'i dbang dang / zhes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang bzhi pa'o //
translated: The place is the description of the celestial mansion, the protection wheel, the charnel grounds, the trees, the heroes, and so on.

original: bskur ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bskur ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The empowerment is the vase empowerment, the secret empowerment, and the gnosis of the wisdom consort empowerment, which is the fourth.

original: slob dpon dang ldan pas de dag dang ldan pa'i dam tshig dang/ man ngag tu bcas pa'i gnas skabs kyis slob ma'i mtshan nyid dang sbyar la bskur ba'o //
analyzed: slob dpon dang ldan pas de dag dang ldan pa'i dam tshig dang/ man ngag tu bcas pa'i gnas skabs kyis slob ma'i mtshan nyid dang sbyar la bskur ba'o //
translated: The conferred is the occasion of the pledges and the intimate instructions that are possessed by the master, which are conferred in conjunction with the characteristics of the disciples.

original: rim pa zhes bya ba ni /🔽rnam pa dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: rim pa zhes bya ba ni / rnam pa dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The so-called stages are

original: dbang bskur ba'i mtha' man chad bkod pa ste /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i mtha' man chad bkod pa ste /
translated: from the one called “with aspects” up to the end of the consecration.

original: de dag bshad ces gsungs par sbyar ro //
analyzed: de dag bshad ces gsungs par sbyar ro //
translated: They are explained, as it is said.

original: de ni mdor bsdus pa'i don to //
analyzed: de ni mdor bsdus pa'i don to //
translated: That is the meaning in brief.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel //
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel //
translated: The commentary on the glorious Essence of Pristine Awareness.

original: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: The explanation of the second chapter called “The Reality of Secrecy.”

original: // / rtsa'i mtshan nyid nges par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir zhus pa /
analyzed: // / rtsa'i mtshan nyid nges par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir zhus pa /
translated: In order to ascertain the characteristics of the channels, it is asked:

original: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Lord of Gods said, and so forth.

original: de'i don gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i don gsungs pa /
translated: The meaning of that is stated:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Blessed One said, and so forth.

original: rtsa'i don gsungs pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: rtsa'i don gsungs pa 'di yin te /
translated: This is the statement of the meaning of the channels:

original: gcig pu zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gcig pu zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The one called

original: dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
translated: has the characteristic of indivisibility.

original: rtog med ma zhes bya ba ni rtog pa 'joms pa ste /
analyzed: rtog med ma zhes bya ba ni rtog pa 'joms pa ste /
translated: The one called “without thought” is the conqueror of thought.

original: gcig pu yang yin la rtog med ma yang yin la /
analyzed: gcig pu yang yin la rtog med ma yang yin la /
translated: She is one and without thought.

original: de bzhin du //
analyzed: de bzhin du //
translated: And so forth.

original: so sho mna' yang de nyid do //
analyzed: so sho mna' yang de nyid do //
translated: The teeth and nails are also that.

original: zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: bye brag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi rtsa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bye brag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi rtsa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The so-called seventy-two thousand channels

original: grangs kyi bdag nyid mtshon pa tsam yin gyis /
analyzed: grangs kyi bdag nyid mtshon pa tsam yin gyis /
translated: are merely an indication of the nature of the number.

original: rigs dang rigs can ni stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: rigs dang rigs can ni stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: The families and those belonging to the families are seventy-two thousand.

original: phra mo ni rtog pa dang ldan pa'i yul ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: phra mo ni rtog pa dang ldan pa'i yul ma yin pa'o //
translated: The subtle is not an object of the conceptual.

original: dra ba ni sgyu ma'i dngos po'o //
analyzed: dra ba ni sgyu ma'i dngos po'o //
translated: The net is the substance of illusion.

original: rol mo ni sprul pa'i lus dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rol mo ni sprul pa'i lus dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The music is endowed with an emanated body.

original: don @225b ni ye shes bskyed par bya ba'i don du byas pa'o //
analyzed: don @225b ni ye shes bskyed par bya ba'i don du byas pa'o //
translated: The meaning is the function of generating intuition.

original: sna tshogs ni mchi ma dang / rngul dang / glad pa la sogs pa de rnams kyi don ni bdud rtsi byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: sna tshogs ni mchi ma dang / rngul dang / glad pa la sogs pa de rnams kyi don ni bdud rtsi byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The various are tears, sweat, brain, and so on. The meaning of those is the nectar of the spirit of enlightenment.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni /
translated: The inconceivable

original: bgrang ba la 'das pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: bgrang ba la 'das pa'i don yin no //
translated: is the meaning of transcending enumeration.

original: 'byung ba ni shuksha'i ngo bo byang chub sems kyi snying po can no ;
analyzed: 'byung ba ni shuksha'i ngo bo byang chub sems kyi snying po can no ;
translated: The element is the essence of the moisture, which has the essence of the spirit of enlightenment.

original: / skye ba'i don ni sprul ba'i lus dang / cig shos kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: / skye ba'i don ni sprul ba'i lus dang / cig shos kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: The meaning of “arising” is the body of emanation and the other nature.

original: chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The “source of phenomena” is

original: 'khor ba dang mya ngang las 'das pa'i chos rnams 'byung bas na chos 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'khor ba dang mya ngang las 'das pa'i chos rnams 'byung bas na chos 'byung ngo //
translated: the source of phenomena, because it is the source of the phenomena of samsara and nirvana.

original: de nyid shes rab kyi bha ga'o //
analyzed: de nyid shes rab kyi bha ga'o //
translated: That itself is the bhaga of wisdom.

original: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i de kho na nyid rnyed par 'gyur bas na chen po'i don yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i de kho na nyid rnyed par 'gyur bas na chen po'i don yin no //
translated: It is the great meaning, because it is the attainment of the reality that is pure by nature.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi gnas kyi gtso bo ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi gnas kyi gtso bo ni /
translated: The “ground of the mind of enlightenment” is

original: sa steng der byang chub kyi sems rtsal las mar bzhin du 'gyur zhing 'bab par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sa steng der byang chub kyi sems rtsal las mar bzhin du 'gyur zhing 'bab par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: the earth, because the mind of enlightenment is generated and falls like rain from there.

original: lha'i dbang phyug ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: lha'i dbang phyug ces bya ba ni /
translated: The “lord of the gods” is

original: lha rnams la dbang byed pa de yis dbang phyug gi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: lha rnams la dbang byed pa de yis dbang phyug gi bdag nyid do //
translated: the lord of the gods, because he has the nature of a lord.

original: gsol pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gsol pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “He asked”

original: bcom ldan 'das nyid la zhu'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nyid la zhu'o //
translated: means that he asked the Bhagavān himself.

original: de ltar yin yang zhes bya ba la //
analyzed: de ltar yin yang zhes bya ba la //
translated: “Even though that is the case” means🔽that, even though that is the case, he asked the Bhagavān.

original: rtog med ma ni kun gyi bdag nyid yin yang zhes bya ba'i sgro'o //
analyzed: rtog med ma ni kun gyi bdag nyid yin yang zhes bya ba'i sgro'o //
translated: The word also is for the non-conceptual one, who is the nature of all.

original: de lta mod kyi sum cu rtsa gcig la mtshan dang grangs zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi sum cu rtsa gcig la mtshan dang grangs zhes bya ba ni /
translated: However, the thirty-one are called names and numbers.

original: thams cad kyi grangs nyid rtog med ma yin yang /
analyzed: thams cad kyi grangs nyid rtog med ma yin yang /
translated: Although the number of all is not non-conceptual,

original: lhag ma sum cu rtsa gcig gi ming re re nas grangs zhu 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: lhag ma sum cu rtsa gcig gi ming re re nas grangs zhu 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: please ask about the names and numbers of the remaining thirty-one individually. This is the remainder of the sentence.

original: de rnams kyi ming dang grangs bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni //
analyzed: de rnams kyi ming dang grangs bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni //
translated: The names and numbers of those were spoken by the Bhagavān.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
translated: The Bhagavān said:

original: sum cu rtsa gcig gi rtsa'i ming nyon cig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gcig gi rtsa'i ming nyon cig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Listen to the names of the thirty-one nāḍīs.

original: ci'i phyir kun gyi bdag nyid yin zhen //
analyzed: ci'i phyir kun gyi bdag nyid yin zhen //
translated: Why is it the nature of all?

original: rtog med ma de nyid byis pa rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
analyzed: rtog med ma de nyid byis pa rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
translated: Because that non-conceptual one is secret, not an object of the childish.

original: de nyid gting dpag ba'i phyir zab pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid gting dpag ba'i phyir zab pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don to //
translated: That itself is profound, difficult to fathom, and so on.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i don gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i don gsungs pa /
translated: The meaning of that is stated.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su tshigs rgyas pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su tshigs rgyas pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The full moon and new moon are the times of the lunar and solar eclipses.

original: zla ba'i sgras chad pa'i dga' ba nyi ma sgras mchog gi dga' ba'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i sgras chad pa'i dga' ba nyi ma sgras mchog gi dga' ba'o //
translated: The word moon refers to the pleasure of cessation, and the word sun refers to the supreme pleasure.

original: gzas zin pa'i sgras ni /
analyzed: gzas zin pa'i sgras ni /
translated: The word eclipse

original: mchog dang chad pa'i dga' ba la rang bzhin dga' bas khyab pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: mchog dang chad pa'i dga' ba la rang bzhin dga' bas khyab pa'i bdag nyid do //
