translated: refers to the supreme and cessation pleasures pervaded by the nature of pleasure.

original: dus kyi sgras ni //
analyzed: dus kyi sgras ni //
translated: The word time

original: srog dang nye ba'i srog dang ba'o //
analyzed: srog dang nye ba'i srog dang ba'o //
translated: refers to the life and the near life.

original: tshigs rgyas @226a * //
analyzed: tshigs rgyas @226a * //
translated: The full moon

original: pa ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis steng 'og tu 'pho ba'i bdag nyid gsum gyi lte bar mchog gi don gyis so //
analyzed: pa ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis steng 'og tu 'pho ba'i bdag nyid gsum gyi lte bar mchog gi don gyis so //
translated: refers to the thirty-two channels, which are the nature of the upward and downward movements, in the center of the three, by the meaning of supreme.

original: gzhan na re zla ba ni shu ksha'o //
analyzed: gzhan na re zla ba ni shu ksha'o //
translated: Others say, The moon is śukra,

original: nyi ma ni rakta'o //
analyzed: nyi ma ni rakta'o //
translated: the sun is rakta,

original: gzas zin pa ni me'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gzas zin pa ni me'i rang bzhin no //
translated: the eclipse is the nature of fire,

original: dus ni mnyam pa'i dus su ste /
analyzed: dus ni mnyam pa'i dus su ste /
translated: and the time is the equal time.

original: gsum po dang ldan pa'o /
analyzed: gsum po dang ldan pa'o /
translated: The three are possessed.

original: tshigs rgyas pa ni rdo rje mthe'u chung bya gdong dang bcas pas de nyid rnyed zer ro //
analyzed: tshigs rgyas pa ni rdo rje mthe'u chung bya gdong dang bcas pas de nyid rnyed zer ro //
translated: The full moon is the vajra, the little finger, and the face of the bird. It is said that the reality is found by that.

original: de'i 'og tu dbang gi yan lag ston pa la ni /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dbang gi yan lag ston pa la ni /
translated: Next, in order to show the branch of empowerment,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //🔽de nas dbang gi rim pas bshad /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // de nas dbang gi rim pas bshad /
translated: Now, the sequence of the consecration will be explained.

original: ces bya ba la //
analyzed: ces bya ba la //
translated: Here,

original: lus la sogs pa'i dri ma ni bum pa dang / gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes dang / bzhi pa'i dbang gis dag par byed pa'o /
analyzed: lus la sogs pa'i dri ma ni bum pa dang / gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes dang / bzhi pa'i dbang gis dag par byed pa'o /
translated: the stains of the body, etc., are purified by the vase, secret, wisdom-knowledge, and fourth consecrations.

original: de'i rim pa ni cho ga'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: de'i rim pa ni cho ga'i khyad par ro //
translated: Its sequence is the special rite.

original: bshad pa ni dam bcas pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: bshad pa ni dam bcas pa'i tshig go //
translated: Explanation is the statement of the promise.

original: ji lta ba zhes bya ba ni le'u gnyis par bsdus pa'i don bzhin 'di nas mar thabs kyi bdag nyid rgyas par bshad de /
analyzed: ji lta ba zhes bya ba ni le'u gnyis par bsdus pa'i don bzhin 'di nas mar thabs kyi bdag nyid rgyas par bshad de /
translated: As it is, means that from here on, the method aspect is explained extensively, as in the synopsis of chapter two.

original: go rims zhes bya ba ni dbang la sogs pa'i rim pa bzhin no /
analyzed: go rims zhes bya ba ni dbang la sogs pa'i rim pa bzhin no /
translated: The sequence is the sequence of the consecration, etc.

original: dbang bskur bas ci pan snyam pa la /
analyzed: dbang bskur bas ci pan snyam pa la /
translated: What is the use of consecration?

original: de'i don tshigs bcad phyed kyis gsungs pa //
analyzed: de'i don tshigs bcad phyed kyis gsungs pa //
translated: The meaning of that is stated in half a verse:

original: dbang bskur mchog ni rnyed pa gang //
analyzed: dbang bskur mchog ni rnyed pa gang //
translated: The supreme consecration is obtained,

original: thams cad des ni 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad des ni 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: and everything is accomplished by it.

original: zhes bya ba la //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la //
translated: Here,

original: dbang bskur ba ni /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni /
translated: the consecration is

original: bla ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pas slob ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: bla ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pas slob ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The consecration of the disciple endowed with the qualifications by the qualified guru with the vase consecration, etc.

original: mchog ni gya nom pa ste /
analyzed: mchog ni gya nom pa ste /
translated: The supreme is the excellent.

original: gsang ba'i dbang la sogs pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dbang la sogs pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The secret consecration, etc. with its result.

original: rnyed pa gang ni //
analyzed: rnyed pa gang ni //
translated: The attainment is

original: de'i don rnyed pa'i sems can su yang rung ste spyi sgra'o //
analyzed: de'i don rnyed pa'i sems can su yang rung ste spyi sgra'o //
translated: any being who has attained its meaning.

original: thams cad de ni 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad de ni 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: All that is accomplished.

original: zhes bya ba la ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ni /
translated: In this,

original: thun mong gi dngos grub pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa de'i yon tan dang / bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: thun mong gi dngos grub pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa de'i yon tan dang / bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: the common accomplishments, the supreme accomplishments, etc. are accomplished by the power of meditation on those qualities.

original: slob ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la dbang bskur ba tshigs bcad byed phyed dang gnyis kyis gsungs pa ;
analyzed: slob ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la dbang bskur ba tshigs bcad byed phyed dang gnyis kyis gsungs pa ;
translated: The consecration of the qualified disciple is taught in two and a half verses:

original: yon tan tshul khrims ldan pa'i bu //
analyzed: yon tan tshul khrims ldan pa'i bu //
translated: The son endowed with good qualities and morality

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtog pa can ma yin pa'i rgyud dag nas gsungs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtog pa can ma yin pa'i rgyud dag nas gsungs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa /
translated: and so forth, endowed with the qualities taught in the tantras of the non-conceptual vehicles.

original: srung ba la sogs pa'i yon tan tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i slob ma de la /
analyzed: srung ba la sogs pa'i yon tan tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i slob ma de la /
translated: The disciple who has the qualities of protection and so forth, and who is endowed with morality,

original: khrus la sogs pa'i tshogs rdzogs par byas la /
analyzed: khrus la sogs pa'i tshogs rdzogs par byas la /
translated: should complete the requisites such as bathing,

original: @226b me tog gtor ba dang / yon dga' ba'i yid kyis dbul bar bya ba ni //
analyzed: @226b me tog gtor ba dang / yon dga' ba'i yid kyis dbul bar bya ba ni //
translated: and should scatter flowers and offer gifts with a joyful mind.

original: 'og nas 'byung ba'i gus pas bla ma la mchod par bya /🔽rin chen sna tshogs du ma mchog ni gzor //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin du //
analyzed: 'og nas 'byung ba'i gus pas bla ma la mchod par bya / rin chen sna tshogs du ma mchog ni gzor // zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin du //
translated: One should worship the guru with the respect that will be explained below.

original: 'dzin chags med pa'i yid kyis phul la dbang blang zhing bskur bar bya'o //🔽mchog gi dngos grub grub pas ni //
analyzed: 'dzin chags med pa'i yid kyis phul la dbang blang zhing bskur bar bya'o // mchog gi dngos grub grub pas ni //
translated: One should offer with a mind free of attachment, and should take and bestow initiation.

original: thun mong gi bsgrub mi dgos pa'i phyir //
analyzed: thun mong gi bsgrub mi dgos pa'i phyir //
translated: Since one who has attained the supreme attainment does not need to practice the common [attainments],

original: de'i don tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i don tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis gsungs pa /
translated: the meaning of that is stated in one verse.

original: dbang bskur las ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dang bcas pa'i dbang blang dgos pas /🔽dbang bskur bzhi ru dbye ba ni //
analyzed: dbang bskur las ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dang bcas pa'i dbang blang dgos pas / dbang bskur bzhi ru dbye ba ni //
translated: Since it is necessary to take initiation with the reason stated in the line “Buddhahood is attained through initiation,”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa spyi'i dbye ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa spyi'i dbye ba'o //
translated: the general division is “The initiation is divided into four.”

original: bzhi gnyis rab tu dbye ba ni //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: bzhi gnyis rab tu dbye ba ni // zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: The division into four and two is🔽as stated.

original: rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang gi grangs ming bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang gi grangs ming bstan pa'o //
translated: Thus, it teaches the enumeration and names of the vajra master empowerment.

original: de'i yon tan gsungs pa //
analyzed: de'i yon tan gsungs pa //
translated: It teaches its qualities:

original: dbang bskur de ni rin po che /
analyzed: dbang bskur de ni rin po che /
translated: That empowerment is a jewel,

original: zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni //
translated: as stated.

original: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yod pa gang yin pa de la phul ba dang bral ba bzhin du /
analyzed: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yod pa gang yin pa de la phul ba dang bral ba bzhin du /
translated: Just as one who possesses a wish-fulfilling jewel is free from giving,

original: 'dir nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa spong ba'i gnas ni dbang bskur bas so //
analyzed: 'dir nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa spong ba'i gnas ni dbang bskur bas so //
translated: here, the basis for abandoning the afflictive obstructions and so forth is the empowerment.

original: khams gsum ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams so //
analyzed: khams gsum ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams so //
translated: The three realms are the desire, form, and formless realms.

original: de rnams kyi mchod pa dang / phyag bya ba'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mchod pa dang / phyag bya ba'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: One becomes the very object of worship and homage of those.

original: 'bras bu'i khyad par can yod pas na /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i khyad par can yod pas na /
translated: Since it exists as the special result,

original: nyan thos la sogs pas kyang zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pas kyang zhes bya'o //
translated: it is called “the śrāvakas and so forth.”

original: thar par zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: thar par zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: “Liberation” and so forth are easy to understand.

original: chu dang dbu rgyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: chu dang dbu rgyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: “Water, crown,” and so forth.

original: chu rnam par dag pa mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: chu rnam par dag pa mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The pure water is Akṣobhya.

original: de bzhin du dbur rgyan la sogs pa yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin du dbur rgyan la sogs pa yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Likewise, the crest-jewel, etc.

original: rnal 'byor rgyud la mos rnams la //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rgyud la mos rnams la //
translated: For those devoted to Yoga Tantra,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: etc.

original: rnal 'byor ni stong pa dang / snying rje dbyer med pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni stong pa dang / snying rje dbyer med pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: Yoga is the nature of the inseparability of emptiness and compassion.

original: rgyud ni de nyid 'dus pa la sog pa'i rgyud do //
analyzed: rgyud ni de nyid 'dus pa la sog pa'i rgyud do //
translated: Tantra is the tantra of the Gathering of the Sugatas, etc.

original: mos pa ni der dga' ba'o //
analyzed: mos pa ni der dga' ba'o //
translated: Devotion is delight in that.

original: sems can rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du mos pa rnams so //
analyzed: sems can rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du mos pa rnams so //
translated: Sentient beings are devoted to Yoga Tantra.

original: 'di'i gzhung gis slob dpon gyi dbang brgyad rnams gsungs te //
analyzed: 'di'i gzhung gis slob dpon gyi dbang brgyad rnams gsungs te //
translated: This text teaches the eight masteries.🔽Except for the three pledges, they should be given.

original: dam tshigs gsum ma gtogs pa sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dam tshigs gsum ma gtogs pa sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de rang gi rgyud kyi ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: de rang gi rgyud kyi ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: This is not so for one's own continuum.

original: rnal 'byor bla mar mos rnams la //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bla mar mos rnams la //
translated: For those devoted to the highest Yoga,

original: zhes bya ba ni /🔽thabs kyi rgyud 'dus pa dang / @227a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni / thabs kyi rgyud 'dus pa dang / @227a * //
translated: etc.🔽The persons devoted to the method tantra, the Gathering of the Sugatas,

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs par mos pa'i gang zag rnams la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs par mos pa'i gang zag rnams la'o //
translated: the Vajra Amṛta, etc.

original: bcu gcig ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'o /
analyzed: bcu gcig ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'o /
translated: The eleven are the consecration of the vajra master.

original: bdag nyid ni gsang ba'i dbang dang bcas pa ste /🔽spyi par bya zhes bya ba de rnams dang bcas pa slob ma de dga' ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid ni gsang ba'i dbang dang bcas pa ste / spyi par bya zhes bya ba de rnams dang bcas pa slob ma de dga' ba'i don du'o //
translated: One should do this means that one should do this together with the secret initiation.🔽Together with those means together with those who are happy with the disciples.

original: rnal 'byor ma la mos pa rnams //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma la mos pa rnams // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should give the secret empowerment to those who are devoted to the yoginis.

original: shes rab kyi rgyud rigs chen rgya mtsho dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa la sogs pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams la ni /🔽gsang ba'i dbang gi bdag nyid sbyin //
analyzed: shes rab kyi rgyud rigs chen rgya mtsho dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa la sogs pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams la ni / gsang ba'i dbang gi bdag nyid sbyin //
translated: Those who are devoted to the yoginis, who are devoted to the great tantras of wisdom, the Ocean of the Great River of the Tantra of Wisdom, the Tantra Equal to Space, and so on,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: one should give the secret empowerment to those sentient beings.

original: chu la sogs pa bcu gcig dang / gsang ba'i dbang dang / bdag nyid kyi sgras shes rab ye shes dang bcas pa'i don to //
analyzed: chu la sogs pa bcu gcig dang / gsang ba'i dbang dang / bdag nyid kyi sgras shes rab ye shes dang bcas pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the secret empowerment is the eleven, such as the water empowerment, and the secret empowerment, and the meaning of the self is the gnosis of the wisdom consort empowerment.

original: de yang chu'i dbang bskur bas dga' ba'i 'bras bu'o /
analyzed: de yang chu'i dbang bskur bas dga' ba'i 'bras bu'o /
translated: Moreover, the result of the water empowerment is joy.

original: dbu rgyan dang 'bras bu la sogs pa yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: dbu rgyan dang 'bras bu la sogs pa yang de bzhin no //
translated: The result of the crown, and so on, is also like that.

original: gsang ba gnyis su dbye bar bshad //
analyzed: gsang ba gnyis su dbye bar bshad //
translated: The secret is explained as a twofold division.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The meaning of the rest is easy to understand as before.

original: shes rab gnyis su dbye bar bya ba ni gsang ba'i phyag rgyas dang shes rab ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: shes rab gnyis su dbye bar bya ba ni gsang ba'i phyag rgyas dang shes rab ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The wisdom to be divided into two is the secret seal and the wisdom-knowledge seal.

original: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i bye brag go //
analyzed: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i bye brag go //
translated: The generation and perfection are the distinctions.

original: zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i phyag rgyas ye shes skyed par byed pa ste bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i phyag rgyas ye shes skyed par byed pa ste bskyed pa'o //
translated: The secret seal generates the wisdom, which is the generation.

original: shes rab ye shes kyi phyag rgyas ye shes rang la rdzogs par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do ;
analyzed: shes rab ye shes kyi phyag rgyas ye shes rang la rdzogs par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do ;
translated: The wisdom-knowledge seal perfects the wisdom in oneself, which is the characteristic of perfection.

original: / bye brag ni ye shes kyi bye brag rnams so //
analyzed: / bye brag ni ye shes kyi bye brag rnams so //
translated: The distinctions are the distinctions of the wisdoms.🔽Or:

original: yang na // shes rab gnyis su med par bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yang na // shes rab gnyis su med par bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The wisdoms are to be made nondual.

original: gsang ba'i shes rab ma byed par mi bya ba /
analyzed: gsang ba'i shes rab ma byed par mi bya ba /
translated: The secret wisdom is not to be made.

original: shes rab ye shes rang la gnyis te /
analyzed: shes rab ye shes rang la gnyis te /
translated: The wisdom-knowledge has two:

original: rnam pa dang bcas pa dang rnam pa me dpa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas pa dang rnam pa me dpa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: the characteristic with aspects and the characteristic without aspects.

original: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i bye brag go //🔽zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i bye brag go // zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The generation and perfection are the distinctions.

original: phyi'i reg bya'i rnam pa dang bcas pa ni bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: phyi'i reg bya'i rnam pa dang bcas pa ni bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The external with aspects of touch is the characteristic of generation.

original: nang gi reg bya dang bcas pa ni //
analyzed: nang gi reg bya dang bcas pa ni //
translated: together with the inner tactile sensation,

original: rnam pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: is the seal of the nature of the characteristic of the formless.

original: phyi'i rnam pa dang bcas pa ni mtshan nyid gsungs pa //
analyzed: phyi'i rnam pa dang bcas pa ni mtshan nyid gsungs pa //
translated: The outer one with form is taught as the characteristic.

original: shes rab brgyad gnyis lo ldan ma //
analyzed: shes rab brgyad gnyis lo ldan ma //
translated: She is sixteen years old, with wisdom.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa'o /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa'o /
translated: and so forth.

original: dbang gi man ngang gsum du byed //
analyzed: dbang gi man ngang gsum du byed //
translated: The intimate instruction is divided into three empowerments.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: bum pa'i dbang dang / gsang ba'i dbang dang / shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo //
analyzed: bum pa'i dbang dang / gsang ba'i dbang dang / shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo //
translated: The vase empowerment, the secret empowerment, and the gnosis of the wisdom consort empowerment.

original: man ngag gsum du dbye ba ni /
analyzed: man ngag gsum du dbye ba ni /
translated: The intimate instruction is divided into three:

original: 'bras bu dga' ba rnams dang @227b bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu dga' ba rnams dang @227b bcas pa yin te /
translated: the result, the joys, and the signs.

original: 'di'i don ni /
analyzed: 'di'i don ni /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: nang gi de yi brda byed pa //
analyzed: nang gi de yi brda byed pa //
translated: The inner one is the sign.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽nang gi 'di ni spyi bo'o gnas dang / mgrin pa dang snying gar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / nang gi 'di ni spyi bo'o gnas dang / mgrin pa dang snying gar ro //
translated: and so forth.🔽The inner one is the locations of the crown, throat, and heart.

original: brda byed pa ni lte ba gsang gnas dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: brda byed pa ni lte ba gsang gnas dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The sign is the navel and the secret place.

original: 'byed pa ni dga' pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'byed pa ni dga' pa rnams so //
translated: The division is the joys.

original: bzhi pas 'bras bu'i ngo bor grags //
analyzed: bzhi pas 'bras bu'i ngo bor grags //
translated: The fourth is renowned as the essence of the result.

original: zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni //
translated: This is the explanation of the third chapter of the Ornament of the Mahayana Sutras, the chapter on the aids to liberation.

original: dga' ba gsum pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: dga' ba gsum pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i ngo bo'o //
translated: This is the nature of the third joy, the essence of joy.

original: gsum dang bral ba ni gnas gsum dang bral ba'i dga' ba'o //
analyzed: gsum dang bral ba ni gnas gsum dang bral ba'i dga' ba'o //
translated: Free from the three is joy free from the three abodes.

original: gsum bdag nyid ni dga' ba dang / mchog gi dga' pa dang / chad pa'i dga' ba'i bdag nyid ni rang bzhin dga' ba ste //
analyzed: gsum bdag nyid ni dga' ba dang / mchog gi dga' pa dang / chad pa'i dga' ba'i bdag nyid ni rang bzhin dga' ba ste //
translated: The nature of the three is the nature of joy, supreme joy, and innate joy, which is natural joy.

original: de dag gi rtog pa'i dngos po spangs pas dga' ba la dbang byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag gi rtog pa'i dngos po spangs pas dga' ba la dbang byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: By abandoning the things imagined by them, one becomes a master of joy.

original: dga' ba la sogs bye brag tu //
analyzed: dga' ba la sogs bye brag tu //
translated: The varieties of joy, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is

original: 'khor lo'i rim pa nas rdo rje rin po che'i bar gyi dga' ba rnams so /
analyzed: 'khor lo'i rim pa nas rdo rje rin po che'i bar gyi dga' ba rnams so /
translated: the joys from the stage of the wheel up to the vajra jewel.

original: de rnyed pa'i gnas gsungs pa //
analyzed: de rnyed pa'i gnas gsungs pa //
translated: The abode of their attainment is stated:

original: rdo rje gzhon nu mas gsal byed //
analyzed: rdo rje gzhon nu mas gsal byed //
translated: The vajra maiden is the illuminator.

original: ces bya'o // las kyi phyag rgya dang // thabs kyi phyag rgya gnyis kyi rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang // rdo rje rin po che dang ldan pa'i lo bcu drug lon pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid sngar bzhin bstan pa las rnyed ces 'brel lo //
analyzed: ces bya'o // las kyi phyag rgya dang // thabs kyi phyag rgya gnyis kyi rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang // rdo rje rin po che dang ldan pa'i lo bcu drug lon pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid sngar bzhin bstan pa las rnyed ces 'brel lo //
translated: The karmamudra and the upāyamuḍrā are the Vajradhātvīśvarī and the Vajraratna, endowed with the characteristics of a sixteen-year-old and so on, as previously explained.

original: gang gi phyir zhen na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhen na /
translated: Why is that?

original: las dang po pa rnams kyi dga' ba de las rnyed pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: las dang po pa rnams kyi dga' ba de las rnyed pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because the joy of beginners is found in that.

original: mchog tu gsungs so /
analyzed: mchog tu gsungs so /
translated: It is said to be supreme.

original: de skad du gsang ba grub pa las kyang /
analyzed: de skad du gsang ba grub pa las kyang /
translated: Thus it is said in the Siddhayogeśvarī:

original: las kyi phyag rgya bral gang des //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya bral gang des //
translated: The one who is separated from the karmamudra

original: gzhan du mtshon che rnyed mi 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan du mtshon che rnyed mi 'gyur //
translated: will not find the great weapon elsewhere.

original: gzhan du yang dag rigs pa med //
analyzed: gzhan du yang dag rigs pa med //
translated: Elsewhere there is no right reason.

original: dang po'i las can rig byed med //🔽ces gsungs so ;
analyzed: dang po'i las can rig byed med // ces gsungs so ;
translated: The beginner has no knowledge.

original: / yang de'i yon tan bshad pa /
analyzed: / yang de'i yon tan bshad pa /
translated: Again, its qualities are explained:

original: dbang bskur gyis ni 'khor los sgyur //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dbang bskur gyis ni 'khor los sgyur // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By the empowerment, the cakravartin

original: sems can gyi mtshan nyid ye shes spros pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: sems can gyi mtshan nyid ye shes spros pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba ni /
translated: The characteristic of sentient beings becomes free from the proliferation of pristine consciousness.

original: 'khor los sgyur ba yin te thams cad sems su snang ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin no //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba yin te thams cad sems su snang ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin no //
translated: The wheel-turning king is the mind, because everything appears in the mind, like the king who turns the wheel.

original: gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sems las ma gtogs pa'i dngos po logs na med la /
analyzed: sems las ma gtogs pa'i dngos po logs na med la /
translated: Because there is no entity apart from the mind.

original: de snang ba med pa'i de kho na nyid du bsgrub ba ni //
analyzed: de snang ba med pa'i de kho na nyid du bsgrub ba ni //
translated: The establishment of reality, which is the non-appearance of that,

original: glo bur gyi dri ma dag pa'o //
analyzed: glo bur gyi dri ma dag pa'o //
translated: is the purification of adventitious defilements.

original: de skad du yang //
analyzed: de skad du yang //
translated: Thus it is said:

original: sems tsam la ni gnas su //
analyzed: sems tsam la ni gnas su //
translated: Dwelling in the mind only,

original: phyi rol don la mi brtag go /
analyzed: phyi rol don la mi brtag go /
translated: one does not conceive of external objects.

original: de bzhin nyid la gnas nas su //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la gnas nas su //
translated: Dwelling in suchness,

original: @228a * // sems tsam las ni bzla bar bya //
analyzed: @228a * // sems tsam las ni bzla bar bya //
translated: one transcends the mind only.

original: sems tsam las ni bzlas nas kyang //
analyzed: sems tsam las ni bzlas nas kyang //
translated: Having transcended the mind only,

original: sang ba med las bzla bar bya'o /
analyzed: sang ba med las bzla bar bya'o /
translated: one transcends non-appearance.

original: snang med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
analyzed: snang med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
translated: The yogi who abides in non-appearance

original: de yis theg pa che po mthong //
analyzed: de yis theg pa che po mthong //
translated: sees the Great Vehicle.

original: zhes 'byung bas so //
analyzed: zhes 'byung bas so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: the tshom ni yid gnyis za ba'o /
analyzed: the tshom ni yid gnyis za ba'o /
translated: Doubt is having two minds.

original: med pa ni de dang bral ba'i bsam pa'o //
analyzed: med pa ni de dang bral ba'i bsam pa'o //
translated: Non-existence is the intention free from that.

original: dri ma ni goo bur ba'i dir ma ste /
analyzed: dri ma ni goo bur ba'i dir ma ste /
translated: Defilement is the adventitious defilement.

original: ma rig pa la sog pa'i bdag dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa la sog pa'i bdag dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The self and the possession of the self are the grasping of the self and the possession of the self, which are based on ignorance.

original: dbang bskur bas de rnams med pa ni dri ma med pa yin te /🔽rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang bskur bas lus kyi dri ma dag par 'gyur ro /
analyzed: dbang bskur bas de rnams med pa ni dri ma med pa yin te / rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang bskur bas lus kyi dri ma dag par 'gyur ro /
translated: The absence of those is stainlessness, because of the consecration.🔽The consecration of the vajra master purifies the stains of the body.

original: gsang bas ngag gi dbang ngo //
analyzed: gsang bas ngag gi dbang ngo //
translated: The secret consecration purifies the stains of the voice.

original: shes rab ye shes kyis sems kyis kyi'o //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes kyis sems kyis kyi'o //
translated: The consecration of wisdom knowledge purifies the stains of the mind.

original: bzhi pas spyi bor ro /
analyzed: bzhi pas spyi bor ro /
translated: The fourth purifies the stains of the body, voice, and mind.

original: ji ltar chu la sogs pas ras //
analyzed: ji ltar chu la sogs pas ras //
translated: Just as a cloth and so forth are cleansed by water and so forth.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the example.

original: dper na ras kyi dri ma chu dang 'dag chal dang ldan pas bkrus pa yin na /
analyzed: dper na ras kyi dri ma chu dang 'dag chal dang ldan pas bkrus pa yin na /
translated: For example, if a cloth is washed with water and soap,

original: dag pa bzhin du 'dag go //
analyzed: dag pa bzhin du 'dag go //
translated: it is cleansed.

original: yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa'i dbang zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa'i dbang zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The consecration with all the limbs is the consecration of the vajra master.

original: sa'i cho ga dang / bum pa dang / slob ma dang // dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang // rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang dang / gsang ba'i dbang dang / shes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang // bzhi ba'i dbang gi mthar thug pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: sa'i cho ga dang / bum pa dang / slob ma dang // dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang // rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang dang / gsang ba'i dbang dang / shes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang // bzhi ba'i dbang gi mthar thug pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The rite of the ground, the vase, the disciple, the mandala, the initiation of the vajra master, the secret initiation, the initiation of pristine awareness dependent on an embodiment of wisdom, and the ultimate fourth initiation.

original: yan lag de nyid dang ni bcas ;🔽/ zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yan lag de nyid dang ni bcas ; / zhes bya ba ni /
translated: And the branches, along with the reality of those.

original: slob dpon rgyun ma chad pa dbang gi rim pa gzhung bzhin du thob pa'i bla ma'o //
analyzed: slob dpon rgyun ma chad pa dbang gi rim pa gzhung bzhin du thob pa'i bla ma'o //
translated: The uninterrupted master is the guru from whom one has received the stages of initiation according to the texts.

original: gcig gnas gcig gi rim pas 'byung //🔽zhes byas ba ni //
analyzed: gcig gnas gcig gi rim pas 'byung // zhes byas ba ni //
translated: The one abiding in one place is the guru who has received the complete stages of initiation and abides in one place.

original: bcom ldan 'das nas dbang bskur ba'i don rim par 'chad pa ni bla ma'i mchog tu gsungs te /🔽bla ma rab kyi zhal nas blang //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nas dbang bskur ba'i don rim par 'chad pa ni bla ma'i mchog tu gsungs te / bla ma rab kyi zhal nas blang //
translated: The one who has been initiated by the Transcendent Lord is the guru who has been initiated by the Transcendent Lord himself.

original: zhes bya'o // de ni dbang dang bcas pa'i bla ma rab bo //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de ni dbang dang bcas pa'i bla ma rab bo //
translated: The one who has received from the mouth of a superior guru is the guru who has received the complete stages of initiation from a superior guru.

original: bla ma rab ma yi pa dang / slob ma yon tan dang mi ldan pa'i don ni 'di yin te //
analyzed: bla ma rab ma yi pa dang / slob ma yon tan dang mi ldan pa'i don ni 'di yin te //
translated: The one who is not a superior guru and the disciple who is not endowed with good qualities are the guru and disciple who have not received the complete stages of initiation.

original: ngag gi cad ra ba la sog pas bstan to //
analyzed: ngag gi cad ra ba la sog pas bstan to //
translated: The faults of the disciple are taught by the words “who is not a proper vessel, etc.”

original: dbang gi mchog ni rnam pa gsum //🔽zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: dbang gi mchog ni rnam pa gsum // zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The best initiation is of three kinds.

original: gsang ba'i dbang dang // shes rab ye shes kyi dang // bzhi ba'i dang de dag gsum ni /
analyzed: gsang ba'i dbang dang // shes rab ye shes kyi dang // bzhi ba'i dang de dag gsum ni /
translated: The secret initiation, the initiation of wisdom knowledge, and the fourth.

original: rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang las mchog go //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang las mchog go //
translated: These three are the best of the vajra master initiations.

original: blang bya ma yin zhes bya ba ni //🔽bla ma de lta bu la slob ma yon tan dang mi ldan pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis mi blang //
analyzed: blang bya ma yin zhes bya ba ni // bla ma de lta bu la slob ma yon tan dang mi ldan pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis mi blang //
translated: “One should not take”🔽means that a disciple who has the characteristics of not having the qualities should not take,

original: dbang mi nod ces ba'i don to /
analyzed: dbang mi nod ces ba'i don to /
translated: should not receive the initiation, from such a guru.

original: sbyin mi bya @228b zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sbyin mi bya @228b zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “One should not give”

original: slob ma de lta bu'i mtshan nyid ngan pa de la /
analyzed: slob ma de lta bu'i mtshan nyid ngan pa de la /
translated: means that such a disciple who has the characteristics of bad qualities

original: bla ma rab kyi dbang gi mchog rnam pa gsum po sbyin par ma gsungs so //
analyzed: bla ma rab kyi dbang gi mchog rnam pa gsum po sbyin par ma gsungs so //
translated: should not be given the three best initiations of the highest guru.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de dang ldan na dngos grub mchog mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang ldan na dngos grub mchog mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if he has them, he will not obtain the best powers.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: yang dga' 'bras bu 'dod pa na //
analyzed: yang dga' 'bras bu 'dod pa na //
translated: if one desires the fruit of true joy,

original: de ni ring du spang bar bya ;🔽/ zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni ring du spang bar bya ;🔽/ zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: one should avoid him from afar.

original: sgra dang tshad mas mi 'grub pa'i dpe ni /
analyzed: sgra dang tshad mas mi 'grub pa'i dpe ni /
translated: The example of not being established by sound and valid cognition is:

original: de ltar yang bye ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
analyzed: de ltar yang bye ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
translated: Thus, sand and so on.

original: de bzhin tshad ma mang po dang // ngag gi dra ba dang ldan pa /🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin tshad ma mang po dang // ngag gi dra ba dang ldan pa / zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Likewise, there are many valid cognitions,

original: bye ma las mar btsir ba la sogs pa byas /🔽yang mar gyi rgyu sa bon ma yin pas 'byung bar mi 'gyur pa'i dpe de bzhin du tshad ma'i rtog pa la zhes bya ba rnams dang // 'jig rten pa'i sgra bdag dang bdag gi ngag dang / ngag gi dra ba 'brel ba ste /
analyzed: bye ma las mar btsir ba la sogs pa byas / yang mar gyi rgyu sa bon ma yin pas 'byung bar mi 'gyur pa'i dpe de bzhin du tshad ma'i rtog pa la zhes bya ba rnams dang // 'jig rten pa'i sgra bdag dang bdag gi ngag dang / ngag gi dra ba 'brel ba ste /
translated: endowed with the web of speech.

original: de'i don ni sems kyi rang bzhin ma shes pas rtag chad du gol pas /
analyzed: de'i don ni sems kyi rang bzhin ma shes pas rtag chad du gol pas /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows: Since the nature of the mind is not🔽understood, one deviates into eternalism and nihilism.

original: la la ni lus mi rtag pa yin yang shes pa rtag pas na dbang phyug byed pa por 'dod /
analyzed: la la ni lus mi rtag pa yin yang shes pa rtag pas na dbang phyug byed pa por 'dod /
translated: Some assert that although the body is impermanent, consciousness is🔽permanent, and therefore Īshvara is the agent.

original: la la ni skye rga na 'chi ni bdag go bar 'dod pa'o /
analyzed: la la ni skye rga na 'chi ni bdag go bar 'dod pa'o /
translated: Some assert that birth, aging, sickness, and death are the self.

original: la la ni srog chag kun 'goms pas dus yin no bar 'dod do /
analyzed: la la ni srog chag kun 'goms pas dus yin no bar 'dod do /
translated: Some assert that since all living beings are destroyed, time is the agent.

original: la la ni shi ba'i lus rdul du brlag la /
analyzed: la la ni shi ba'i lus rdul du brlag la /
translated: Some say that the body of the dead person is destroyed into dust,

original: sems stong par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems stong par 'gyur te /
translated: and the mind becomes empty.

original: ci yang me dpar 'dod do //
analyzed: ci yang me dpar 'dod do //
translated: They assert that nothing exists.

original: de bzhin du 'dir rtag chad gnyis su bsdu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir rtag chad gnyis su bsdu'o //
translated: In the same way, here, [the two extremes] are included in eternalism and annihilationism.🔽Such a master

original: de lta bu'i slob dpon gyis /🔽bstan pa'am zhe bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta bu'i slob dpon gyis / bstan pa'am zhe bya ba ni /
translated: teaches.

original: spangs bar bya'o //
analyzed: spangs bar bya'o //
translated: One should abandon

original: nyan pa ni slob ma ste 'bras bu mi rnyed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: nyan pa ni slob ma ste 'bras bu mi rnyed pa'i phyir //
translated: the student who listens, because they do not attain the result.

original: snga ma bzhin no /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin no /
translated: As before,

original: de bas na de la nyon mongs pa las //
analyzed: de bas na de la nyon mongs pa las //
translated: therefore, they say that other than the afflictions,

original: gzhan 'bras bu tsam rnyed pa me do zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gzhan 'bras bu tsam rnyed pa me do zhes gsungs so //
translated: no mere result is attained.

original: de'i phyir bla ma rab btsal bar bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: de'i phyir bla ma rab btsal bar bya ba'i don to /
translated: Therefore, the meaning is that one should seek a good guru.

original: kun 'goms pas dus yin no bar 'dod do /
analyzed: kun 'goms pas dus yin no bar 'dod do /
translated: Some assert that it is the time of overcoming all.

original: la la ni shi ba'i lus / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: la la ni shi ba'i lus / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsungs so //
translated: The Blessed One himself taught that the body of the dead person🔽is like that.

original: de lta bu'i bla ma ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dang mtshungs par lta ba'i don ni //🔽mi gsal mchog gi bkra shis can //
analyzed: de lta bu'i bla ma ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dang mtshungs par lta ba'i don ni // mi gsal mchog gi bkra shis can //
translated: The meaning of seeing such a guru as equal to Vajradhara is

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: as stated in the verse beginning with Not clear, auspicious supreme.

original: stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan rnams dang mi ldan zhing /
analyzed: stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan rnams dang mi ldan zhing /
translated: Although they do not have the great qualities of a Buddha, such as the powers and the fearlessnesses,

original: mi gsal ba yin yang de rnams kyi rgyu'i gtso bo yod pas na mchog gi bkra shis can yin no //
analyzed: mi gsal ba yin yang de rnams kyi rgyu'i gtso bo yod pas na mchog gi bkra shis can yin no //
translated: they are the most auspicious because they have the principal cause of those.

original: ci'i phyir yin snyam pa la //
analyzed: ci'i phyir yin snyam pa la //
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i don gsungs @229a * //
analyzed: de'i don gsungs @229a * //
translated: The meaning of that is stated:🔽The giver of the fruit of Buddhahood

original: pa ; sangs rgyas 'bras bu sbyin pa'i bdag / ces bya ba ni dbang dang bcas pa'i man ngag gnang ba ni /
analyzed: pa ; sangs rgyas 'bras bu sbyin pa'i bdag / ces bya ba ni dbang dang bcas pa'i man ngag gnang ba ni /
translated: is the one who gives the intimate instruction together with the empowerment.

original: sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: The one who sees the Buddha

original: des na 'bras bu sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: des na 'bras bu sbyin pa'o //
translated: is the one who gives the fruit.🔽The one who is the self

original: bdag ces bya ba ni bla ma mchog tu 'gyur ba nyid kyis bdag go /
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba ni bla ma mchog tu 'gyur ba nyid kyis bdag go /
translated: is the one who is the supreme guru.

original: bla ma'i gzugs ni ;
analyzed: bla ma'i gzugs ni ;
translated: The form of the guru

original: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid do //
translated: is the Buddha Vajradhara.

original: bdag gzhan ni rtag chad la dmigs pa'i dngos po dang / dngos po med par ro //
analyzed: bdag gzhan ni rtag chad la dmigs pa'i dngos po dang / dngos po med par ro //
translated: The self and other are the entities that are the focus of eternalism and nihilism, and the non-entity.🔽The non-existent should be seen as transcendent.

original: med pa ni 'jig rten las 'das par blta bar bya'o bsod rnams thams cad kyi ni gnas //
analyzed: med pa ni 'jig rten las 'das par blta bar bya'o bsod rnams thams cad kyi ni gnas //
translated: The field of all merit

original: zhe bya ba ni rin po che dang / gser la sog pa dpag tu med pa dbul ba'i gnas yin te /
analyzed: zhe bya ba ni rin po che dang / gser la sog pa dpag tu med pa dbul ba'i gnas yin te /
translated: The word “even” means that it is the place for offering countless jewels, gold, and so forth.

original: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i 'dus byas gang gis kyang bla ma la mchod pa la mnyam du med do /
analyzed: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i 'dus byas gang gis kyang bla ma la mchod pa la mnyam du med do /
translated: There is nothing equal to the worship of the guru with any conditioned thing, such as generosity.

original: gang gi phyir zhes na //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes na //
translated: Why is that?

original: sangs rgyas dngos grub ster bas na bsnyam par mi bya'o /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dngos grub ster bas na bsnyam par mi bya'o /
translated: One should not think that it is because the guru bestows the power of buddhahood.🔽Therefore,🔽all the buddhas, bodhisattvas,

original: de'i phyir / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug lta /
analyzed: de'i phyir / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug lta /
translated: Brahma, Indra, and Vishnu

original: de kun gyis ni bdag mchod 'os //
analyzed: de kun gyis ni bdag mchod 'os //
translated: are worthy of worship by me.🔽The guru is not equal to the world with its gods,🔽nor is he equal to the world with its humans.

original: gras pa ma yin grags gzug sbyin /🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gras pa ma yin grags gzug sbyin / zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The guru is the giver of fame and beauty.

original: sangs rgyas la sogs pa thams cad kyang rang rig bla ma la mchod cing bkru ba'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba'o /
analyzed: sangs rgyas la sogs pa thams cad kyang rang rig bla ma la mchod cing bkru ba'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba'o /
translated: This means that all the buddhas and so forth are the place to be worshipped and served by the guru of one’s own awareness.

original: yang na sangs rgyas ni phung po lnga'o //
analyzed: yang na sangs rgyas ni phung po lnga'o //
translated: Alternatively, the “buddhas” are the five aggregates.

original: byang chub sme dpa' ni skye mched rnam so /
analyzed: byang chub sme dpa' ni skye mched rnam so /
translated: The “bodhisattvas” are the sense bases.

original: tshangs pa ni rlung gi 'khor lo'o /
analyzed: tshangs pa ni rlung gi 'khor lo'o /
translated: “Brahma” is the wind maṇḍala.

original: brgya byin la sog pa yang de bzhin no /
analyzed: brgya byin la sog pa yang de bzhin no /
translated: “Indra” and so forth are the same.

original: bdag ni bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: bdag ni bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: I am the Blessed One.

original: mchod par 'os pa ni bla ma'o //
analyzed: mchod par 'os pa ni bla ma'o //
translated: The one worthy of worship is the guru.

original: sangs rgyas su 'jig rten pa la ma grags kyang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas su 'jig rten pa la ma grags kyang //
translated: Although the Buddha is not renowned in the world,

original: gsang sngags rdo rje theg par grags pa'i gzugs so //
analyzed: gsang sngags rdo rje theg par grags pa'i gzugs so //
translated: he is renowned in the Vajra Vehicle of Secret Mantra.

original: de ltar shes nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
analyzed: de ltar shes nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
translated: Knowing thus, and so on.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
translated: The Commentary on the Difficult Points of the Glorious Wisdom-Essence.

original: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: The Explanation of the Third Chapter, Called The Secret Thatness.

original: // / ji lta bu'i go rims su zhes gsungs pas na /
analyzed: // / ji lta bu'i go rims su zhes gsungs pas na /
translated: Since it is said in the proper sequence,

original: dbang bstan nas /
analyzed: dbang bstan nas /
translated: after teaching the empowerment,

original: de'i rjes thogs su gnas kyi bskyed pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes thogs su gnas kyi bskyed pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: the generation of the abode should be explained next.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon cig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon cig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Now, listen further as I explain and so on.

original: nyon cig pa ni sdud pa po la gdams pa'o //
analyzed: nyon cig pa ni sdud pa po la gdams pa'o //
translated: Listen is advice to the compiler.

original: de la dang por de kho na yid mngon du byas la //
analyzed: de la dang por de kho na yid mngon du byas la //
translated: Therein, first, having actualized thatness,

original: de'i 'og tu gnas kyi zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gnas kyi zhes bya ba ni //
translated: after that, the abode is

original: bcom ldan @229b 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: bcom ldan @229b 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i gnas so //
translated: the place where the Blessed One and retinue reside.

original: bskyed pa ni rim pas bskyed rim dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa ni rim pas bskyed rim dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The generation is the generation stage, along with the creation stage.

original: ji lta ba bzhin don ni go rims te /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin don ni go rims te /
translated: The meaning is the sequence.

original: dbang gi 'og tu 'byung ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbang gi 'og tu 'byung ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning that arises after the empowerment.

original: ka bag cig dang sngo dgur ldan //
analyzed: ka bag cig dang sngo dgur ldan //
translated: Possessing one pillar and nine doors.

original: zhes bya ba la lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi srog gi dbyug pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi srog gi dbyug pa ni /
translated: The life-force staff of the body maṇḍala

original: ka ba gcig gi dngos po'o //
analyzed: ka ba gcig gi dngos po'o //
translated: is the entity of one pillar.🔽Since the remaining deities of the aggregates, constituents, sense

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la sogs pa'i lhag pa'i lha rnams dgu po'i lam nas 'gro ba'i phyir sgo dgu'o /
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la sogs pa'i lhag pa'i lha rnams dgu po'i lam nas 'gro ba'i phyir sgo dgu'o /
translated: spheres, and so on, move through the nine paths, there are nine doors.

original: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni sgo bzhi dang gsum dang // gnyis dang / gcig dang ste /
analyzed: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni sgo bzhi dang gsum dang // gnyis dang / gcig dang ste /
translated: Possessing means four doors, three doors, two doors, and one door.

original: bzhi ni 'khor lo bzhi'i bdag nyid dga' ba rnams so //
analyzed: bzhi ni 'khor lo bzhi'i bdag nyid dga' ba rnams so //
translated: The four are the four wheels, which are the joys.

original: gsum ni sku gsungs thugs te /
analyzed: gsum ni sku gsungs thugs te /
translated: The three are body, speech, and mind.

original: de la sku'i sgo sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: de la sku'i sgo sngar bzhin no //
translated: The door of the body is as before.

original: thugs kyi ni snying gi dbus na //
analyzed: thugs kyi ni snying gi dbus na //
translated: The door of the mind is in the center of the heart.

original: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa gser dang bcas pa'i dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa chen shing gi me tog lta bur gnas pa'i dngos po 'og tu kha bltas nas 'chad pa'i bdag nyid de'i dbus su gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems yungs kar sbom po'i tshad tsam pa'i ming
analyzed: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa gser dang bcas pa'i dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa chen shing gi me tog lta bur gnas pa'i dngos po 'og tu kha bltas nas 'chad pa'i bdag nyid de'i dbus su gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems yungs kar sbom po'i tshad tsam pa'i ming
translated: In the center of the great channel that is located in the middle of the eight-petaled lotus together with the gold, like a tree flower, the thing that faces downward, the nature of the explanation, in the middle of that, the bodhicitta, the size of a large mustard seed, with the name

original: shigs pa'i yi ge dang ldan pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma dag 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i spyi bo'o //
analyzed: shigs pa'i yi ge dang ldan pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma dag 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i spyi bo'o //
translated: of the syllable of the broken moon and sun, is the crown, which is endowed with entry.

original: gsung gi sgo ni //
analyzed: gsung gi sgo ni //
translated: The door of speech🔽is fire,

original: me dang // rlung dang / dbang chen dang / chu rnams ni de bzhin du //
analyzed: me dang // rlung dang / dbang chen dang / chu rnams ni de bzhin du //
translated: wind, earth, and water, just so.

original: steng nas rgyu ba dang / logs nas dang / dal bar dang // 'og nas rgyu ba rnams rim pa bzhin sbyang ba'o //
analyzed: steng nas rgyu ba dang / logs nas dang / dal bar dang // 'og nas rgyu ba rnams rim pa bzhin sbyang ba'o //
translated: The upper movement, the side movement, the slow movement, and the lower movement are purified in order.

original: sgo gnyis ni /
analyzed: sgo gnyis ni /
translated: The two doors

original: steng gi sgo dang / 'og gi sogs yin te /
analyzed: steng gi sgo dang / 'og gi sogs yin te /
translated: are the upper door and the lower door.

original: de la steng gi sgo nas /
analyzed: de la steng gi sgo nas /
translated: With respect to that, the upper door🔽is the crown.

original: khams gsum rnams dang // rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams g-yo zhing gshegs su gsol ba dang // lte ba nas steng du ba ltas pa'i rtsa la nyi ma rgyu zhing bzhud pa'i rtsa ro can ma'i lam nas so /
analyzed: khams gsum rnams dang // rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams g-yo zhing gshegs su gsol ba dang // lte ba nas steng du ba ltas pa'i rtsa la nyi ma rgyu zhing bzhud pa'i rtsa ro can ma'i lam nas so /
translated: The three realms and the buddhas such as Vairocana are invited and depart, moving through the channel of the navel that is above, the path of the rasanā, the channel in which the sun moves and travels.

original: 'og gi sgo nas rna par shes pa ste /
analyzed: 'og gi sgo nas rna par shes pa ste /
translated: The ear consciousness is at the lower door.

original: spyan 'dren cing bzhugs su gsol ba ni /
analyzed: spyan 'dren cing bzhugs su gsol ba ni /
translated: The invitation and request to remain🔽are the buddhas of the three times, the sky-farers, and others.

original: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang mkha' 'gor ma dang gzhan yang steng nas 'og tu bltas pa rtsa la zla ba rgyu zhing byon pa'i rtsa 'dzin ma'i lam nas lte ba'i dbus su 'dzag go //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang mkha' 'gor ma dang gzhan yang steng nas 'og tu bltas pa rtsa la zla ba rgyu zhing byon pa'i rtsa 'dzin ma'i lam nas lte ba'i dbus su 'dzag go //
translated: Looking down from above, the moon moves through the channel, and the bodhicitta of great bliss descends into the center of the navel from the path of the lalanā, the channel in which the moon moves and travels.

original: sgo gcig pa ni rtog med ma'i rtsa yin te /
analyzed: sgo gcig pa ni rtog med ma'i rtsa yin te /
translated: The single door is the channel of nonconceptuality.

original: bde ba'i byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i lam nas rang bzhin dga' ba ni //
analyzed: bde ba'i byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i lam nas rang bzhin dga' ba ni //
translated: The path endowed with the bodhicitta of bliss is the single door because it is the sole basis for the movement and arrival of the innate joy,

original: bzhud pa dang / byon pa la sogs pa @230a * //🔽thams cad dang bral ba gcig tu grub pas na sgo gcig go //
analyzed: bzhud pa dang / byon pa la sogs pa @230a * // thams cad dang bral ba gcig tu grub pas na sgo gcig go //
translated: which is free from all movement and arrival.

original: lung las kyang //
analyzed: lung las kyang //
translated: Also, in the Tantra of the Great River of the Inconceivable Secrets of Alikali:

original: dkyil 'khor gnyis med sbyor ba las /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gnyis med sbyor ba las /
translated: From the union of the two mandalas,

original: sgom pa so sor snang ba tsam //
analyzed: sgom pa so sor snang ba tsam //
translated: meditation is just the appearance of each.

original: bde gshegs rnams kyi dkyil 'khor sogs //
analyzed: bde gshegs rnams kyi dkyil 'khor sogs //
translated: The mandalas of the Sugatas, etc.

original: rang bzhin dga' la bzhugs par mdzod //🔽ces gsungs so ;
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' la bzhugs par mdzod // ces gsungs so ;
translated: should be placed in natural joy.

original: / de'i gnas kyi bskyed pa ji bzhin don zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa'o //
analyzed: / de'i gnas kyi bskyed pa ji bzhin don zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa'o //
translated: The explanation of “just as the meaning of the creation of its place” and so on is as follows.

original: rdo rje'i pa rtsag pa zhes bya bas la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje'i pa rtsag pa zhes bya bas la sogs pa la /
translated: The “vajra peak” and so on.

original: rdo rje ni sems kyi rdo rje'i ni sems kyi rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni sems kyi rdo rje'i ni sems kyi rdo rje'o //
translated: Vajra is the mind. The vajra’s peak is the mind’s vajra.

original: rtseg pa ni sems kyi rdo rje khyab pa'o //
analyzed: rtseg pa ni sems kyi rdo rje khyab pa'o //
translated: The peak is the pervasion of the mind’s vajra.

original: rgyun ni khrag dang mchi ma la sog pa'i byang chub sems so //
analyzed: rgyun ni khrag dang mchi ma la sog pa'i byang chub sems so //
translated: The stream is the bodhicitta of blood, tears, and so on.

original: rdo rje thig ni rtsa rtog med ma dang ldan ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thig ni rtsa rtog med ma dang ldan ba'o //
translated: The vajra thread is the nāḍī.

original: bla re ni 'khor lo rnams so //
analyzed: bla re ni 'khor lo rnams so //
translated: The canopy is the cakras.

original: kun du yongs su bskor ba yin / zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: kun du yongs su bskor ba yin / zhes bya ba ni //
translated: It is completely surrounded

original: 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rtsas bskor ba'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rtsas bskor ba'o //
translated: by the nāḍīs of the cakras, and so on.

original: rlung la sogs pa'i rim pas dbye //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rlung la sogs pa'i rim pas dbye //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is divided by the stages of the vāyus, and so on.

original: rlung dang med dang / dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: rlung dang med dang / dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: the mandala of wind, fire, water, and earth.

original: 'byung ba bzhi dang / ldan pa yin //
analyzed: 'byung ba bzhi dang / ldan pa yin //
translated: It is endowed with the four elements.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is

original: gsang bar rlung gi dbyibs dang // sum mdor me'i dbyibs dang / lto bar chu'i dbyibs dang / snying gar sa'i dbyibs dang bzhi //
analyzed: gsang bar rlung gi dbyibs dang // sum mdor me'i dbyibs dang / lto bar chu'i dbyibs dang / snying gar sa'i dbyibs dang bzhi //
translated: the shape of the wind in the secret place, the shape of fire in the triple junction, the shape of water in the belly, and the shape of earth in the heart.

original: keng rus dbyug pa'i bdag nyid du ldan pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: keng rus dbyug pa'i bdag nyid du ldan pa'i gnas so //
translated: It is the abode endowed with the nature of the skeleton staff.

original: nam mkha' thams cad mtha' kun du //
analyzed: nam mkha' thams cad mtha' kun du //
translated: All space is everywhere.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is

original: bde ba chen po'i 'khor la sogs pa'i thams cad kyis lus la khyab pas na mtha' kun no //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i 'khor la sogs pa'i thams cad kyis lus la khyab pas na mtha' kun no //
translated: the pervasion of the entire body by the retinue of great bliss and so forth.

original: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
translated: It always abides as the nature of all.

original: zhes bya ba la //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la //
translated: This is

original: de rnams thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni //🔽gnyis su med pa'i de nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni // gnyis su med pa'i de nyid do //
translated: the nondual reality of all of them.

original: de nyid ni sems can dang sangs rgyas thams cad la rgyun mi 'chad pas rtag pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni sems can dang sangs rgyas thams cad la rgyun mi 'chad pas rtag pa'o //
translated: That itself is always present in all sentient beings and buddhas.

original: gshegs bzhugs mi mda' pas na rtag tu bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: gshegs bzhugs mi mda' pas na rtag tu bzhugs pa'o //
translated: Since it does not come or go, it is always present.

original: da ni phyi'i don bshad de //
analyzed: da ni phyi'i don bshad de //
translated: Now, the external object is explained.

original: rdo rje gur gyi dbus su ni //
analyzed: rdo rje gur gyi dbus su ni //
translated: In the middle of the Vajra Tent,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on.

original: 'dir dka' ba 'ga' tsam zhig dgongs te /
analyzed: 'dir dka' ba 'ga' tsam zhig dgongs te /
translated: Here, there is some difficulty.

original: gshin rje gshed ces bya ba ni //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed ces bya ba ni //
translated: Yama means the destroyer of life,

original: srog dang ; gang zag la sogs pa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rtog pa 'phrog pa'i dang tshul can yin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: srog dang ; gang zag la sogs pa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rtog pa 'phrog pa'i dang tshul can yin pa'i phyir na /
translated: and so on, because it has the mode of taking away the conception of self that grasps a person and so on.

original: gshin rje mthar byed yin no /
analyzed: gshin rje mthar byed yin no /
translated: Therefore, it is Yamantaka.

original: shes rab mthar byed ces bya ba ni //
analyzed: shes rab mthar byed ces bya ba ni //
translated: Wisdom means the destroyer of wisdom,

original: 'od zer dpag tu med pa spros pas shes rab dman pa'i bdud dang // mu stegs kyi rtogs pa @230b drag po ni khyab 'jug btul bas shes rab mthar byed do /
analyzed: 'od zer dpag tu med pa spros pas shes rab dman pa'i bdud dang // mu stegs kyi rtogs pa @230b drag po ni khyab 'jug btul bas shes rab mthar byed do /
translated: because it subdues the demon of inferior wisdom and the strong conception of tirthikas by emanating immeasurable light rays.

original: padma mthar byed ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: padma mthar byed ces bya ba ni /
translated: Lotus means the destroyer of the lotus,

original: 'og zer gyi tshogs dang / drag shul gyi sbyor bas brtson 'grus dman pa'i le lo can rnams kyi tshangs pa la sogs pa btul ba'i dngos grub thams cad kyi bdag nyi rta mgrin rgyal po'o //
analyzed: 'og zer gyi tshogs dang / drag shul gyi sbyor bas brtson 'grus dman pa'i le lo can rnams kyi tshangs pa la sogs pa btul ba'i dngos grub thams cad kyi bdag nyi rta mgrin rgyal po'o //
translated: because it is the king Hayagriva, the lord of all powers, who subdues Brahma and so on with a host of light rays and wrathful yoga for those who are lazy with inferior diligence.

original: bgegs mthar byed ces bya ba ni /🔽'od zer la sogs pa'i sbyor bas nyon mongs pa dang bcas pas tshogs kyi bdag po la sogs pa'i bgegs rnams thal bar byas te /
analyzed: bgegs mthar byed ces bya ba ni / 'od zer la sogs pa'i sbyor bas nyon mongs pa dang bcas pas tshogs kyi bdag po la sogs pa'i bgegs rnams thal bar byas te /
translated: The one called Destroyer of Obstacles

original: slar gsos nas dam la btags pa'i phyir bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o //
analyzed: slar gsos nas dam la btags pa'i phyir bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o //
translated: is Amṛtakuṇḍali, because he reduced to ashes the obstacles such as Gaṇapati by the application of light rays, etc., and then revived them and bound them to an oath.

original: gzhan 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa go sla'o ;🔽/ gzhan ra ne phyogs skyong bcu btul ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: gzhan 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa go sla'o ; / gzhan ra ne phyogs skyong bcu btul ba'i phyir na /
translated: The others, such as King Kama, are easy to understand.

original: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu po ni //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu po ni //
translated: The ten wrathful ones such as Yamāntaka are for the purpose of subduing the ten directions such as the northeast.

original: bdag nyid kyi gdan rang rang gi steng na bzhugs pa'o zer ro /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi gdan rang rang gi steng na bzhugs pa'o zer ro /
translated: They are said to reside on their own seats above each of their own places.

original: tshul dang thig pa'i rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba la sog pa ni /
analyzed: tshul dang thig pa'i rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba la sog pa ni /
translated: The nature of the method and the lines is as follows.

original: mngon par byang chub pa lngas lha'i sku bskyed pa'o ;
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa lngas lha'i sku bskyed pa'o ;
translated: The deity's body is generated by the five manifest enlightenments.

original: / dpal ye shes thig le zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: / dpal ye shes thig le zhes bya ba la /
translated: The one called Śrī Jñānatilaka

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis dang ldan pas na dpal lo //
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis dang ldan pas na dpal lo //
translated: is glorious because it possesses the two accumulations of merit and wisdom.

original: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid ye ru ka nyid kyi gzugs ni ye shes so //
analyzed: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid ye ru ka nyid kyi gzugs ni ye shes so //
translated: The form of the very essence of the five intuitions is intuition.

original: de nyid spros pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang bral bas na thig le'o //
analyzed: de nyid spros pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang bral bas na thig le'o //
translated: That itself is the drop, because it is free of the signs of elaboration, etc.

original: phyag rgya chen pos 'khyud cing zhes bya ba la //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen pos 'khyud cing zhes bya ba la //
translated: Embraced by the great seal means

original: skye ba dang 'gag pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi dbyings yin yang /
analyzed: skye ba dang 'gag pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi dbyings yin yang /
translated: that, although it is the reality realm free of the signs of origination, cessation, etc.,

original: 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pas phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pas phyag rgya'o //
translated: it is the seal because it pervades all living beings.

original: khyab pa yin yang lha mo'i gzugs su 'byung bas na chen po'o //
analyzed: khyab pa yin yang lha mo'i gzugs su 'byung bas na chen po'o //
translated: It is the great one because, although it is the pervasion, it appears in the form of a goddess.

original: kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'i phyir 'khyud pa yin no ;
analyzed: kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'i phyir 'khyud pa yin no ;
translated: It is the embrace because the relative and ultimate are inseparable.

original: / gtan tshigs 'dis na phyag rgya chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud pa yin no //
analyzed: / gtan tshigs 'dis na phyag rgya chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud pa yin no //
translated: By this reasoning, the great seal embraces the transcendent lord.

original: skur bzhengs shing brjod pa zhe bya ba ni /
analyzed: skur bzhengs shing brjod pa zhe bya ba ni /
translated: The arising of the body and speech means🔽that, although the reality realm is free of the signs of origination, cessation, etc.,🔽it appears in the form of a goddess.

original: dpal he ru ka thugs rjes khro bo khros par rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir ni nyid kyi sgra brjod pa tsam gyis phyir rgol ba ku rlag par byed do //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka thugs rjes khro bo khros par rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir ni nyid kyi sgra brjod pa tsam gyis phyir rgol ba ku rlag par byed do //
translated: The glorious Heruka, in order to thoroughly conquer the wrathful one who is wrathful through compassion, by merely uttering his sound, he destroys the opponent.

original: ha har dgod kyi phem gyi ye shes zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: ha har dgod kyi phem gyi ye shes zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The wisdom of the laughter ha ha pheṃ

original: gdug pa can gdul ba'i sgras brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gdug pa can gdul ba'i sgras brjod pa'o //
translated: is expressed by the sound of subduing the wicked.

original: chol pa chen po sgra bsgrags pas //🔽zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: chol pa chen po sgra bsgrags pas // zhes bya ba ni //
translated: By the sound of the great laughter,

original: h'um h'um dang phat phat la sogs pa'i sgras sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'jigs pa tsam mo //
analyzed: h'um h'um dang phat phat la sogs pa'i sgras sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'jigs pa tsam mo //
translated: by the sound of huṃ huṃ and phaṭ phaṭ, etc., even buddhahood is merely frightened.

original: tshangs pa'i yul sa ni mgo bo ste /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i yul sa ni mgo bo ste /
translated: The place of Brahmā is the head,

original: gdug pa can @231a * //
analyzed: gdug pa can @231a * //
translated: of the wicked ones

original: rnams kyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: rnams kyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: is the remainder of the words.

original: bye ba'i grangs ni 'bum phrag bcu yin te mtshon pa tsam mo //
analyzed: bye ba'i grangs ni 'bum phrag bcu yin te mtshon pa tsam mo //
translated: A koṭi is ten million, merely an indication.

original: thod pa'i lto ba rlag pa'o //
analyzed: thod pa'i lto ba rlag pa'o //
translated: The belly of the skull is destroyed

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: mgo thod kyi nang gi klad pa khro bo'i sgras med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mgo thod kyi nang gi klad pa khro bo'i sgras med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the brain inside the skull is destroyed by the sound of the wrathful one.

original: gar dug dang ldan par byed pa //
analyzed: gar dug dang ldan par byed pa //
translated: It is made to have poison in the dance

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: sgeg pa dang / dpa' ba dang / mi sdug pa dang / rgod pa dang / drag pa dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / snying rje dang / rngam pa dang / zhi ba dang dgu'o //
analyzed: sgeg pa dang / dpa' ba dang / mi sdug pa dang / rgod pa dang / drag pa dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / snying rje dang / rngam pa dang / zhi ba dang dgu'o //
translated: the graceful, the heroic, the ugly, the jolly, the fierce, the terrifying, the compassionate, the wrathful, and the peaceful.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
translated: The Commentary on the Glorious Wisdom-Essence

original: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: The Explanation of the Fourth Chapter, Called The Secret Thatness

original: // / bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lha rnams bstan kyang /
analyzed: // / bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lha rnams bstan kyang /
translated: Although the deities of the creation stage are taught,

original: de rnams kyi sngags med na /
analyzed: de rnams kyi sngags med na /
translated: if they lack mantras,

original: dngos grub mi 'grub pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos grub mi 'grub pas de'i phyir /
translated: siddhis will not be accomplished. Therefore,

original: sngags gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: sngags gsungs pa ste /
translated: the mantras are taught.

original: da ni sngags mchog bshad bya ba //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: da ni sngags mchog bshad bya ba // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Now, the supreme mantra is explained.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni mchog yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni mchog yin te /
translated: The essence of the tathāgatas is supreme.

original: mchog 'dir bshad par dam bca' ba'o //
analyzed: mchog 'dir bshad par dam bca' ba'o //
translated: Here, the commitment to explain the supreme is made.

original: gang gi sgrub pa po des 'grub //🔽ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: gang gi sgrub pa po des 'grub // ces bya ba ni /
translated: By whom is it accomplished?

original: sngags kyi mchog shes rab dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid gang yin pa la /
analyzed: sngags kyi mchog shes rab dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid gang yin pa la /
translated: The supreme mantra is the essence of wisdom and compassion.

original: rnal 'byor pa sgrub pa po de yang nas yang du bsgoms pa dang / bzlas pas grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa sgrub pa po de yang nas yang du bsgoms pa dang / bzlas pas grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: And that yogī practitioner will become accomplished through repeated meditation and recitation.

original: sa yi cha ni mnyam par mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sa yi cha ni mnyam par mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The supreme even part of the ground, and so on,

original: sgra ji bzhin pas bshad do //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pas bshad do //
translated: is explained literally.

original: nang du ni dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i cho ga bya ba ni mnyam pa ru'o //
analyzed: nang du ni dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i cho ga bya ba ni mnyam pa ru'o //
translated: Internally, the ground of the maṇḍala should be even.

original: mchog gi sgra ni rakta'o //
analyzed: mchog gi sgra ni rakta'o //
translated: The word supreme is rakta.

original: sbrang rtsi'i sgras bshang gci'o //
analyzed: sbrang rtsi'i sgras bshang gci'o //
translated: The word honey is feces.

original: ga pur gyis sgras shukra'o //
analyzed: ga pur gyis sgras shukra'o //
translated: The word camphor is semen.

original: byug pa'i sgras ni stobs dang bcas pa'i mi 'chi ba bcu phyed byug pa'o //
analyzed: byug pa'i sgras ni stobs dang bcas pa'i mi 'chi ba bcu phyed byug pa'o //
translated: The word ointment is the ointment of the ten half months of an immortal with power.

original: dri zhim pa ni bzhi mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: dri zhim pa ni bzhi mnyam pa'o //
translated: Sweet smell is the four even [yogas].

original: me tog ni ku mu da la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: me tog ni ku mu da la sogs pa'o //
translated: Flowers are kumuda and so on.

original: dgram pa ni mdzes par bya ba /
analyzed: dgram pa ni mdzes par bya ba /
translated: Scattering is beautifying.

original: khyab par gtor ba yin pas na //
analyzed: khyab par gtor ba yin pas na //
translated: Since it is a pervading sprinkling,

original: me tog gis ni chal bar bya //🔽zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: me tog gis ni chal bar bya // zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: it is scattered with flowers.

original: sngags btu zhing bsgrub pa'i gnas bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sngags btu zhing bsgrub pa'i gnas bstan pa ni /
translated: The place for gathering and accomplishing the mantra is taught:

original: chu ngogs yang na thang stong du //
analyzed: chu ngogs yang na thang stong du //
translated: On a riverbank or in an empty field,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: and so on.

original: chu ngogs ni chu bo'i drung du'o //
analyzed: chu ngogs ni chu bo'i drung du'o //
translated: The bank is near the river.

original: thang stong ni mi med pa'i gnas de dag gang yang rung ngo //
analyzed: thang stong ni mi med pa'i gnas de dag gang yang rung ngo //
translated: The open field is any of those places without people.

original: bsrung ba bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bsrung ba bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of the protection:

original: rdo rje srad bu yis ni bskor //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje srad bu yis ni bskor // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should surround it with a vajra thread.

original: srad bu kha dog sna lnga ye shes lngar @231b byin gyis brlabs pa ni rdo rje'i srad bu'o //
analyzed: srad bu kha dog sna lnga ye shes lngar @231b byin gyis brlabs pa ni rdo rje'i srad bu'o //
translated: The thread, blessed as the five gnoses with five colors, is the vajra thread.

original: de ni gtsor gsungs pa yin pa /
analyzed: de ni gtsor gsungs pa yin pa /
translated: That is the principal one,

original: gzhan dag gis kyang bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag gis kyang bskor bar bya'o //
translated: but one should also surround it with others.

original: rdo rje gzhon nu spyan rings ma //
analyzed: rdo rje gzhon nu spyan rings ma //
translated: The vajra youth with long eyes,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: gsang ba'i mchod pa rgyu dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i mchod pa rgyu dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The secret worship with its cause.

original: rdo rje gzhon nu ni lha mor bskyed la sbyor bas byin gyis brlabs pa ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gzhon nu ni lha mor bskyed la sbyor bas byin gyis brlabs pa ni rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra is the consecration by union with the goddess generated as Vajrakumara.

original: lo bcu drug la sogs pa ni gzhon nu ma'o //
analyzed: lo bcu drug la sogs pa ni gzhon nu ma'o //
translated: The youth is one of sixteen years of age, and so on.

original: spyan rings ma ni //
analyzed: spyan rings ma ni //
translated: The long-eyed one

original: spyan phra ba dang / sbom pa snyoms pas mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: spyan phra ba dang / sbom pa snyoms pas mdzes pa'o //
translated: is beautiful with eyes of equal thickness and length.

original: gzhon pa dang / spyan ring ba gtsor gsungs so //
analyzed: gzhon pa dang / spyan ring ba gtsor gsungs so //
translated: The youth and the long-eyed one are the principal ones.

original: zla ba ni shu kra'o //
analyzed: zla ba ni shu kra'o //
translated: The moon is semen.

original: nyi ma ni rakta'o //
analyzed: nyi ma ni rakta'o //
translated: The sun is rakta.

original: padma ni ge sar zhes bya ba /
analyzed: padma ni ge sar zhes bya ba /
translated: The lotus is called the pistil.

original: 'dab ma gsum pa'i padma'o //
analyzed: 'dab ma gsum pa'i padma'o //
translated: The lotus has three petals.

original: lang tsho la bab pa ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: lang tsho la bab pa ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: Youth is as explained before.

original: reg bya 'jam pa ni lus kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: reg bya 'jam pa ni lus kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: Smooth to the touch is the characteristic of the body.

original: dang por mkhas pas gzhug par bya //
analyzed: dang por mkhas pas gzhug par bya //
translated: First, the wise one should enter.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is

original: rnal 'byor pas shes rab ma'i mtshan nyid rtogs nas dang por dkyil 'khor du'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas shes rab ma'i mtshan nyid rtogs nas dang por dkyil 'khor du'o //
translated: . The yogi, having understood the characteristics of the wisdom woman, first enters the mandala.

original: sngags kyi gnas su lugs ji bzhin ;
analyzed: sngags kyi gnas su lugs ji bzhin ;
translated: In the place of mantra, as is proper.

original: / zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: / zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is

original: sngags btu ba dang / bsgrub pa'i gnas le'u bzhi par bskyed par gsungs par ji lta ba bzhin du byas la byin gyis brlab bo /
analyzed: sngags btu ba dang / bsgrub pa'i gnas le'u bzhi par bskyed par gsungs par ji lta ba bzhin du byas la byin gyis brlab bo /
translated: . Having done as explained in chapter four, the creation of the place of mantra recitation and practice, one should bless it.

original: legs dges ni gcig la gcig dga' na dgyes pa'o //
analyzed: legs dges ni gcig la gcig dga' na dgyes pa'o //
translated: Well-pleased is mutual delight.

original: shin tu sbyor bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: shin tu sbyor bar bya ba ni /
translated: Very much engaged is

original: rang bzhin dga' ba'i ye shes dga' ba gzhan mas bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba'i ye shes dga' ba gzhan mas bskyed pa'o //
translated: . The wisdom of natural joy is generated by other joys.

original: de'i sbyar bas ni thabs dang shes rab dga' ba rnams las so //
analyzed: de'i sbyar bas ni thabs dang shes rab dga' ba rnams las so //
translated: By that engagement, from the joys of method and wisdom.

original: gang byung ba ni /
analyzed: gang byung ba ni /
translated: Whatever arises is🔽.

original: byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The bodhicitta.

original: kha dang sogs mchod par bya //
analyzed: kha dang sogs mchod par bya //
translated: One should worship with the mouth, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This means🔽that one should make a bindu on the three places of the disciple, worship the maṇḍala ground, and worship the deities.
