original: slob ma'i gnas gsum du thig le bya ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi sa la mchod pa dang ; lha rnams la mchod par bya'o / yang na byang chub kyi sems phyir mi 'byung bar rtog med ma'i rtsa'i kha dang sa ni rten yin te /
analyzed: slob ma'i gnas gsum du thig le bya ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi sa la mchod pa dang ; lha rnams la mchod par bya'o / yang na byang chub kyi sems phyir mi 'byung bar rtog med ma'i rtsa'i kha dang sa ni rten yin te /
translated: Alternatively, the mouth and the ground are the support of the non-emission of bodhicitta.

original: rten phyag rgya dang bcas pa dga' ba rnams kyis mchod par bya zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rten phyag rgya dang bcas pa dga' ba rnams kyis mchod par bya zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should worship with the joys of the support and the consort.

original: man ngag go //
analyzed: man ngag go //
translated: This is the intimate instruction.

original: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bya //
analyzed: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bya //
translated: One should draw an eight-petaled lotus.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This means

original: sngags btu ba'i dkyil 'khor padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dmar po bri bar bya'o //🔽rdo rje yi ni phur bu bcu //
analyzed: sngags btu ba'i dkyil 'khor padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dmar po bri bar bya'o // rdo rje yi ni phur bu bcu //
translated: that one should draw a red, eight-petaled lotus maṇḍala for the extraction of the mantra.🔽Ten vajra-dagger

original: khro bo'i sngags kyis mkhas pas gdab //
analyzed: khro bo'i sngags kyis mkhas pas gdab //
translated: empowerments with the mantra of wrath are for the expert.

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: This means

original: phur bu bcu la khro bo bcur byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: phur bu bcu la khro bo bcur byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: that one should empower the ten daggers as the ten wrathful ones.

original: khro bo'i sngags bcus ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos so //
analyzed: khro bo'i sngags bcus ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos so //
translated: The practitioner should possess the ten wrathful mantras.

original: de'i sngags @232a * //
analyzed: de'i sngags @232a * //
translated: His mantra is:

original: aom dzrembha dzrembha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: aom dzrembha dzrembha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Oṃ jreṃbhajreṃbha, and so forth.

original: de ni sngags dgod pa dang btu ba gsungs pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: de ni sngags dgod pa dang btu ba gsungs pa 'di yin te /
translated: This is the teaching on the layout and collection of the mantras.

original: a'a li k'a li mnyam byas la //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li mnyam byas la //
translated: Having made the vowels and consonants equal,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: and so forth.

original: a'a li ni a'a la sogs pa bcu drug go //
analyzed: a'a li ni a'a la sogs pa bcu drug go //
translated: The vowels are the sixteen, beginning with a.

original: k'a li ni yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum ste /
analyzed: k'a li ni yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum ste /
translated: The consonants are the thirty-three letters,

original: ka nas ha'i bar ro //
analyzed: ka nas ha'i bar ro //
translated: from ka to ha.

original: mnyam byas ni /
analyzed: mnyam byas ni /
translated: Having made them equal,

original: 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte ba'i 'dab ma la ste /
analyzed: 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte ba'i 'dab ma la ste /
translated: on the center of the eight-petaled lotus.

original: 'dab ma kun la rim pas dgod //
analyzed: 'dab ma kun la rim pas dgod //
translated: The vowels are placed on all the petals, in order.

original: ces so // a'a li ye shes 'dab ma gcig ni /
analyzed: ces so // a'a li ye shes 'dab ma gcig ni /
translated: The single-petaled wisdom vowel

original: 'dab ma gcig la dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug go //
analyzed: 'dab ma gcig la dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug go //
translated: is the single petal with the sixteen vowel letters.

original: k'a li 'dab ma bdun du dran //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: k'a li 'dab ma bdun du dran // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The consonants are remembered on seven petals.

original: ka nas ha'i bar gyi yi ge 'dab ma bdun po la dgod do //
analyzed: ka nas ha'i bar gyi yi ge 'dab ma bdun po la dgod do //
translated: The letters from ka to ha are placed on the seven petals.

original: 'dab ma re re yi ge lnga //
analyzed: 'dab ma re re yi ge lnga //
translated: Five letters on each petal.

original: lnga pa la ni lnga pa'o //
analyzed: lnga pa la ni lnga pa'o //
translated: Five on the fifth.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nim ka'i sde tshan lnga dang / de bzhin du tsa'i dang / ta'i dang / ta'i dang / pa'i sde tshan lnga pa lnga 'dab ma lnga la lnga lnga'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nim ka'i sde tshan lnga dang / de bzhin du tsa'i dang / ta'i dang / ta'i dang / pa'i sde tshan lnga pa lnga 'dab ma lnga la lnga lnga'o //
translated: The five groups of five beginning with “ka” are the five leaves, and likewise the five groups of five beginning with “ca,” “ṭa,” “ta,” and “pa” are the five leaves.

original: gnyis la aantastha dang / aushm'i bzhi bzhi'o //
analyzed: gnyis la aantastha dang / aushm'i bzhi bzhi'o //
translated: On the two petals, “anta” and “uṣma” have four each.

original: lte bar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin yig 'bru kasha'o //
analyzed: lte bar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin yig 'bru kasha'o //
translated: In the center is the syllable kṣa, the nature of the Bhagavān Vajrasattva.

original: gzhan go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: dang po gzugs kyi bdag po ni yi ge aom ste /
analyzed: dang po gzugs kyi bdag po ni yi ge aom ste /
translated: First, the lord of form is the syllable oṃ,

original: sngags rnams kyi thog mar bstan pas so //
analyzed: sngags rnams kyi thog mar bstan pas so //
translated: because it is taught at the beginning of all mantras.

original: de nas 'dab ma gnyis kyi dang por zhes pa ni yig 'bru sha'o //
analyzed: de nas 'dab ma gnyis kyi dang por zhes pa ni yig 'bru sha'o //
translated: Then, the first of the two petals is the syllable śa.

original: bzhi par dbyangs yig dang bcas pa ni /
analyzed: bzhi par dbyangs yig dang bcas pa ni /
translated: In the fourth, it is endowed with a vowel,

original: aa'i ring po dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: aa'i ring po dang bcas pa'o //
translated: that is, it is endowed with a long ā.

original: 'og tu re par yis ni brgyan //
analyzed: 'og tu re par yis ni brgyan //
translated: Below, it is adorned with the syllable re.

original: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ges so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ges so //
translated: This is the syllable ra.

original: nyi shu lnga pa ni ma'i yig 'bru'o //🔽'dab ma gnyis pa'i zhes pa ni yig 'bru ha'o //
analyzed: nyi shu lnga pa ni ma'i yig 'bru'o // 'dab ma gnyis pa'i zhes pa ni yig 'bru ha'o //
translated: The twenty-fifth is the syllable ma.🔽The first of the two petals is the syllable ha.

original: dbyangs yig gnyis pa ni yi ge a'a'o //
analyzed: dbyangs yig gnyis pa ni yi ge a'a'o //
translated: The second vowel is the syllable a.

original: sngags kyi nus mthu bstan pa ni /🔽'khor ba'i ngan 'gro dag byed pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi nus mthu bstan pa ni / 'khor ba'i ngan 'gro dag byed pa'o //
translated: The teaching of the power of mantra

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: is the purification of the bad migrations of cyclic existence.

original: 'dab gnyis dang po'i bzhi pa yis ni yi ge wa'o //
analyzed: 'dab gnyis dang po'i bzhi pa yis ni yi ge wa'o //
translated: The fourth of the first two petals is the syllable va.

original: de nas / gsal byed pa yi brgyad pa ni yig 'bru dza'o //
analyzed: de nas / gsal byed pa yi brgyad pa ni yig 'bru dza'o //
translated: Then, the eighth of the sibilants is the syllable ja.

original: 'dab gnyis dang po'i gnyis pa yis ni ra'i yig 'bru'o //
analyzed: 'dab gnyis dang po'i gnyis pa yis ni ra'i yig 'bru'o //
translated: The second of the first two petals is the syllable ra.

original: ldan pas thams cad rigs 'phrogs byed ni yon tan mthu yod pa'o //
analyzed: ldan pas thams cad rigs 'phrogs byed ni yon tan mthu yod pa'o //
translated: Endowed with all, the stealer of the family, is the power of the qualities.

original: gsal byed pa yi gsum pa ni g'i yig 'bru'o //
analyzed: gsal byed pa yi gsum pa ni g'i yig 'bru'o //
translated: The third of the sibilants is the syllable ga.

original: bcu pas yang dag ldan pa'o ni /
analyzed: bcu pas yang dag ldan pa'o ni /
translated: Endowed with the tenth is

original: nya ste gha zhes pa'o //
analyzed: nya ste gha zhes pa'o //
translated: the fish, which is gha.

original: dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni a'a dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni a'a dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The second vowel is a, along with a.

original: bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin pa ni /
analyzed: bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin pa ni /
translated: The fifth of the fourth is

original: na'i yig 'bru'o //
analyzed: na'i yig 'bru'o //
translated: the syllable ni.

original: de nas de'i dang po ni /
analyzed: de nas de'i dang po ni /
translated: Then, the first of that is

original: ta'i yig 'bru'o //
analyzed: ta'i yig 'bru'o //
translated: the syllable ta.

original: bcu @232b drug po'i gsum pa ni ai'o //
analyzed: bcu @232b drug po'i gsum pa ni ai'o //
translated: The third of the sixteen is e.

original: thams cad sngags kyi tshig bzhi ni /
analyzed: thams cad sngags kyi tshig bzhi ni /
translated: All the words of the mantra are

original: ti la ka'i yi shes thig le'i le'u dang po'o //
analyzed: ti la ka'i yi shes thig le'i le'u dang po'o //
translated: the first chapter of the Tilakavat Knowledge-Ti ki.

original: de nas sa'i dag pa ni la'o //
analyzed: de nas sa'i dag pa ni la'o //
translated: Then, the purity of the earth is la.

original: de bzhin gsal byed dang po ni ka'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gsal byed dang po ni ka'o //
translated: Likewise, the first vowel is ka.

original: yan lag gsal byed sum cu gsum ni ha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: yan lag gsal byed sum cu gsum ni ha'i yi ge'o //
translated: The thirty-third consonant is the letter ha.

original: dbyangs yig drug pa ni a'u'i bdag nyid do ;
analyzed: dbyangs yig drug pa ni a'u'i bdag nyid do ;
translated: The sixth vowel is the nature of au.

original: / thams cad kyi ni 'byung ba'i gzhi //
analyzed: / thams cad kyi ni 'byung ba'i gzhi //
translated: The basis of the arising of all

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: is easy to understand.

original: dang po ru ni gzugs kyi mchog / ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: dang po ru ni gzugs kyi mchog / ces bya ba ni /
translated: The supreme form is at the beginning.

original: yi ge aom dang por btu ba'o //
analyzed: yi ge aom dang por btu ba'o //
translated: The letter om is extracted at the beginning.

original: 'dab ma gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: 'dab ma gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'o //
translated: The fourth of the second petal.

original: zhes pa ni yig 'bru ha'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni yig 'bru ha'o //
translated: The letter is the letter ha.

original: 'og tu re pha ri ra dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'og tu re pha ri ra dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Below, it is endowed with the ra of re pha.

original: dbyangs yig bzhi pa ni a'i'i bdag nyid dang sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: dbyangs yig bzhi pa ni a'i'i bdag nyid dang sbyar ba'o //
translated: The fourth vowel is endowed with the nature of ai.

original: rig pa'i rgyal po mchog ni /
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal po mchog ni /
translated: The supreme king of knowledge

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying po hr'i'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying po hr'i'o //
translated: is the essence of the tathagatas, hrīṃ.

original: thig le steng du ldan pa ni /
analyzed: thig le steng du ldan pa ni /
translated: Endowed with the bindu above

original: hri'am gi don to //
analyzed: hri'am gi don to //
translated: means hrīṃ or gīṃ.

original: de rang du ni nye bar gnas ni /
analyzed: de rang du ni nye bar gnas ni /
translated: It abides in its own nature

original: yang hr'i ste gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: yang hr'i ste gnyis pa'o //
translated: is hrīṃ again, the second.

original: nyon mongs par la sogs pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: nyon mongs par la sogs pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to pacify the afflictions, etc.,

original: thams cad zhi ba zhi ba'i mchog / ces so //
analyzed: thams cad zhi ba zhi ba'i mchog / ces so //
translated: All is peace, the supreme peace.

original: thig les steng mnan sum cu gsum ni ham gi yi ger bstan pa'o //
analyzed: thig les steng mnan sum cu gsum ni ham gi yi ger bstan pa'o //
translated: The thirty-third [letter] is suppressed by the bindu, and is taught to be the letter haṃ.

original: bcu drug pa yi gnyis pa ni a'a'o //
analyzed: bcu drug pa yi gnyis pa ni a'a'o //
translated: The second of the sixteenth [letter] is a.

original: ldan pa ni ham du gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ldan pa ni ham du gsungs pa'o //
translated: The bindu is said to be haṃ.

original: yang na de nyid yi ge mchog ni /
analyzed: yang na de nyid yi ge mchog ni /
translated: Or, that itself is the supreme letter,

original: ham ham zhes bsnan pa'o //
analyzed: ham ham zhes bsnan pa'o //
translated: adding haṃ haṃ.

original: khams gsum mun nag med par byed ni /
analyzed: khams gsum mun nag med par byed ni /
translated: It makes the darkness of the three realms disappear,

original: 'dod khams la sogs par ye shes thig le'i ye shes sgron ma 'bar bar byas pas /
analyzed: 'dod khams la sogs par ye shes thig le'i ye shes sgron ma 'bar bar byas pas /
translated: since the lamp of the gnosis bindu of gnosis blazes in the desire realm and so forth,🔽removing the darkness of ignorance.

original: ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal bar byas zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'i yon tan bsgrags par byas so //🔽h'um phat de ni gnyi gar sbyar ni /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal bar byas zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'i yon tan bsgrags par byas so // h'um phat de ni gnyi gar sbyar ni /
translated: The Blessed One's essence and the qualities of the close essence are proclaimed.🔽That hūṃ phaṭ is applied to both,

original: gnyis gnyis te h'um h'um phat phat ces bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis gnyis te h'um h'um phat phat ces bya'o //
translated: that is, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ.

original: tha mar sv'a h'a yis ni ldan //
analyzed: tha mar sv'a h'a yis ni ldan //
translated: At the end, it is endowed with svāhā.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This means

original: sngags kyi mthar sv'a h'a dang ldan pas sbrul gyi sngags so //
analyzed: sngags kyi mthar sv'a h'a dang ldan pas sbrul gyi sngags so //
translated: that since the mantra is endowed with svāhā at the end, it is the mantra of the emanation.

original: nye ba'i snying po'i sngags zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nye ba'i snying po'i sngags zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The mantra of the close essence is called🔽.

original: snying po rang la nye bas na /
analyzed: snying po rang la nye bas na /
translated: Since the essence is close to oneself,

original: nye ba'i snying po'i don te //
analyzed: nye ba'i snying po'i don te //
translated: it is the meaning of the near essence.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po bstan nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the essence and the near essence of the Bhagavān,

original: bcom ldan 'das ma'i gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma'i gsungs pa ni /
translated: the speech of the Bhagavatī is:

original: dang pos rnam par snang mdzad dag / ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: dang pos rnam par snang mdzad dag / ces bya ba ni /
translated: The first one is Vairocana.

original: aom dang por bshad do //
analyzed: aom dang por bshad do //
translated: The syllable Oṃ is explained first.

original: nyi shu rtsa dgu de nas so ni wa'i yig 'bru'o //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa dgu de nas so ni wa'i yig 'bru'o //

analyzed: kro dha ni khro bo'o //

analyzed: shva ra ni dbang phyug go //

analyzed: gang la zhe na /

original: gdug pa can rnams khros pa'o //
analyzed: gdug pa can rnams khros pa'o //

original: de'i don ni bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po he ru ka nyid /
analyzed: de'i don ni bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po he ru ka nyid /

original: thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis gdug pa can rnams la shin tu khros pas zhal dang phyag mang por ston pa'o //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis gdug pa can rnams la shin tu khros pas zhal dang phyag mang por ston pa'o //

original: bhe be da zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ma bshad do //
analyzed: bhe be da zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ma bshad do //

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: bsgom par dang bzlas pa la rag lus pa'i phyir ro // h'um h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /

analyzed: dpal nam mkha' dri med dang / zla ba la sogs pa dpa' bo dang dpa' mo bcu drug phrag gnyis kyi sngags so //
translated: The meaning of hūṃ hūṃ and so forth is the mantra of the two sets of sixteen heroes and heroines such as the glorious Vimalamitra and Candra.

original: de'i phyir 'khor lo'i sngags zhes bya'o ;
analyzed: de'i phyir 'khor lo'i sngags zhes bya'o ;

original: /'khor lo ni 'khor lo'i lha rnams so //
analyzed: /'khor lo ni 'khor lo'i lha rnams so //
translated: The wheel is the deities of the wheel.

original: sngags ni sngar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: sngags ni sngar bshad pa'o //
translated: The mantra is as explained above.

original: sngags chen po'i ni nus mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o / dpa' bo rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug go //
analyzed: sngags chen po'i ni nus mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o / dpa' bo rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug go //
translated: The great mantra is the inconceivable power of the mantra. The heroes are the sixteen bodhisattvas.

original: dpa' bo rnams gsungs pas /
analyzed: dpa' bo rnams gsungs pas /
translated: Since the heroes are mentioned,

original: dpa' mo rnams kyang bsdu'o //
analyzed: dpa' mo rnams kyang bsdu'o //
translated: the heroines are also included.

original: snying po mchog ni thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi sa bon ni snying po mchog mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying po mchog ni thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi sa bon ni snying po mchog mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The supreme essence is the seed of the mind, the supreme essence, the unchanging.

original: lha mo skam ma dang / 'jigs ma la sogs pa'i sngags ni /
analyzed: lha mo skam ma dang / 'jigs ma la sogs pa'i sngags ni /

original: aa a'a la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: aa a'a la sogs pa'o //
translated: are the vowels such as a, ā, and so forth.

original: dpa' bo'i yan lag ma snying sngags //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i yan lag ma snying sngags //
translated: The mantra of the hero’s limb, the heart.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: yan lag ma ni lha mo rnams so //
analyzed: yan lag ma ni lha mo rnams so //
translated: the limb is the goddesses.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o ;
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o ;
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: / gsang ba'i sngags kyis dgod pa ni //
analyzed: / gsang ba'i sngags kyis dgod pa ni //
translated: The secret mantra is the supreme essence.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Here,

original: dam tshig dang mi ldan pa rnams la bstan par bya ba ma yin pas gsang ba yin no //
analyzed: dam tshig dang mi ldan pa rnams la bstan par bya ba ma yin pas gsang ba yin no //
translated: it is secret because it should not be taught to those who do not have the commitments.

original: 'gro ba rnams la skyob pa'i bdag nyid yin pas na sngags so //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams la skyob pa'i bdag nyid yin pas na sngags so //
translated: Since it is the very nature of the protector of all beings, it is mantra.

original: sbyor ba drug gi don bstan pa ni dgod pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba drug gi don bstan pa ni dgod pa'o //
translated: The teaching is the meaning of the six applications.

original: @234a * // sbyor ba drug gi man ngag rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das ni mchod pa'i dus so //
analyzed: @234a * // sbyor ba drug gi man ngag rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das ni mchod pa'i dus so //
translated: The Blessed One of Yoga is the time of worship, the instruction of the six applications.

original: aom n'a da ni rma la ya h'um h'um phat ces brjod pa ni mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: aom n'a da ni rma la ya h'um h'um phat ces brjod pa ni mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should worship by reciting Om nādani rmālaya hum hum phat.

original: de la sngags kyi dang por phyag 'tshal ba'i yi ge aom zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de la sngags kyi dang por phyag 'tshal ba'i yi ge aom zhes bya ste /
translated: In that, the first of the mantras is the syllable om, which is the salutation.

original: de rnams la bstod pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams la bstod pa'o //
translated: That is the praise.

original: n'a da ni ye shes kyi tshul de rtog pa dang bral ba'i sgra'o //
analyzed: n'a da ni ye shes kyi tshul de rtog pa dang bral ba'i sgra'o //
translated: The nādani is the sound of the mode of wisdom free from conceptualization.

original: ni rma ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i ngo bo rnams dang bcas pa'i lte ba'o //
analyzed: ni rma ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i ngo bo rnams dang bcas pa'i lte ba'o //
translated: The rmālaya is the navel, the nature of the emanation wheel together with the retinue.

original: la ya ni pho brang ste sprul pa'i lte ba'i pho brang bcom ldan 'das tshul gyi ye shes bzhugs pa'i don to //
analyzed: la ya ni pho brang ste sprul pa'i lte ba'i pho brang bcom ldan 'das tshul gyi ye shes bzhugs pa'i don to //
translated: The laya is the palace, the meaning of which is the Blessed One of the mode of wisdom abides in the palace of the navel of emanation.

original: h'um dang pos ni gdug pa can rnams la sdigs mdzub kyis 'joms pa'o ;
analyzed: h'um dang pos ni gdug pa can rnams la sdigs mdzub kyis 'joms pa'o ;
translated: The first hum is the threatening gesture that conquers the wicked.

original: / gnyis pa'i h'um ni de rnams dbang du sdud pa'o //
analyzed: / gnyis pa'i h'um ni de rnams dbang du sdud pa'o //
translated: The second HŪṂ is the subjugation of those [demons].

original: phat kyis gtor nas ltung bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: phat kyis gtor nas ltung bar byed pa'o //
translated: The Phat is the scattering and the falling down.

original: aom bi du la sogs pa ma bshad pa snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: aom bi du la sogs pa ma bshad pa snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The OṂ and so forth that are not explained are as before.

original: ye shes drug ni sbyor ba drug gi ye shes so //
analyzed: ye shes drug ni sbyor ba drug gi ye shes so //
translated: The six wisdoms are the wisdoms of the six unions.

original: sngags mchog dbang zhes bya ba ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog go //
analyzed: sngags mchog dbang zhes bya ba ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog go //
translated: The supreme mantra empowerment is the supreme of all mantras.

original: rab bo // gya nom pa ste /
analyzed: rab bo // gya nom pa ste /
translated: It is excellent.

original: nus mthu dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: nus mthu dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It has immeasurable power.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gsangs sngags kyi nus mthu ni rgyud la sogs pa thams cad nas 'byung ste /
analyzed: gsangs sngags kyi nus mthu ni rgyud la sogs pa thams cad nas 'byung ste /
translated: The power of the mantra arises from all the tantras and so forth.

original: cig shos min pa ni /
analyzed: cig shos min pa ni /
translated: The other is not so.

original: bde ba mchog gi rgyud las kyang 'jig rten gsum g-yo bar byed do //
analyzed: bde ba mchog gi rgyud las kyang 'jig rten gsum g-yo bar byed do //
translated: In the Cakrasaṃvara Tantra it says, “It shakes the three worlds.

original: lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang bcas pa 'gugs par byed pa dang / 'ching bar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang bcas pa 'gugs par byed pa dang / 'ching bar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: It summons and binds the gods, demigods, yakṣas, rākṣasas, gandharvas, kinnaras, and mahoragas.”

original: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad sgrub pa po'i mngang  gzhug byed par 'gyur ba dang // de'i sbyor ba 'phrog par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa bzhin /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad sgrub pa po'i mngang  gzhug byed par 'gyur ba dang // de'i sbyor ba 'phrog par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa bzhin /
translated: all the dakinis will be the servants of the adept, and they will carry out his every command.

original: sngags kyi nus mthu rgyud la sogs pa kun nas gsungs so //
analyzed: sngags kyi nus mthu rgyud la sogs pa kun nas gsungs so //
translated: The power of the mantras is taught in the Tantras and so forth.

original: de rnams kyang khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchog yin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyang khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchog yin no //
translated: They are the most excellent of the most excellent.

original: sde tshan brgyad kyi gtso bo yin //
analyzed: sde tshan brgyad kyi gtso bo yin //
translated: The eight classes are the principal ones.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: a'a li dang k'a li yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i gtso bo aa la sogs pa brgyad do //
analyzed: a'a li dang k'a li yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i gtso bo aa la sogs pa brgyad do //
translated: The eight principal ones are the eight beginning with a, which are the principal ones of the forty-nine letters of the a- and ka-li.

original: 'di rnams sngags btu ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di rnams sngags btu ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because these are the places for collecting the mantras,

original: gtso bo gsungs pas /
analyzed: gtso bo gsungs pas /
translated: they are called the principal ones.

original: cig shos kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: cig shos kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the rest is also like that.

original: rtsa ba'i sde tshan zhes bya ba ni yi ge a'a'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sde tshan zhes bya ba ni yi ge a'a'o //
translated: The root class is the letter a.

original: gtor ma gtang ba ni aa dang ldan pa'i sngags kyis gtor ma gtang ba'o //
analyzed: gtor ma gtang ba ni aa dang ldan pa'i sngags kyis gtor ma gtang ba'o //
translated: The bali offering is the bali offering with the mantra endowed with a.

original: brtag pa gnyis pa ji bzhin no //
analyzed: brtag pa gnyis pa ji bzhin no //

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /

original: kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud brtag pa gnyis pa @234b bzhin du ste /
analyzed: kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud brtag pa gnyis pa @234b bzhin du ste /

original: de yang 'di yin te /
analyzed: de yang 'di yin te /
translated: And that is:

original: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharmm'a n'am aady'a nutpa nna tv'at aom a'a: h'um sv'a h'a zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharmm'a n'am aady'a nutpa nna tv'at aom a'a: h'um sv'a h'a zhes bya ba yin no //

original: gzhan rnams go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan rnams go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: dbal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel //
analyzed: dbal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel //

original: gsangs ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u lnga pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: gsangs ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u lnga pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: The fifth chapter of the Secret Reality

original: // / sngags kyi 'og tu mchod spyin 'byung bas na /
analyzed: // / sngags kyi 'og tu mchod spyin 'byung bas na /
translated: Since the sacrifice is mentioned after the mantra,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: there is then, etc.

original: mchod sbyin ni phyi dang nang gi mchod sbyin no //
analyzed: mchod sbyin ni phyi dang nang gi mchod sbyin no //

original: rab ni nang gi mchod sbyin dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab ni nang gi mchod sbyin dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The best is because of possessing the inner sacrifice.

original: de ni bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le bdag gis bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le bdag gis bshad par bya'o //

analyzed: gnas ni aunyan dang / dz'a landhara dang / pullira dang ; k'a ma ru'o //

original: sogs pas ni nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sogs pas ni nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa rnams so //

original: rim pas sbyor ni phyi'i bzhin du nang la yang mgo bo dang / spyi gtsug dang / spyi bo dang / smin ma la sogs pa rnams la sbyar te /
analyzed: rim pas sbyor ni phyi'i bzhin du nang la yang mgo bo dang / spyi gtsug dang / spyi bo dang / smin ma la sogs pa rnams la sbyar te /
translated: The sequence of the inner is applied in the same way as the outer, that is, to the head, the crown of the head, the forehead, the eyebrows, and so on.

original: nang gi don bsgoms pas ni /
analyzed: nang gi don bsgoms pas ni /
translated: By meditating on the inner meaning,

original: phyi'i gnas la sogs par bgrod mi dgos par 'dus pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
